analyzed: ngang pa'i rgyal po rma bya chu khrag p'a ni /
translated: swan king peacock water blood pāṇi

original: ka phu tra /
analyzed: ka phu tra /
translated: kaphuta

original: kukku ti / chu phug ron khyim bya ` zas dang spyod lam bstan pa ni /
analyzed: kukku ti / chu phug ron khyim bya ` zas dang spyod lam bstan pa ni /
translated: The demonstration of diet and conduct:

original: rlung gi nad mtha' dag la /
analyzed: rlung gi nad mtha' dag la /
translated: For all types of wind disorders,

original: dro sar dal bar 'dug / me la sro zhing byug pa byed /🔽rtsam pa dang mar /
analyzed: dro sar dal bar 'dug / me la sro zhing byug pa byed / rtsam pa dang mar /
translated: sit in a warm place, bask in the sun, and apply ointments.🔽Take barley flour and butter,

original: sha dang de'i khu ba gtong /
analyzed: sha dang de'i khu ba gtong /
translated: meat and its soup.

original: mkhris pa'i nad la b'a la dang shri khanda gnyis zhib bar btags la chur sbyar ba'i byug pa byed /
analyzed: mkhris pa'i nad la b'a la dang shri khanda gnyis zhib bar btags la chur sbyar ba'i byug pa byed /
translated: For bile disorders, apply an ointment of vṛṣa and śrīkhaṇḍa, finely ground and mixed with water.

original: grang sar bsdad /
analyzed: grang sar bsdad /
translated: Sit in a cool place.

original: nad tshabs che na lto bkag gtong /
analyzed: nad tshabs che na lto bkag gtong /
translated: If the illness is severe, give a restricted diet.

original: gzhan pag thug kho na bsten no //
analyzed: gzhan pag thug kho na bsten no //
translated: Otherwise, rely solely on buttermilk.

original: bad kan la grang dro ran par byas la dal bus 'chag / sran rtsam sogs zas yang zhing 'ju ba'i rigs bsten /
analyzed: bad kan la grang dro ran par byas la dal bus 'chag / sran rtsam sogs zas yang zhing 'ju ba'i rigs bsten /
translated: For phlegm, act with a balance of warm and cool, walk slowly, and rely on light and easily digestible foods such as barley flour.

original: bcud can dang lci ba'i rigs 'dzem mo //
analyzed: bcud can dang lci ba'i rigs 'dzem mo //
translated: Avoid nutritious and heavy foods.

original: dngul chu 'dul lugs la /
analyzed: dngul chu 'dul lugs la /
translated: The method of refining mercury:

original: rdo gzhong gi nang du dngul chu zho nyi shu rtsa bzhi blug / de dang rdza rnying pa'am so phag khyor gang tsam dang mnyam du nyin gnyis kyi bar du nyed /
analyzed: rdo gzhong gi nang du dngul chu zho nyi shu rtsa bzhi blug / de dang rdza rnying pa'am so phag khyor gang tsam dang mnyam du nyin gnyis kyi bar du nyed /
translated: Place twenty-four measures of mercury in a stone trough, and mix it with one measure of old pottery or brick. Let it sit for two days.

original: de nas chu gtsang mar bsrings te dngul chu dang sa rang sar phye /
analyzed: de nas chu gtsang mar bsrings te dngul chu dang sa rang sar phye /
translated: Then, pour the water into a clean container and separate the mercury and soil.🔽Pour half of the water into a container and add one khyor of a fine powder of the three fruits and Indian tea.

original: chu khog ma phyed tsam blug de la 'bras bu gsum dang rgya gar stod ja zhib par btags pa khyor gang tsam zhig blug / gong gi dngul chu ras gtsang mas dril la skud pas kha bsdams te @299b chur sor bzhi tsam ma reg par khebs gcod la
analyzed: chu khog ma phyed tsam blug de la 'bras bu gsum dang rgya gar stod ja zhib par btags pa khyor gang tsam zhig blug / gong gi dngul chu ras gtsang mas dril la skud pas kha bsdams te @299b chur sor bzhi tsam ma reg par khebs gcod la
translated: Wrap the mercury from above with a clean cloth, tie it with a string, and cover it with a lid that does not touch the water by four fingerbreadths.

original: btags te kha legs par bsgrigs nas rlangs pa mi 'chor ba byed /
analyzed: btags te kha legs par bsgrigs nas rlangs pa mi 'chor ba byed /
translated: After tying it well, make sure that the steam does not escape.

original: nyi ma'i bzhi cha gcig tsam me btang la rlangs pas btsos /
analyzed: nyi ma'i bzhi cha gcig tsam me btang la rlangs pas btsos /
translated: Heat it for one-fourth of a day and cook it with steam.🔽When the water is completely cold, remove it and pour it into a stone trough that has been washed well.

original: chu grang thag chod pa dang bton te rdo gzhong legs par bkrus pa'i nang du blugs la shing ghi wa kva ra'i shing gzhogs dang mnyam du nyin gsum gyi bar grib ma la brdung ba dang nyi ma la bsro ba chu tshod re tsam gyi bar re mos
analyzed: chu grang thag chod pa dang bton te rdo gzhong legs par bkrus pa'i nang du blugs la shing ghi wa kva ra'i shing gzhogs dang mnyam du nyin gsum gyi bar grib ma la brdung ba dang nyi ma la bsro ba chu tshod re tsam gyi bar re mos
translated: Beat it for three days in the shade with a stick of givaraka wood that is the same size as the trough, alternating between heating it in the sun for one watch.

original: su byed / de nas shing che la chang gar mas khu ba byas nas nyin gsum gyi bar la nyed cing /
analyzed: su byed / de nas shing che la chang gar mas khu ba byas nas nyin gsum gyi bar la nyed cing /
translated: Then, make a paste of the bark of the large tree and the juice of the fermented grain and let it dry for three days.🔽From then on, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.

original: 'di nas gzung nyin re re nyi mar 'jog thengs gnyis tsam las sngon ma lugs kyi re mos mi dgos /🔽de nas skyes pa'i chu dang ra'i 'o ma /🔽ba'i 'o ma /🔽ba sar pa'i chu rnams dang mnyam du rim pa bzhin nyin gsum re nyed /
analyzed: 'di nas gzung nyin re re nyi mar 'jog thengs gnyis tsam las sngon ma lugs kyi re mos mi dgos / de nas skyes pa'i chu dang ra'i 'o ma / ba'i 'o ma / ba sar pa'i chu rnams dang mnyam du rim pa bzhin nyin gsum re nyed /
translated: Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.

original: de nas nyi ma me tog gi lo ma logs su brdungs pa'i khu ba /🔽sgog skya rdzogs pa'i khu ba /🔽ba sar ba'i chu rnams dang mnyam du go rim bzhin nyin re nyed /
analyzed: de nas nyi ma me tog gi lo ma logs su brdungs pa'i khu ba / sgog skya rdzogs pa'i khu ba / ba sar ba'i chu rnams dang mnyam du go rim bzhin nyin re nyed /
translated: Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.

original: de nas mu zi ser po zho nyi shu rtsa bzhi zhib par btags /🔽lcags snod du ba mar sar pa bskol ba'i btsag chod pa dang btab la me cung zad btang nas ba'i 'o ma'i nang du dal bus blug la snyigs ma ma shor ba byed cing /
analyzed: de nas mu zi ser po zho nyi shu rtsa bzhi zhib par btags /🔽lcags snod du ba mar sar pa bskol ba'i btsag chod pa dang btab la me cung zad btang nas ba'i 'o ma'i nang du dal bus blug la snyigs ma ma shor ba byed cing /
translated: Then, let it be exposed to the sun for two sessions each day.🔽Then,

original: 'khang pa dang / mar dang 'o ma gnyis 'dres nas mu zi gting du 'khur ba ltar chags yong pa de dang gong gi dngul chu gnyis bsres nas cung zad nyed /
analyzed: 'khang pa dang / mar dang 'o ma gnyis 'dres nas mu zi gting du 'khur ba ltar chags yong pa de dang gong gi dngul chu gnyis bsres nas cung zad nyed /
translated: The two are mixed with the mercury and a little of the above sulfur and kneaded.

original: rdo gzhong zhig tu su ma la zho phyed bzhir ra'i 'o ma cung zad re blug nas nyed /
analyzed: rdo gzhong zhig tu su ma la zho phyed bzhir ra'i 'o ma cung zad re blug nas nyed /
translated: In a stone bowl, one part of the sumulaka and four parts of fresh butter are mixed and kneaded.

original: yang skam pa dang ldugs pa sogs nyin gsum gyi bar byed /
analyzed: yang skam pa dang ldugs pa sogs nyin gsum gyi bar byed /
translated: Also, one should dry and knead for three days.

original: ba sar pa'i chu dang 'o ma so sor rim bzhin nyid gsum re'i bar gong bzhin skam 'thag byas la tshar ba dang gong gi dngul chu dang mu zi'i zla la bsres /
analyzed: ba sar pa'i chu dang 'o ma so sor rim bzhin nyid gsum re'i bar gong bzhin skam 'thag byas la tshar ba dang gong gi dngul chu dang mu zi'i zla la bsres /
translated: The water and milk of the bhasmas are dried and kneaded separately for three days as before. When finished, mix with the above mercury and sulfur.

original: rdo gzhong nang du rgya tsha zho do skyes pa'i chu dang mnyam du skam 'thag gong bzhin nyin gsum gyi bar byas nas dngul chu'i zla la bsres pa de rnams rdo gzhong gi nang du nyin bdun gyi bar du skam nyed byed /
analyzed: rdo gzhong nang du rgya tsha zho do skyes pa'i chu dang mnyam du skam 'thag gong bzhin nyin gsum gyi bar byas nas dngul chu'i zla la bsres pa de rnams rdo gzhong gi nang du nyin bdun gyi bar du skam nyed byed /
translated: In a stone bowl, two parts of the bhasma of realgar are mixed with an equal amount of water and dried and kneaded as before for three days. When finished, mix with the above mercury. All of that is dried and kneaded in a stone bowl for seven days.

original: de nas bzhu @300a * //
analyzed: de nas bzhu @300a * //
translated: Then, melt the mercury.

original: shel gyi dam pe ras kyis dril la 'jim pa byugs /
analyzed: shel gyi dam pe ras kyis dril la 'jim pa byugs /
translated: Wrap the best quality glass with cloth and cover it with clay.🔽When it is dry, put it inside a clay pot with seven layers of cloth and clay, filling it two-thirds full.

original: de skams pa dang yang ras dang 'jim pa rim pa bdun gyi bar dril ba'i nang du gsum gnyis tsam gang ba blug / lcags kyi skya ba dam per bcug / rdza'i khog ma gting du bye ma sor gsum tsam gting pa'i steng du bzhag ste kha 'tshams🔽par bye mas stems /
analyzed: de skams pa dang yang ras dang 'jim pa rim pa bdun gyi bar dril ba'i nang du gsum gnyis tsam gang ba blug / lcags kyi skya ba dam per bcug / rdza'i khog ma gting du bye ma sor gsum tsam gting pa'i steng du bzhag ste kha 'tshams par bye mas stems /
translated: Place it in a clay pot with a three-finger-width layer of sand at the bottom, cover it, and tamp it down with sand.

original: dam pe'i nang du zha nye zho phyed do blug ste /
analyzed: dam pe'i nang du zha nye zho phyed do blug ste /
translated: Put half a pound of borax inside the glass.

original: lcags mdas dal bus dkrugs pa dang nyi shar nas nyi ma rgas tsam gyi bar me gtong /
analyzed: lcags mdas dal bus dkrugs pa dang nyi shar nas nyi ma rgas tsam gyi bar me gtong /
translated: Heat it slowly with an iron rod until sunrise and continue heating until sunset.

original: de nas lcags mda' bton la kha rgya tsha btags pa'i chus brdzis pa'i 'dam gyis bcad /
analyzed: de nas lcags mda' bton la kha rgya tsha btags pa'i chus brdzis pa'i 'dam gyis bcad /
translated: Then remove the iron rod and cover it with mud made from clay and water mixed with salt.

original: de steng bye ma bkab ste khebs rgyab la nyin zhag phrug gcig gi par me shin tu tsha ba mtshams ma chad par btang /
analyzed: de steng bye ma bkab ste khebs rgyab la nyin zhag phrug gcig gi par me shin tu tsha ba mtshams ma chad par btang /
translated: Cover it with sand and heat it with a very hot fire for a full day and night without interruption.

original: de nas bye ma grang thag ma chod ring tho ma btang bar bzhag / grang nges pa dang bton la dal bus dam pe bcag la phyung bas dngul chu dug bral lhad med du yod do /
analyzed: de nas bye ma grang thag ma chod ring tho ma btang bar bzhag / grang nges pa dang bton la dal bus dam pe bcag la phyung bas dngul chu dug bral lhad med du yod do /
translated: When it is cool, remove it and slowly break the egg. The mercury will be free of poison and impurities.

original: ` / yang lugs gcig la /🔽dngul chu zho do //
analyzed: ` / yang lugs gcig la / dngul chu zho do //
translated: Another method is as follows.🔽One prastha of mercury,

original: mu zi ser po zho do //
analyzed: mu zi ser po zho do //
translated: one prastha of yellow arsenic,

original: shing aa dha dza ri gsum /
analyzed: shing aa dha dza ri gsum /
translated: three of adhajarī wood,

original: na k'a tsa li tshom pa re /
analyzed: na k'a tsa li tshom pa re /
translated: one pala each of nakali and tsompa,

original: tu la pa'i khu ba rnams sgang lkogs nang du blugs /
analyzed: tu la pa'i khu ba rnams sgang lkogs nang du blugs /
translated: and the juice of tula are put into a pot.

original: 'jim pa sbyin pos kha legs par bcad /
analyzed: 'jim pa sbyin pos kha legs par bcad /
translated: The mouth is well closed with clay.🔽Then, wrap it in seven layers of cloth together with the clay, roll it as before, put sand into the pot, and heat it with the sand for half a day as before.

original: de nas ras bdun brtsegs par 'jim pa dang bcas gril lugs gong ltar byas la khog ma'i nang du bye ma blugs nas bye ma dang bcas me gtong lugs gong 'dra'i nyin zhag phyed kyi bar btang la grang ba dang bton te sgo nga dal bus bcags pas
analyzed: de nas ras bdun brtsegs par 'jim pa dang bcas gril lugs gong ltar byas la khog ma'i nang du bye ma blugs nas bye ma dang bcas me gtong lugs gong 'dra'i nyin zhag phyed kyi bar btang la grang ba dang bton te sgo nga dal bus bcags pas
translated: When it is cool, remove it and slowly break the egg.

original: dngul chu dug bral lhad med du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: dngul chu dug bral lhad med du 'byung ngo //
translated: The mercury will be free of poison and impurities.

original: yang lugs gcig la dngul chu zho bdun dang pi pi la'i shu na pa nyag gang bcas rdo gzhong du nyin bdun gyi bar du nyed /
analyzed: yang lugs gcig la dngul chu zho bdun dang pi pi la'i shu na pa nyag gang bcas rdo gzhong du nyin bdun gyi bar du nyed /
translated: Another method is to mix mercury with seven measures of curd and one measure of pippali and leave it in an earthen vessel for seven days.

original: bham ga re'i thang chu blug la slar yang nyin bdun nyed /
analyzed: bham ga re'i thang chu blug la slar yang nyin bdun nyed /
translated: Add the juice of Bengal quince and leave it for another seven days.

original: de nas rdza sa'i bar du skam thag legs par chod pa'i nang du li shi zho do dang bcas blug la kha legs par bcad bar du (pi pi ling) 'jim pa blug pa'i ras rim pa gsum gyis dril /
analyzed: de nas rdza sa'i bar du skam thag legs par chod pa'i nang du li shi zho do dang bcas blug la kha legs par bcad bar du (pi pi ling) 'jim pa blug pa'i ras rim pa gsum gyis dril /
translated: Then, in a well-dried earthen pot, add two measures of curd and pippali and seal the mouth well. Wrap the pot in three layers of cloth.

original: khog ma bye mas brgyangs @300b par kha bcad de me gtong lugs sogs gong bzhin nyin zhag phrugs gcig gi bar byas te grang ba dang bton pas kyang dug bral lhad med du 'byung /🔽zha nye dkar po /
analyzed: khog ma bye mas brgyangs @300b par kha bcad de me gtong lugs sogs gong bzhin nyin zhag phrugs gcig gi bar byas te grang ba dang bton pas kyang dug bral lhad med du 'byung / zha nye dkar po /
translated: Fill the space between the pot and the cloth with sand, seal the mouth, and heat it as before for one day and night. When it cools, remove the pot. In this way, the mercury becomes free of poison and impurities.🔽White mica

original: zha nye nag po /
analyzed: zha nye nag po /
translated: Black mica

original: gsha' tshe gsum mang nyung ji ltar byed kyang cha bsnyams la khog ma'i nang du blug / de la me btang ste zhu ba dang snod gzhan zhig tu ba mar sar pa btsags legs par bcad /
analyzed: gsha' tshe gsum mang nyung ji ltar byed kyang cha bsnyams la khog ma'i nang du blug / de la me btang ste zhu ba dang snod gzhan zhig tu ba mar sar pa btsags legs par bcad /
translated: Light a fire under it and when it melts, strain the ghee into another container.🔽Then, with a small iron ladle, add a little ghee (or butter) and stir (this is also called “twenty-four times”).

original: de nas lcags skyogs chung ngu zhig gis mar (rangka) nyung zad re blug la (nyi shu kha sarba lha ti tsha yang zer/) dkrug / mar blug pa'i du ba yal ba dang yang mar blugs pa sogs lan bdun gyi bar byas /
analyzed: de nas lcags skyogs chung ngu zhig gis mar (rangka) nyung zad re blug la (nyi shu kha sarba lha ti tsha yang zer/) dkrug / mar blug pa'i du ba yal ba dang yang mar blugs pa sogs lan bdun gyi bar byas /
translated: When the smoke from the added ghee has disappeared, add more ghee and so on, doing this seven times.

original: de nas bh'a ta'i lo ma dang dhu ti gnyis cha mnyam zhib par btags pa'i phye ma gsha' dkar sogs mi mngon par 'debs shing dkrugs /
analyzed: de nas bh'a ta'i lo ma dang dhu ti gnyis cha mnyam zhib par btags pa'i phye ma gsha' dkar sogs mi mngon par 'debs shing dkrugs /
translated: Then add an equal amount of finely ground bhat and dhuti leaves and stir.

original: de nas kha bcad la nyi ma'i bzhi cha tsam gyi bar la me shin tu che ba btang /
analyzed: de nas kha bcad la nyi ma'i bzhi cha tsam gyi bar la me shin tu che ba btang /
translated: Then cover it and light a very hot fire for about a quarter of the day.

original: de nas me thag bcad de grang ba dang bton la /
analyzed: de nas me thag bcad de grang ba dang bton la /
translated: Then put out the fire and let it cool.

original: se ba bzhi nas phyed gsum gyi bar nad babs lci yang dang bstun te btang bas rlung mkhris bad kan gsum ka la phan zhing n'a ga ra sa ste de dang ka ra bsres nas zos na dang sa ma 'dzag pa la mchog tu phan /
analyzed: se ba bzhi nas phyed gsum gyi bar nad babs lci yang dang bstun te btang bas rlung mkhris bad kan gsum ka la phan zhing n'a ga ra sa ste de dang ka ra bsres nas zos na dang sa ma 'dzag pa la mchog tu phan /
translated: The dosage is one-fourth to one-and-a-half sewas according to the severity of the disorder. This compound is beneficial for all three humors. If mixed with sugar and nagara, it is most beneficial for the non-elimination of phlegm.

original: aa ru ra bsnan nas btang na mgo bo na ba la phan no //
analyzed: aa ru ra bsnan nas btang na mgo bo na ba la phan no //
translated: If taken with arura, it is beneficial for headaches.

original: rdza'i bar bu'i nang du zha nye dkar po nyag gang blug / de la me btang nas zhu ba dang dngul chu nyag phyed blugs la me mtshams ma bcad par gtong zhing skya bas dkrug pa dang mnyam dub bla btags pa nyag phyed rim bzhin btab ste gsum
analyzed: rdza'i bar bu'i nang du zha nye dkar po nyag gang blug / de la me btang nas zhu ba dang dngul chu nyag phyed blugs la me mtshams ma bcad par gtong zhing skya bas dkrug pa dang mnyam dub bla btags pa nyag phyed rim bzhin btab ste gsum
translated: Put one nyagpa of white lead in a clay pot, heat it, and when it melts, add half a nyagpa of mercury. Heat it without interruption, stirring with a ladle, and add one-third of a nyagpa of borax in stages.

original: ga legs par 'dres pa dang par bu'i kha bcad rlung mi 'chor bar bya /
analyzed: ga legs par 'dres pa dang par bu'i kha bcad rlung mi 'chor bar bya /
translated: When the three ingredients are well mixed, cover the pot and seal it so that no air can enter.

original: de nas ras dang rdzas khrag gang rigs kyis brdzis pa'i 'jim pa byugs shing yang ras dkri ba sogs rim pa sum brtsegs su byas /
analyzed: de nas ras dang rdzas khrag gang rigs kyis brdzis pa'i 'jim pa byugs shing yang ras dkri ba sogs rim pa sum brtsegs su byas /
translated: Then, apply a layer of clay mixed with cloth and blood, and wrap it in cloth. Repeat this process three times.

original: de skams pa dang nyin zhag lnga me mtshams ma chad par btang /
analyzed: de skams pa dang nyin zhag lnga me mtshams ma chad par btang /
translated: When it is dry, burn it for five days and nights without interruption.

original: de nas grang thag chod pa dang bton /🔽ba'i zho ras la btsags te khu ba legs par bton pas brdzis pa srab 'thug sor gang tsam yod pa'i sgor mor btang la ras kyis bdun brtsegs @301a * //
analyzed: de nas grang thag chod pa dang bton / ba'i zho ras la btsags te khu ba legs par bton pas brdzis pa srab 'thug sor gang tsam yod pa'i sgor mor btang la ras kyis bdun brtsegs @301a * //
translated: Then, when it is completely cold, remove it.🔽Strain the yogurt whey through a cloth and remove the liquid well. Roll it into a round shape with a thickness of one finger joint.🔽Wrap it in seven layers of cloth, tie it with a string, and place it in the middle of the fire of urine. Leave it for the time it takes to burn the cloth.

original: tsam dril nas skud pas bsdams te gci ba'i me'i dkyil du bcug la ras tshig tsam gyi tshod bzhag / de nas grang thag chod pa dang bton la phye mar nyes pa dang zhos khu ba byas nas brdzis te bsreg pa sogs gong ltar lan nyi shu'i bar
analyzed: tsam dril nas skud pas bsdams te gci ba'i me'i dkyil du bcug la ras tshig tsam gyi tshod bzhag / de nas grang thag chod pa dang bton la phye mar nyes pa dang zhos khu ba byas nas brdzis te bsreg pa sogs gong ltar lan nyi shu'i bar
translated: Then, when it is completely cold, remove it. Grind it into powder with the whey. Roll it as before and burn it.

original: byas pa ni bangge shva ra zer te stobs bskyed dang / nad tsha grang gsar rnying thams cad la phan zhing /
analyzed: byas pa ni bangge shva ra zer te stobs bskyed dang / nad tsha grang gsar rnying thams cad la phan zhing /
translated: Do this twenty times. This is called “cow dung” and it increases strength and is beneficial for all new and old hot and cold illnesses.

original: nad gzhi che ba la gtong na thun tshad sran ma tsam dang / gzhi chung ba dang nad med la 'bras nyis 'gyur tsam re gtong ngo //
analyzed: nad gzhi che ba la gtong na thun tshad sran ma tsam dang / gzhi chung ba dang nad med la 'bras nyis 'gyur tsam re gtong ngo //
translated: If it is to be given to someone with a serious illness, the dose should be the size of a pea; if to someone with a minor illness or no illness, the dose should be the size of two peas.

original: 'di'i phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab po ;
analyzed: 'di'i phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab po ;
translated: The benefits of this are inconceivable.

original: ; zangs mang nyung ci 'dod pa sbrang gshog legs par brdungs /
analyzed: ; zangs mang nyung ci 'dod pa sbrang gshog legs par brdungs /
translated: Take as much copper as desired and beat it well with a bee wing.

original: rdza snod kyi nang du ba'i gcin la chu cung zad bsres par kha ri lu na dang mnyam du btab la nyin phyed kyi bar du me btang la btsos /🔽de nas bton la snod bkrus pa'i nang du slar yang (dambha) aambam li'i 'bru chur btab pa'i nang du nyin phyed 'tshed /
analyzed: rdza snod kyi nang du ba'i gcin la chu cung zad bsres par kha ri lu na dang mnyam du btab la nyin phyed kyi bar du me btang la btsos / de nas bton la snod bkrus pa'i nang du slar yang (dambha) aambam li'i 'bru chur btab pa'i nang du nyin phyed 'tshed /
translated: Put it in a clay pot with a little water mixed with cow urine and cook it over a fire for half a day.🔽Then remove it and again cook it for half a day in a pot that has been washed and filled with the water in which the fruit of amba has been boiled.

original: de nas chu de phol snod bkrus te skyu ru ra chur btab pa'i nang du nyin phyed 'tshed /
analyzed: de nas chu de phol snod bkrus te skyu ru ra chur btab pa'i nang du nyin phyed 'tshed /
translated: Then cook it for half a day in a pot that has been washed and filled with the water in which āmalaka has been boiled.

original: de nas ba'i dar bar kha ri lu na btab pa'i nang du zhag bdun gyi bar du 'jog cing 'di skabs me gtong mi dgos /
analyzed: de nas ba'i dar bar kha ri lu na btab pa'i nang du zhag bdun gyi bar du 'jog cing 'di skabs me gtong mi dgos /
translated: Then place it for seven days in a pot that has been washed and filled with the water in which cow’s milk and cow’s urine have been boiled. At this point, it is not necessary to cook it over a fire.

original: de nas zangs gshog ston la legs par bkrus te mu zi ser po dang cha mnyam bteg pa phye mar byas la rdza'i par bu'i nang du mu zi bting /
analyzed: de nas zangs gshog ston la legs par bkrus te mu zi ser po dang cha mnyam bteg pa phye mar byas la rdza'i par bu'i nang du mu zi bting /
translated: Then, wash the copper wings well and mix them with an equal amount of yellow bitumen. Grind them into powder and spread the bitumen in a porcelain bowl.

original: de steng zangs gshog gcig bzhag / yang mu zi bting /
analyzed: de steng zangs gshog gcig bzhag / yang mu zi bting /
translated: Place one copper wing on top of that, and again spread bitumen.

original: de steng zangs gshog 'jog pa sogs kyi zangs gshog grangs du yod par brtsegs la kha 'grig par bcad de rlung mi 'chor bar byas /
analyzed: de steng zangs gshog 'jog pa sogs kyi zangs gshog grangs du yod par brtsegs la kha 'grig par bcad de rlung mi 'chor bar byas /
translated: In this way, stack the copper wings, however many there are, and seal them so that air cannot enter.

original: de ras gyis gtums shing 'jim pas 'byug pa sogs sum rim tsam byas la slar yang phyi 'jim pas legs par gtums la skam thag chod pa dang / de nas sa dong brus par gci ba'i me'i nang du nyin gcig gi bar du bsregs /
analyzed: de ras gyis gtums shing 'jim pas 'byug pa sogs sum rim tsam byas la slar yang phyi 'jim pas legs par gtums la skam thag chod pa dang / de nas sa dong brus par gci ba'i me'i nang du nyin gcig gi bar du bsregs /
translated: Wrap them in cloth and cover them with three layers of clay. Again, cover them well with clay outside and let them dry completely. Then, bury them in a pit and burn them in the fire of human feces for one day.

original: thal ba grang thag chod pa dang bton la rdo gzhong gi nang du nyes nas phye mar byas la thun sran ma bzhi tsam gyi tshod re btang bas grang ba'i rigs dang / rlung /
analyzed: thal ba grang thag chod pa dang bton la rdo gzhong gi nang du nyes nas phye mar byas la thun sran ma bzhi tsam gyi tshod re btang bas grang ba'i rigs dang / rlung /
translated: When the ashes have cooled, take them out and grind them in a stone mortar. Take four measures of this powder, the size of a Tibetan ounce of peas, and mix it with the same amount of the three sweets.

original: bad rlung / dang kha 'byed pa /
analyzed: bad rlung / dang kha 'byed pa /
translated: It is beneficial for the treatment of baekan and loong disorders,

original: @301b lus stobs bskyed pa /
analyzed: @301b lus stobs bskyed pa /
translated: and for increasing physical strength.

original: rked pa na ba rnams la phan /🔽yang sho mo sa zho gang phye mar btags pa dang gong gi zangs thal se ba bzhi bsres pa thun re byas btang bas yan lag zha 'khums la mchog tu pan no //
analyzed: rked pa na ba rnams la phan / yang sho mo sa zho gang phye mar btags pa dang gong gi zangs thal se ba bzhi bsres pa thun re byas btang bas yan lag zha 'khums la mchog tu pan no //
translated: It is also beneficial for the treatment of back pain.

original: su ma gser zho do dang sa ba brgyad la sbrang gshog 'than /🔽mtshal se ba bco lnga dang bil ba'i nang gi 'bru (mi thi) gnyis zhib par btags par chu cung zad kyang blug pa'i skyo ma gser shog la byugs /
analyzed: su ma gser zho do dang sa ba brgyad la sbrang gshog 'than / mtshal se ba bco lnga dang bil ba'i nang gi 'bru (mi thi) gnyis zhib par btags par chu cung zad kyang blug pa'i skyo ma gser shog la byugs /
translated: Alternatively, administer a mixture of one sho of roasted barley flour, one sho of roasted wheat flour, and four se of copper ash in each dose. This is highly beneficial for the treatment of lameness and paralysis.🔽Mix two zho of Sumnag, eight sa of Sawo, and fifteen se of Tsha la with the inner pulp of two Bilwa fruits.🔽Apply the paste on a gold leaf without adding any water.🔽Roll the gold leaf and insert it into the Bilwa fruit.

original: de nas gser shog sgril la bil ba'i nang du bcug (kho da yon sog gser) kha legs par bcad de ras kyis dril la 'jim bsor phyed tsam byugs /
analyzed: de nas gser shog sgril la bil ba'i nang du bcug (kho da yon sog gser) kha legs par bcad de ras kyis dril la 'jim bsor phyed tsam byugs /
translated: Seal the opening of the fruit and wrap it with a piece of cloth.

original: skam thag chod pa dang sa dong brus par gci ba'i me nang du nyin gcig bsregs la grang thag chod pa dang bton te phye mar byas la 'bras nyis 'gyur tsam gyi tshad lga ser dang mnyam du zos na glo nad dang dbugs mi bde ba g-yal ba🔽rnams la phan zhing skyug pa chod /🔽ba'i gci ba'i thal ba dang mnyam du zos na dang kha dang skom nad la phan /
analyzed: skam thag chod pa dang sa dong brus par gci ba'i me nang du nyin gcig bsregs la grang thag chod pa dang bton te phye mar byas la 'bras nyis 'gyur tsam gyi tshad lga ser dang mnyam du zos na glo nad dang dbugs mi bde ba g-yal ba rnams la phan zhing skyug pa chod / ba'i gci ba'i thal ba dang mnyam du zos na dang kha dang skom nad la phan /
translated: If one eats it with the amount of double the amount of rice and equal to the amount of turmeric, it will benefit all types of cough and asthma.🔽If one eats it with the amount of double the amount of rice and equal to the amount of turmeric, it will benefit all types of cough and asthma.🔽If one eats it with the amount of double the amount of rice and equal to the amount of turmeric, it will benefit all types of cough and asthma.🔽If one eats it with the amount of double the amount of rice and equal to the amount of turmeric, it will benefit all types of cough and asthma.🔽If one eats it with the amount of double the amount of rice and equal to the amount of turmeric, it will benefit all types of cough and asthma.🔽If one eats it with the amount of double the amount of rice and equal to the amount of turmeric, it will benefit all types of cough and asthma.🔽If one eats it with the amount of double the amount of rice and equal to the amount of turmeric, it will benefit all types of cough and asthma.🔽If one eats it with the amount of double the amount of rice and equal to the amount of turmeric, it will benefit all types of cough and asthma.🔽If one eats it with the amount of double the amount of rice and equal to the amount of turmeric, it will benefit all types of cough and asthma.

original: lga dang mnyam du btang na skran /🔽shu ba'am khyi rdo /🔽pho srin / rlung skran rnams rtsa ba nas 'byin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lga dang mnyam du btang na skran / shu ba'am khyi rdo / pho srin / rlung skran rnams rtsa ba nas 'byin par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one eats it with the amount of double the amount of rice and equal to the amount of turmeric, it will benefit all types of cough and asthma.

original: lcags phye nyag gang la dngul chu nyag phyed bsres te zhib par nyes /🔽chu la shing gi wa kva ra'i khu ba blugs nas gar sla zho tsam byas la /
analyzed: lcags phye nyag gang la dngul chu nyag phyed bsres te zhib par nyes /🔽chu la shing gi wa kva ra'i khu ba blugs nas gar sla zho tsam byas la /
translated: If one eats it with the amount of double the amount of rice and equal to the amount of turmeric, it will benefit all

original: rdo gzhong nang du nyi mar nyed cing skams pa dang khu ba gar sla sogs gong ltar byas pa lan brgya dang brgyad kyi bar byed /
analyzed: rdo gzhong nang du nyi mar nyed cing skams pa dang khu ba gar sla sogs gong ltar byas pa lan brgya dang brgyad kyi bar byed /
translated: The mixture is heated in the sun in a stone basin until it is dry and the liquid has evaporated. This is done one hundred and eight times.

original: de nas rdza'i par (lu ta) bu'i nang du blug / kha rlung mi 'tshor bar legs par bcad /🔽de nas 'jim pa dang ras spel mar lan bdun gyi bar sgril bskam thag chod pa dang rdza'i khog ma che ba mthil du bug pa rgya khab kyi rtse tshud pa tsam yod pa zhig bye mas brdzangs pa'i dkyil du bcug / kha legs par bsgrigs te rlung
analyzed: de nas rdza'i par (lu ta) bu'i nang du blug / kha rlung mi 'tshor bar legs par bcad / de nas 'jim pa dang ras spel mar lan bdun gyi bar sgril bskam thag chod pa dang rdza'i khog ma che ba mthil du bug pa rgya khab kyi rtse tshud pa tsam yod pa zhig bye mas brdzangs pa'i dkyil du bcug / kha legs par bsgrigs te rlung
translated: The mixture is then put into a clay pot, the mouth of which is tightly closed so that no air can enter.

original: sogs ye mi 'tshor ba byas te nyin zhag bzhi'i ring me shin tu tsha ba mtshams ma chad pa gtong /
analyzed: sogs ye mi 'tshor ba byas te nyin zhag bzhi'i ring me shin tu tsha ba mtshams ma chad pa gtong /
translated: The mixture is then wrapped in a cloth and clay seven times. When it is completely dry, it is placed in the middle of a large clay pot with a hole in the bottom just big enough for a needle to pass through. The pot is filled with sand, the mouth is tightly closed, and the pot is heated for four days with a very hot fire that is not allowed to go out.

original: 'di skabs las byed mi ma gtogs 'grul gcod /
analyzed: 'di skabs las byed mi ma gtogs 'grul gcod /
translated: During this time, no one is allowed to enter the room except the workers.

original: de nas grang thag chod pa dang bton la thun tshad 'bras tsam re bya /
analyzed: de nas grang thag chod pa dang bton la thun tshad 'bras tsam re bya /
translated: When the mixture is completely cold, it is removed and taken in doses the size of a grain of rice.

original: 'di ni spyi 'joms chen mo ste /
analyzed: 'di ni spyi 'joms chen mo ste /
translated: This is the great general method.

original: rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa rims sogs nad gsar @302a * //
analyzed: rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa rims sogs nad gsar @302a * //
translated: Wind, bile, phlegm, and their combinations, as well as infectious diseases and so on,🔽

original: rnying gang dang gang la yang 'dis mi phan pa med pas sman thams cad kyi rgyal po lta bu'o //
analyzed: rnying gang dang gang la yang 'dis mi phan pa med pas sman thams cad kyi rgyal po lta bu'o //
translated: This is the king of all medicines, for there is no illness—new or chronic, hot or cold, or a combination of these—that it cannot cure, including contagious disorders.

original: zha nye nag po nyag phyed lcags snod kyi nang du bzhu /
analyzed: zha nye nag po nyag phyed lcags snod kyi nang du bzhu /
translated: Place half an ounce of black lead in an iron container and melt it.

original: sa ser zhib par btags pa'i nang du blug / yang bton la bzhu ba sogs lan nyer gcig gi bar byed /
analyzed: sa ser zhib par btags pa'i nang du blug / yang bton la bzhu ba sogs lan nyer gcig gi bar byed /
translated: Place it in a container with fine yellow earth, and then remove it and melt it again. Repeat this process twenty-one times.

original: ldong ros dang tsha la nyag re bsres la zhib par btags /🔽rdza snod du zha nye blug la me btang ste zhu ba dang gong gi tsha la ldong ros bsres pa'i phye ma cung zad re 'debs pa dang mnyam du skya bas dkrugs /
analyzed: ldong ros dang tsha la nyag re bsres la zhib par btags / rdza snod du zha nye blug la me btang ste zhu ba dang gong gi tsha la ldong ros bsres pa'i phye ma cung zad re 'debs pa dang mnyam du skya bas dkrugs /
translated: Mix one part each of red arsenic and salt with the lead and grind them together.🔽Place the lead in a clay container and heat it until it melts. Add a small amount of the ground salt and red arsenic and stir with a ladle.

original: legs par 'dres nas thal bar song ba dang shing gi wa na (ma si la) kra ra'i khu (so h'a ) ba blug ste skya bas dkrug cing nyin phyed kyi bar me btang /
analyzed: legs par 'dres nas thal bar song ba dang shing gi wa na (ma si la) kra ra'i khu (so h'a ) ba blug ste skya bas dkrug cing nyin phyed kyi bar me btang /
translated: When the mixture is well combined and has become ash, add the juice of the wood-apple tree and stir with a ladle. Heat it for half a day.

original: thal bar song ba dang kha legs par bcad la nyin mtshan lnga dang nyi ma'i bzhi cha gcig gi bar me btang /
analyzed: thal bar song ba dang kha legs par bcad la nyin mtshan lnga dang nyi ma'i bzhi cha gcig gi bar me btang /
translated: When it has become ash, cover the mouth and leave it in the fire for five days and nights or one quarter of a day.

original: de nas grang ba dang bton la thun tshad sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam sbrang rtsi dang mnyam du btang na rlung gi nad gsar rnying thams cad la phan /
analyzed: de nas grang ba dang bton la thun tshad sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam sbrang rtsi dang mnyam du btang na rlung gi nad gsar rnying thams cad la phan /
translated: Then, when it is cold, remove it and take a dose the size of two peas together with honey. This will help all new and old types of wind disorders.

original: ka ra dang mnyam du btang na khrag gi rigs la phan /
analyzed: ka ra dang mnyam du btang na khrag gi rigs la phan /
translated: If taken together with sugar, it will help blood disorders.

original: lga dang mnyam du btang na bad kan gyi rigs dang ma 'ju ba sogs pho ba'i nad la phan /🔽aa ru ra'i phye ma dang mnyam du btang na mkhris pa'i rigs la phan /
analyzed: lga dang mnyam du btang na bad kan gyi rigs dang ma 'ju ba sogs pho ba'i nad la phan / aa ru ra'i phye ma dang mnyam du btang na mkhris pa'i rigs la phan /
translated: If taken together with red ochre, it will help phlegm disorders, indigestion, and so forth, and stomach disorders.🔽If taken together with powdered myrobalan, it will help bile disorders.

original: pi pi ling dang mnyam du btang na dang kha 'byed /🔽khrag dang rlung la brten nas dangs ma 'dzag na bu ram rnying pa dang mnyam du btang /
analyzed: pi pi ling dang mnyam du btang na dang kha 'byed / khrag dang rlung la brten nas dangs ma 'dzag na bu ram rnying pa dang mnyam du btang /
translated: If taken together with long pepper, it will help to open the mouth.🔽If the refined elements leak due to blood and wind, take it together with old molasses.

original: mkhris pa la brten nas 'dzag na aa ngu ra dang mnyam du btang /
analyzed: mkhris pa la brten nas 'dzag na aa ngu ra dang mnyam du btang /
translated: If it leaks due to bile, take it together with sugar.

original: ba mar gsar pa dang mnyam du zos na stobs skyed par byed /
analyzed: ba mar gsar pa dang mnyam du zos na stobs skyed par byed /
translated: When taken with fresh butter, it increases strength.

original: gcong gis zin pa'i nad lus shin tu rid na gur gum dang mnyam du gtong zhing gzhan yang nad tshod dang bstun te kha bsgyur byas te btang bas kun la phan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gcong gis zin pa'i nad lus shin tu rid na gur gum dang mnyam du gtong zhing gzhan yang nad tshod dang bstun te kha bsgyur byas te btang bas kun la phan par 'gyur ro //
translated: When taken with saffron, it is beneficial for emaciation due to chronic disorders. It is beneficial for all when taken in accordance with the condition of the disease.

original: ti tsha'am gsha' tshe nya ga gang rdza snod du bzhu la pa ra ki ri nyag phyed dang / so ra nyag phyed bsres te zhib par btags pa'i phye ma cung zad re 'debs /
analyzed: ti tsha'am gsha' tshe nya ga gang rdza snod du bzhu la pa ra ki ri nyag phyed dang / so ra nyag phyed bsres te zhib par btags pa'i phye ma cung zad re 'debs /
translated: Melt one sang of ti tsä or sha tsha in a clay pot, add half a nyak of parakiri and half a nyak of sora, and grind it into a fine powder.

original: shing lcags kyi gzar bu chung ngu'i ltag pas nyed cing dkrug nyin phyed kyi bar byas pas 'dres te thal bar so nga ba dang khed sa rgyab la nye ma'i bzhi cha gcig me btang /
analyzed: shing lcags kyi gzar bu chung ngu'i ltag pas nyed cing dkrug nyin phyed kyi bar byas pas 'dres te thal bar so nga ba dang khed sa rgyab la nye ma'i bzhi cha gcig me btang /
translated: Stir it with the back of a small wooden or metal ladle until it is mixed and becomes ash. Then, add one-fourth of the ash to the ghee and heat it.

original: grang thag chod pa dang bton la (ze tsha) phye mar byas te dar la btsags /
analyzed: grang thag chod pa dang bton la (ze tsha) phye mar byas te dar la btsags /
translated: When it is well mixed, remove it from the heat, grind it into a fine powder, and strain it through a cloth.

original: de nas phye ma de @302b dang / li shi / dz'a ti gsum se ba re /
analyzed: de nas phye ma de @302b dang / li shi / dz'a ti gsum se ba re /
translated: Then, mix one part of this powder with one part each of li shi and jati.

original: po ris / lga /
analyzed: po ris / lga /
translated: The three myrobalan fruits,

original: pi pi ling gsum se ba gsum re rnams zhib par btags /
analyzed: pi pi ling gsum se ba gsum re rnams zhib par btags /
translated: and the three types of ginger are finely ground.

original: sbrang rtsis rta byas la ril bu sran mnyis 'gyur tsam sgril la ril bu re btang bas byis pa 'khru ba'i nad dang 'cham pa la phan zhing gnyid ma khug par btang bas kyang (la wam ga) gnyid (dza yi pla ) du 'gro //
analyzed: sbrang rtsis rta byas la ril bu sran mnyis 'gyur tsam sgril la ril bu re btang bas byis pa 'khru ba'i nad dang 'cham pa la phan zhing gnyid ma khug par btang bas kyang (la wam ga) gnyid (dza yi pla ) du 'gro //
translated: Make a pill the size of two peas with honey as the binder. By giving one pill, it benefits the child's illness of diarrhea and vomiting. By giving it when the child is not sleeping, it will also cause sleep.

original: aa (mari  tse shunthi bi pa wi) rur dang bsres nas btang na dbugs mi bde ba la phan /
analyzed: aa (mari  tse shunthi bi pa wi) rur dang bsres nas btang na dbugs mi bde ba la phan /
translated: If mixed with arura and given, it benefits asthma.

original: mgo bo na na ril bu chur brdar la sna bug tu blug pas phan par 'gyur /
analyzed: mgo bo na na ril bu chur brdar la sna bug tu blug pas phan par 'gyur /
translated: If the pill is rubbed on water and put in the nostrils when the head hurts, it will be beneficial.

original: ga bur dang bsres nas btang na kha'i dri ngan pa rtsa ba nas 'byin /🔽zho dang mnyam du btang na skran thon /
analyzed: ga bur dang bsres nas btang na kha'i dri ngan pa rtsa ba nas 'byin / zho dang mnyam du btang na skran thon /
translated: If mixed with camphor and given, it will completely remove bad breath.🔽If given together with curd, it will expel tumors.

original: kha ru tsha dang mnyam du btang na ma 'ju ba'i nad sel lo //
analyzed: kha ru tsha dang mnyam du btang na ma 'ju ba'i nad sel lo //
translated: If given together with rock salt, it will cure indigestion.

original: zangs mang nyung gar byed kyang sbrang gshog legs par 'then la jem rtsis chung ngur gtubs pa dang mu zi ser po zangs che chung gang yin gyi phyed mar gtang ba dam pe'i khog par blug la skyu ru ra dang nem bu'i chu blug la kha legs par🔽bcad de nas kyi dkyil du zla ba gcig bzhag / de nas bton la phye mar byas te thun tshad se ba bzhi'i rtsis chu grang gis 'phul la btang na dug dang mkhris pa'i nad 'phral du skyugs nas phan zhing srin nad la btang na yang 'khru skyug
analyzed: zangs mang nyung gar byed kyang sbrang gshog legs par 'then la jem rtsis chung ngur gtubs pa dang mu zi ser po zangs che chung gang yin gyi phyed mar gtang ba dam pe'i khog par blug la skyu ru ra dang nem bu'i chu blug la kha legs par bcad de nas kyi dkyil du zla ba gcig bzhag / de nas bton la phye mar byas te thun tshad se ba bzhi'i rtsis chu grang gis 'phul la btang na dug dang mkhris pa'i nad 'phral du skyugs nas phan zhing srin nad la btang na yang 'khru skyug
translated: Regardless of the amount of copper used, finely chop the wings of a bee after properly removing the feathers, and half the amount of yellow arsenic of the amount of copper.🔽Place it in the stomach of a dampa, seal the mouth well, pour in the water of sour plums and nembu, and place it in the middle of barley for one month.

original: yong la / gzhan yang skyugs kyis phan pa'i nad gang la 'ang btang bas skyug sman gyi mchog go / kha parsa dha nyag phyed pa rdar ba'i phye ma dang / mu zi ser po nyag phyed /
analyzed: yong la / gzhan yang skyugs kyis phan pa'i nad gang la 'ang btang bas skyug sman gyi mchog go / kha parsa dha nyag phyed pa rdar ba'i phye ma dang / mu zi ser po nyag phyed /
translated: Then, take it out, make it into a powder, and if one takes it with cold water in a dose of four se, it will immediately vomit out poisons and bile disorders, and if given to a contagious disease, it will also cause diarrhea and vomiting.🔽It is the best emetic medicine for any condition that benefits from vomiting.

original: dngul chu spor gang gsum rdo gzhong du nyi ma'i bzhi cha gcig gi ring zhib par nyes la gi wa kva ra'i khu bas gar sla zho tsam byas pa nyi ma dang grib ma phyed khyer du nyes /
analyzed: dngul chu spor gang gsum rdo gzhong du nyi ma'i bzhi cha gcig gi ring zhib par nyes la gi wa kva ra'i khu bas gar sla zho tsam byas pa nyi ma dang grib ma phyed khyer du nyes /
translated: It is pounded in the shade and sun alternately.

original: skam thag chod pa dang slar yang khu ba lugs (ti tsha'am gsha' tshe/) pa sogs nyin bcu gsum gyi bar byed /
analyzed: skam thag chod pa dang slar yang khu ba lugs (ti tsha'am gsha' tshe/) pa sogs nyin bcu gsum gyi bar byed /
translated: When it is dry, it is pounded again for thirteen days.

original: bzhu shel gyi dam per ras dang 'jim pa spel mar byugs pa bdun brtsegs byas pa skam thag chod pa dang blug la kha rdzas sbyin po mgar ba'i so rdog / aar ka / bu ram /
analyzed: bzhu shel gyi dam per ras dang 'jim pa spel mar byugs pa bdun brtsegs byas pa skam thag chod pa dang blug la kha rdzas sbyin po mgar ba'i so rdog / aar ka / bu ram /
translated: A good crucible is made by layering seven times cloth and clay mixed together. When it is dry, it is filled with the following: a piece of blacksmith’s bellows, arka, molasses,

original: rgya gar stod ja rnams cha mnyam pa zhib par btags pa ba'i 'o mas brdzis la 'dam btags nyin gcig byas pa'i 'jim pas dam pe'i kha shin tu dam par bkag / de ras kyis gtums la gong gi 'jim pas dam pe yongs @303a * //
analyzed: rgya gar stod ja rnams cha mnyam pa zhib par btags pa ba'i 'o mas brdzis la 'dam btags nyin gcig byas pa'i 'jim pas dam pe'i kha shin tu dam par bkag / de ras kyis gtums la gong gi 'jim pas dam pe yongs @303a * //
translated: and Indian tea. These are pounded together and mixed with cow’s milk. The mouth of the crucible is sealed very tightly with clay from the first day’s pounding.🔽It is wrapped in cloth and the whole thing is sealed with the clay from the first day’s pounding.

original: rdzogs la 'byug / de skam pa dang khog ma che ba zhig gi nang phye ma'i dkyil du bcug la kha legs par bcad de nyin zhag bzhi'i bar me mtshams ma chad par btang /
analyzed: rdzogs la 'byug / de skam pa dang khog ma che ba zhig gi nang phye ma'i dkyil du bcug la kha legs par bcad de nyin zhag bzhi'i bar me mtshams ma chad par btang /
translated: Apply this to the affected area and let it dry. Then, place it in the middle of a small bag made of coarse cloth, tie the mouth of the bag tightly, and place it in a fire for four days without interruption.

original: de nas grang ba dang bton la nad babs che na sran ma gcig tsam nas nad med la 'bras nyis 'gyur gyi bar 'os 'gab btang bas nad ngos zin ma zin gsar rnying gang la yang phan zhing /
analyzed: de nas grang ba dang bton la nad babs che na sran ma gcig tsam nas nad med la 'bras nyis 'gyur gyi bar 'os 'gab btang bas nad ngos zin ma zin gsar rnying gang la yang phan zhing /
translated: Then, when it is cool, take out the bag and consume one bean-sized amount of the powder if the disease is severe and double the amount if the disease is mild. This will benefit both recognized and unrecognized diseases, whether acute or chronic.

original: nad med kyis zos na rgas kha sra ba dang stobs bskyed pa la sogs pa phan yon bsam mi khyab bo //
analyzed: nad med kyis zos na rgas kha sra ba dang stobs bskyed pa la sogs pa phan yon bsam mi khyab bo //
translated: If consumed by healthy individuals, it will strengthen the body, improve the complexion, and so forth. The benefits are inconceivable.

original: zha nye dkar po nyag gang lugs kong du bzhu la legs par bzhu ba dang snum gyi dkyil du blug / de 'khang ba dang yang bzhu blug gong ltar lan gsum gyi bar du byed /
analyzed: zha nye dkar po nyag gang lugs kong du bzhu la legs par bzhu ba dang snum gyi dkyil du blug / de 'khang ba dang yang bzhu blug gong ltar lan gsum gyi bar du byed /
translated: Melt one tola of white lead in a copper pot. When it has melted well, pour it into the middle of the oil. When it has solidified, melt it again and pour it as before. Repeat this three times.

original: de nas snod che ba zhig tu bzhu la 'bras bu gsum zhib par btags pa'i bye ma thal 'debs pa ltar rim bzhin btabs nas thal bar ma song bar lcags skyogs chung ngu'i ltag pas nyed /
analyzed: de nas snod che ba zhig tu bzhu la 'bras bu gsum zhib par btags pa'i bye ma thal 'debs pa ltar rim bzhin btabs nas thal bar ma song bar lcags skyogs chung ngu'i ltag pas nyed /
translated: Then, melt it in a large container and add the three fruits, which have been finely ground, like adding sand to a paste.

original: de nas kha legs par bcad la nyi ma'i brgyad cha tsam gyi bar me btang /
analyzed: de nas kha legs par bcad la nyi ma'i brgyad cha tsam gyi bar me btang /
translated: Then, cover the container well and light a fire for one-eighth of the day.🔽When it is completely cool, remove it and strain it through a cloth.

original: grang thag chod pa dang bton la zho ras la btsags te khu ba legs par bton pas brdzis te srab mthug sor gang tsam yod pa'i sgor mor btang /
analyzed: grang thag chod pa dang bton la zho ras la btsags te khu ba legs par bton pas brdzis te srab mthug sor gang tsam yod pa'i sgor mor btang /
translated: Then, roll it into a thin round shape, about one finger joint thick.

original: de ras kyis bdun brtsegs tsam dril la skud pas bsdoms /
analyzed: de ras kyis bdun brtsegs tsam dril la skud pas bsdoms /
translated: Wrap it in seven layers of cloth and tie it with string.🔽Place it in the middle of a fire of cow dung and leave it until the cloth burns.

original: gci ba'i me'i dkyil du bcug la ras tshig tsam gyi tshad bzhag / de nas me shi zhing grang thag chod pa dang bton la zhib par btags /
analyzed: gci ba'i me'i dkyil du bcug la ras tshig tsam gyi tshad bzhag / de nas me shi zhing grang thag chod pa dang bton la zhib par btags /
translated: Then, when the fire has gone out and it is completely cool, remove it and grind it finely.

original: yang lugs gcig la /
analyzed: yang lugs gcig la /
translated: In another method,

original: gsha' dkar srab mthu ga shog bu tsam brdungs la /
analyzed: gsha' dkar srab mthu ga shog bu tsam brdungs la /
translated: pound white mica into a thin sheet the size of a piece of paper.

original: bod kyi so ma ra tsa'i lo ma zhib par 'phur ba /
analyzed: bod kyi so ma ra tsa'i lo ma zhib par 'phur ba /
translated: Grind the leaves of Tibetan somaraji into a fine powder.

original: ras kha gang las phad bu bzos pa'i nang du so ma ra tsa bting la /
analyzed: ras kha gang las phad bu bzos pa'i nang du so ma ra tsa bting la /
translated: Make a pouch from a square of cloth and line it with somaraja.

original: gsha' dkar sbrang gshog de'i steng du rim brtsegs su bzhag pa'i bar mtshams su so ma ra tsa sor gsum yod pa byas la kha btsems te /
analyzed: gsha' dkar sbrang gshog de'i steng du rim brtsegs su bzhag pa'i bar mtshams su so ma ra tsa sor gsum yod pa byas la kha btsems te /
translated: Place the white mica butterfly wings in layers inside the pouch, with three finger lengths of somaraja between each layer.🔽Seal the top and bottom of the pouch with four finger lengths of fresh cow dung, place it in the center of a small fire, and when the dung is burned, let it cool.

original: steng 'og thams cad la lci ba ser kha ma sor bzhi re yod pa'i dkyil du bcug ste me chung ngu btang shing lci ba tshig pa dang grang du bcug / de nas lci thal bsal te so ma ra tsa'i dkyil du tshal dkar me la bsregs pa
analyzed: steng 'og thams cad la lci ba ser kha ma sor bzhi re yod pa'i dkyil du bcug ste me chung ngu btang shing lci ba tshig pa dang grang du bcug / de nas lci thal bsal te so ma ra tsa'i dkyil du tshal dkar me la bsregs pa
translated: Then, remove the ash and extract the somaraja in the center, which will be like a white flower burned in a fire.

original: ltar 'ong ba de gzhan dang ma 'dres par 'don /
analyzed: ltar 'ong ba de gzhan dang ma 'dres par 'don /
translated: This is extracted without mixing it with anything else.

original: so ma ra tsa nyung ba dang me tshas na gsha' dkar thig bur 'dril 'ong bas @303b ran pa gal che /
analyzed: so ma ra tsa nyung ba dang me tshas na gsha' dkar thig bur 'dril 'ong bas @303b ran pa gal che /
translated: If there is too little somaraja or the fire is too hot, the white mica will roll into a ball, so it is important to get the right amount.

original: de ba siddhi bangga zer te thun tshad se ba gsum nas bzhi'i bar nad gzhi che chung dang bstun nas gtong /
analyzed: de ba siddhi bangga zer te thun tshad se ba gsum nas bzhi'i bar nad gzhi che chung dang bstun nas gtong /
translated: This is called “the accomplishment of the cow.” The duration of the session is from three to four cow’s horns, in accordance with the strength of the illness.

original: de kha bsgyur byed lugs ni /
analyzed: de kha bsgyur byed lugs ni /
translated: The method of changing the taste is as follows.

original: ga pur cung zad dang mnyam du zos na kha'i dri ngan pa sel /
analyzed: ga pur cung zad dang mnyam du zos na kha'i dri ngan pa sel /
translated: If one eats it with a small amount of camphor, it eliminates bad breath.

original: dz'a ti nyis 'gyur bsres nas btang na lus kyi stobs 'phel bar 'gyur /
analyzed: dz'a ti nyis 'gyur bsres nas btang na lus kyi stobs 'phel bar 'gyur /
translated: If one takes it with double the amount of jati, it increases physical strength.

original: yang ba mar dang mnyam du btang kyang nus pa gong dang 'dra /
analyzed: yang ba mar dang mnyam du btang kyang nus pa gong dang 'dra /
translated: If one takes it with butter, it has the same effect as above.

original: tul pa'i lo ma'i thang chu dang bsres nas btang na dangs ma tsha grang gang gis 'dzag pa yang chod /
analyzed: tul pa'i lo ma'i thang chu dang bsres nas btang na dangs ma tsha grang gang gis 'dzag pa yang chod /
translated: If one takes it with the decoction of tulā leaves, it stops the leakage of hot or cold impurities.

original: shel dkar dang mnyam du btang kyang nus pa gong dang 'dra /🔽ba mar sar pas rta byas btang na mkhris pa sha ser dang grang rlung la phan /
analyzed: shel dkar dang mnyam du btang kyang nus pa gong dang 'dra / ba mar sar pas rta byas btang na mkhris pa sha ser dang grang rlung la phan /
translated: If one takes it with white sugar, it has the same effect as above.🔽If one takes it with fresh cow butter, it is beneficial for bile, yellow flesh, and cold wind.

original: ra ma'i chus rta byas btang na rlung gis lto ba sbos pa sel /🔽tsha la mer bsregs pa'i phye ma dang mnyam du btang na khrag skran thon par 'gyur /
analyzed: ra ma'i chus rta byas btang na rlung gis lto ba sbos pa sel / tsha la mer bsregs pa'i phye ma dang mnyam du btang na khrag skran thon par 'gyur /
translated: If one takes it with goat’s milk, it eliminates wind-bloated stomach.🔽If one takes it with the powder of burnt salt, it expels blood tumors.

original: yung ba dang mnyam du btang na khrag mkhris thon par 'gyur zhing grang mkhris la phan /
analyzed: yung ba dang mnyam du btang na khrag mkhris thon par 'gyur zhing grang mkhris la phan /
translated: If one takes it with indigo, it expels blood and bile and is beneficial for cold bile.

original: bye kar dang mnyam du btang na bad kan smug po la phan /
analyzed: bye kar dang mnyam du btang na bad kan smug po la phan /
translated: If taken with bekkar, it is beneficial for brown phlegm.

original: p'a na dang mnyam du btang na dangs ma 'phel /
analyzed: p'a na dang mnyam du btang na dangs ma 'phel /
translated: If taken with pāna, it increases the nutrient essence.

original: pi pi ling dang mnyam du btang na dang kha 'byed /
analyzed: pi pi ling dang mnyam du btang na dang kha 'byed /
translated: If taken with pippalī, it opens the appetite.

original: 'o mas rta byas btang kyang gong dang 'dra /🔽aa ru ra dang mnyam du btang na steng rlung dang dbugs kha mi bde ba la phan /
analyzed: 'o mas rta byas btang kyang gong dang 'dra / aa ru ra dang mnyam du btang na steng rlung dang dbugs kha mi bde ba la phan /
translated: If taken with milk, it is the same as above.🔽If taken with arura, it is beneficial for upper wind and dyspnea.

original: sa mu dra pha la dang mnyam du btang na sna'i nad la phan /
analyzed: sa mu dra pha la dang mnyam du btang na sna'i nad la phan /
translated: If taken with samudrapāla, it is beneficial for nasal diseases.

original: li shi dang mnyam du btang na pho nad la phan /
analyzed: li shi dang mnyam du btang na pho nad la phan /
translated: If taken with li shi, it is beneficial for male diseases.

original: gla rtsi dang mnyam du btang na rdo rje las su rung zhing 'dod pa spyod nus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gla rtsi dang mnyam du btang na rdo rje las su rung zhing 'dod pa spyod nus par 'gyur ro //
translated: If taken with musk, it will make the vajra workable and able to enjoy desire.

original: yang khang byil gyi brun chur sbyangs la lte bar byugs te sman zos kyang nus pa gong dang 'dra /🔽go yu'i phye ma dang mnyam du btang na ma 'ju ba'i nad sel /
analyzed: yang khang byil gyi brun chur sbyangs la lte bar byugs te sman zos kyang nus pa gong dang 'dra / go yu'i phye ma dang mnyam du btang na ma 'ju ba'i nad sel /
translated: Also, if the ashes of burnt khang chil are dissolved in water and applied to the navel, and medicine is taken, the potency is the same as above.🔽If taken with go yui powder, it eliminates indigestion.

original: sgog skya dang mnyam du btang na yan lag gum pa la phan /
analyzed: sgog skya dang mnyam du btang na yan lag gum pa la phan /
translated: If taken with garlic, it is beneficial for paralysis of the limbs.

original: ba dar dang mnyam du btang na mig ser la phan /
analyzed: ba dar dang mnyam du btang na mig ser la phan /
translated: If taken together with ba dar, it is beneficial for jaundice.

original: se 'bru'i shing gi lo ma dang mnyam du btang na skyug sman gyi mchog tu 'gyur te zas spyod skabs dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: se 'bru'i shing gi lo ma dang mnyam du btang na skyug sman gyi mchog tu 'gyur te zas spyod skabs dang sbyar ro //
translated: If taken together with the leaves of the pomegranate tree, it becomes the best emetic. This should be applied in the context of diet and conduct.

original: danda'i rtsa ba /
analyzed: danda'i rtsa ba /
translated: The root of danda

original: 'u su'i rtsa ba /🔽(gu ru tshi) sle tres /
analyzed: 'u su'i rtsa ba / (gu ru tshi) sle tres /
translated: The root of ushu🔽Lettuce

original: gla sgang / purna na ba /🔽lga rnams cha mnyam gyi thang chu sum gnyis la bsdus te (aa n'a ra) btang na rlung la brten pa'i @304a * //
analyzed: gla sgang / purna na ba / lga rnams cha mnyam gyi thang chu sum gnyis la bsdus te (aa n'a ra) btang na rlung la brten pa'i @304a * //
translated: Laagang, purna, and lak

original: nad thams cad la phan /
analyzed: nad thams cad la phan /
translated: are taken in equal parts and boiled down to two-thirds. If taken with water, it is beneficial for all diseases based on wind.

original: gla sgang / lga /
analyzed: gla sgang / lga /
translated: Laagang, lak,

original: kut ki / tig ta /
analyzed: kut ki / tig ta /
translated: kutki, tikta,

original: 'u su'i 'bru rnams cha mnyam gyi thang gong bzhin btang na mkhris pa la brten pa'i nad thams cad la phan /
analyzed: 'u su'i 'bru rnams cha mnyam gyi thang gong bzhin btang na mkhris pa la brten pa'i nad thams cad la phan /
translated: and ushu seeds are taken in equal parts and boiled down as above. If taken with water, it is beneficial for all diseases based on bile.🔽Curd, raisins, li shi,

original: 'ba' zho rgun 'brum li shi / pi pi ling /
analyzed: 'ba' zho rgun 'brum li shi / pi pi ling /
translated: pippali,

original: aa ka ra /
analyzed: aa ka ra /
translated: aka,

original: lga / la la phud chung ba rnams cha mnyam /
analyzed: lga / la la phud chung ba rnams cha mnyam /
translated: lak, and small pieces of la la are taken in equal parts and boiled down to one-third. If taken with water, it is beneficial for all diseases based on phlegm.

original: ts'i r'a ya ta cha gnyis bcas chur (ri ra ya ra) btab la sum gnyis bsdus pa'i thang zhag gsum gyi bar du btang na tshad pa'i nad rigs kun la phan zhing gos kyis byibs la rdul kyang 'don no //🔽shing kun (dkar) cha gcig / zi ra dkar po dang lga cha gsum re /
analyzed: ts'i r'a ya ta cha gnyis bcas chur (ri ra ya ra) btab la sum gnyis bsdus pa'i thang zhag gsum gyi bar du btang na tshad pa'i nad rigs kun la phan zhing gos kyis byibs la rdul kyang 'don no // shing kun (dkar) cha gcig / zi ra dkar po dang lga cha gsum re /
translated: Prepare a decoction by adding two parts of chaga and two parts of raya ta to one part of water. Reduce to one third and administer for three days. This is beneficial for all types of hot disorders and also removes the coating.

original: kha ru tsha cha gnyis rnams chu la bsdus pa'i thang btang na rlung dang pho ba'i nad la tsha log byed pa zas ma 'jub rnams la phan /🔽rgya skyegs / 'u su /
analyzed: kha ru tsha cha gnyis rnams chu la bsdus pa'i thang btang na rlung dang pho ba'i nad la tsha log byed pa zas ma 'jub rnams la phan / rgya skyegs / 'u su /
translated: Prepare a decoction by adding one part of white shingkun, three parts of white zira and three parts of iga to water. Reduce to one third and administer. This is beneficial for vata and stomach disorders, and for indigestion.

original: la la phud rnams cha mnyam chur zhag gcig spangs pa'i thang ka ras rta byas tho rengs btang na lus drod me ltar 'bar ba la phan /
analyzed: la la phud rnams cha mnyam chur zhag gcig spangs pa'i thang ka ras rta byas tho rengs btang na lus drod me ltar 'bar ba la phan /
translated: Prepare a decoction by adding equal parts of gyakyeg, ushisa and lala phud to water and leave for one day. Administer this decoction with milk as the vehicle at dawn. This is beneficial for increasing body heat like a blazing fire.

original: 'u su dang kha ru tsha mnyam pa'i thang btang na rlung dang pho ba'i nad la tsha log byed pa zas ma 'ju ba rnams la phan /
analyzed: 'u su dang kha ru tsha mnyam pa'i thang btang na rlung dang pho ba'i nad la tsha log byed pa zas ma 'ju ba rnams la phan /
translated: Prepare a decoction by adding equal parts of ushisa and karu tsha to water. This is beneficial for vata and stomach disorders, and for indigestion.

original: aa kark'a ra /🔽la la phud /
analyzed: aa kark'a ra /🔽la la phud /
translated: Prepare a decoction by adding equal parts of akar ka, lala phud and karu tsha to water.🔽Prepare a decoction by adding equal parts of ushisa, akar ka and lala phud to water.

original: ku ba / kha ru tsha /🔽lga rnams cha mnyam gyi thang gong bzhin bsdus la btang na bad kan la brten pa'i nad thams cad la phan /
analyzed: ku ba / kha ru tsha / lga rnams cha mnyam gyi thang gong bzhin bsdus la btang na bad kan la brten pa'i nad thams cad la phan /
translated: and citron.

original: sle tres / gla sgang /
analyzed: sle tres / gla sgang /
translated: If one drinks a decoction prepared from these ingredients in equal parts as described above, it will benefit all diseases based on phlegm.🔽If one drinks a decoction prepared from equal parts of tamarind, garlic,

original: au t'i sa'i rtsa ba /
analyzed: au t'i sa'i rtsa ba /
translated: the root of utsa,

original: 'u su'i 'bru /
analyzed: 'u su'i 'bru /
translated: ushira,🔽and citron, as described above, it will benefit all diseases of the three humors.

original: lga / ku ba rnams cha mnyam gyi thang gong bzhin bskol nas btang na 'dus pa'i nad thams cad la phan no ;
analyzed: lga / ku ba rnams cha mnyam gyi thang gong bzhin bskol nas btang na 'dus pa'i nad thams cad la phan no ;
translated: If one makes a paste from equal parts of saffron,

original: ; gur gum /🔽gla rtsi / gi wam /🔽ga pur / shr'i khanda rnams cha mnyam phye mar btags la chus khu ba byas te lus la bsku mnye byas na /
analyzed: ; gur gum / gla rtsi / gi wam / ga pur / shr'i khanda rnams cha mnyam phye mar btags la chus khu ba byas te lus la bsku mnye byas na /
translated: musk, giwam,🔽camphor, and shari khanda, and applies it to the body,

original: rlung mkhris bad kan la brten pa'i sha drod che ba lus rdul 'dar shing ba spu sgreng pa /
analyzed: rlung mkhris bad kan la brten pa'i sha drod che ba lus rdul 'dar shing ba spu sgreng pa /
translated: it will benefit the hot disorders of the flesh based on wind, bile, and phlegm, which cause the body to tremble and the body hairs to stand on end,

original: shes pa 'khrug shing 'gro sdong sna tshogs byed pa /
analyzed: shes pa 'khrug shing 'gro sdong sna tshogs byed pa /
translated: agitation of the mind, and various movements and rest.

original: gdon (bho) gyis (tsanda kar po) zin pa lta bus mig 'bur tshugs su blta zhing /
analyzed: gdon (bho) gyis (tsanda kar po) zin pa lta bus mig 'bur tshugs su blta zhing /
translated: It will benefit the eyes, which stare with bulging eyes,

original: mig sngar sna tshogs mthong ba /
analyzed: mig sngar sna tshogs mthong ba /
translated: and see various things in front of them.

original: nyin gnyid mi thub cing shes pa zi ba /
analyzed: nyin gnyid mi thub cing shes pa zi ba /
translated: You cannot sleep during the day, and your mind becomes dull.

original: gos yang yang 'bud pa sogs nad glo bur ba la phan no //
analyzed: gos yang yang 'bud pa sogs nad glo bur ba la phan no //
translated: This is beneficial for sudden illnesses such as insomnia, mental agitation, and frequent sweating.

original: spyi 'joms mu sa la'i @304b sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: spyi 'joms mu sa la'i @304b sbyor ba ni /
translated: The general preparation of musala is as follows:

original: mu sa ya rdza snod gsar pa'i nang du blug par ba'i 'o ma lhad med sor gang tsam gyis mthob blug / kha legs par bcad de rlung mi 'chor bar byed /
analyzed: mu sa ya rdza snod gsar pa'i nang du blug par ba'i 'o ma lhad med sor gang tsam gyis mthob blug / kha legs par bcad de rlung mi 'chor bar byed /
translated: Put one sor of uncontaminated cow’s milk in a new earthen pot, cover the mouth well, and prevent air from entering.

original: me chung du yun ring pos khu ba rang thim bar 'tshed /
analyzed: me chung du yun ring pos khu ba rang thim bar 'tshed /
translated: Cook over a small fire for a long time until the liquid is self-absorbed.

original: de nas grib bskams byas la skam pa dang zhib par btags pa dar la btsags pa nyag gang /
analyzed: de nas grib bskams byas la skam pa dang zhib par btags pa dar la btsags pa nyag gang /
translated: Then dry in the shade, grind into a fine powder, and strain with a cloth.🔽Add one nyag of each of the following:

original: (li shi) la wam ga dang dza yi pha la zho bzhi re /
analyzed: (li shi) la wam ga dang dza yi pha la zho bzhi re /
translated: li shi, lavanga, jivaka, and jivanti;

original: mi ra tsa dang su tha /
analyzed: mi ra tsa dang su tha /
translated: miraka, suta,

original: pi pa la gsum zho bcu gnyis re rnams zhib par btags la ba'i chus rta byas nas btang na chu bsags la phan zhing gzhan yang rtag pa'i rims dang khrag bshal ba dang / chu lam du khrag 'dzag pa rnams la mchog (dz'a ti) tu phan no /
analyzed: pi pa la gsum zho bcu gnyis re rnams zhib par btags la ba'i chus rta byas nas btang na chu bsags la phan zhing gzhan yang rtag pa'i rims dang khrag bshal ba dang / chu lam du khrag 'dzag pa rnams la mchog (dz'a ti) tu phan no /
translated: Take three pi pi la and twelve zo and grind them into a fine powder. Mix with water and make into pills. If given, it is beneficial for the accumulation of water. It is also supreme for chronic fevers, bleeding, and bleeding in the urinary tract.

original: (/ pho ris) chu grang (lga) gis (pi pi ling/) rta byas la btang na rims nyin gcig pa dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang rims drag po dang / rlung nad kyis lus drod med pa rnams la phan no //
analyzed: (/ pho ris) chu grang (lga) gis (pi pi ling/) rta byas la btang na rims nyin gcig pa dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang rims drag po dang / rlung nad kyis lus drod med pa rnams la phan no //
translated: If given with a horse made of water and a horse made of chhu dreg, it is beneficial for one-day, two-day, three-day, and four-day fevers, severe fevers, and wind disorders with loss of body heat.

original: sbrang rtsis rta byas la btang na tshad pa gsar rnying dang mkhris pa sha ser la phan no //
analyzed: sbrang rtsis rta byas la btang na tshad pa gsar rnying dang mkhris pa sha ser la phan no //
translated: If given with a horse made of honey, it is beneficial for new and old fevers and jaundice.

original: nim bu'i khu bas rta byas nas btang na mkhris pa mig ser la mchog tu phan /
analyzed: nim bu'i khu bas rta byas nas btang na mkhris pa mig ser la mchog tu phan /
translated: If given with a horse made of nimbu juice, it is supremely beneficial for jaundice with yellow eyes.

original: li shi bsnan te zos na glo la phan /
analyzed: li shi bsnan te zos na glo la phan /
translated: If eaten with added lishi, it is beneficial for the lungs.

original: ba mar sar pa btsags bcad pas rta byas nas btang na lus stobs shor nas spyod mi nus par dangs ma 'phel bar 'gyur /
analyzed: ba mar sar pa btsags bcad pas rta byas nas btang na lus stobs shor nas spyod mi nus par dangs ma 'phel bar 'gyur /
translated: If one takes a potion of the juice of the root of the plant called “white flower” with a horse dose of strained fresh butter, one will lose physical strength and be unable to engage in sexual activity.

original: la su na brdungs pa'i khu bas rta byas te ril bu dril bas btang na skad 'gag pa la phan zhing skad sman yang yang ngo //
analyzed: la su na brdungs pa'i khu bas rta byas te ril bu dril bas btang na skad 'gag pa la phan zhing skad sman yang yang ngo //
translated: If one takes a pill made from the juice of the plant called “beaten by the wind” with a horse dose of molasses, it will help if one has a sore throat.

original: chang gis rta byas nas btang na byis pa btsa' ma thub pa myur du btsa' bar 'gyur /
analyzed: chang gis rta byas nas btang na byis pa btsa' ma thub pa myur du btsa' bar 'gyur /
translated: If one takes a potion with a horse dose of beer, it will quickly bring forth the birth of a child who is ready to be born but whose mother is unable to give birth.

original: ku me d'a'i khu bas rta byas nas btang na chu rlung gis lto ba sbos pa sel /
analyzed: ku me d'a'i khu bas rta byas nas btang na chu rlung gis lto ba sbos pa sel /
translated: If one takes a potion with a horse dose of the juice of the plant called “cucumber” it will cure a distended stomach caused by a water-wind.

original: dz'a mu na'i 'bru dang pags pa brdungs pa'i khu bas rta byas nas sna bug la blug na mi rga zer ba'i mgo bor 'bu yod pa'i nang chu /🔽me / nyi ma /
analyzed: dz'a mu na'i 'bru dang pags pa brdungs pa'i khu bas rta byas nas sna bug la blug na mi rga zer ba'i mgo bor 'bu yod pa'i nang chu / me / nyi ma /
translated: If one puts into one’s nostrils the juice of the plant called “jāmuna” with a horse dose of its seeds and skin, it is said that one will not grow old.

original: 'od can sogs mthong bas rkyen byas nas rgyal zal lta bu zhig long ba de la (sgog skya) phan no //
analyzed: 'od can sogs mthong bas rkyen byas nas rgyal zal lta bu zhig long ba de la (sgog skya) phan no //
translated: If one sees a person who has become blind due to the condition of seeing such things as a worm in the head, fire, the sun, or light, it will help if one gives him garlic.

original: rgya gar stong ja dang mnyam du btang na pho dbang las su rung bar 'gyur ro /
analyzed: rgya gar stong ja dang mnyam du btang na pho dbang las su rung bar 'gyur ro /
translated: If it is taken with Indian tea, it will make the male organ workable.

original: (shu dag) / ba tsa dang mnyam du btang na tsha ba'i skom dad kyi rigs dang srod long la phan /🔽mu zi ser @305a * //
analyzed: (shu dag) / ba tsa dang mnyam du btang na tsha ba'i skom dad kyi rigs dang srod long la phan / mu zi ser @305a * //
translated: If it is taken with ba tsa, it will help thirst and indigestion.

original: po dang cha mnyam btags la btang na rlung gis rna ba 'on pa dang mig gis mi mthong ba la phan /
analyzed: po dang cha mnyam btags la btang na rlung gis rna ba 'on pa dang mig gis mi mthong ba la phan /
translated: If it is taken with yellow sulphur, it will help deafness caused by wind and blindness caused by wind.

original: gong gi mu sa li'i gcig po dang / pho ril /
analyzed: gong gi mu sa li'i gcig po dang / pho ril /
translated: If one part of the above mentioned musali, one part of phori,

original: pi pi ling /🔽lga bzhi cha mnyam btags la sman thun che phyogs gnyis kyi rtsis chu grang gis 'phul nas btang na rgyu dang mi rgyu /
analyzed: pi pi ling / lga bzhi cha mnyam btags la sman thun che phyogs gnyis kyi rtsis chu grang gis 'phul nas btang na rgyu dang mi rgyu /
translated: one part of pipiling,

original: sbyar dug sha dug sogs dug rigs kun la phan te 'di yan mu sa lir kha bsgyur byas pa'i sbyor sde'i 'phros don yin no //
analyzed: sbyar dug sha dug sogs dug rigs kun la phan te 'di yan mu sa lir kha bsgyur byas pa'i sbyor sde'i 'phros don yin no //
translated: and one part of lagpa are mixed and taken with cold water, it will help all types of poison such as poison from the elements, poison from meat, and so forth. This is the continuation of the compound musali.

original: nad gzhi che ba'i rigs la sbyong gtong ba'i shal sman ni /🔽smin drug / mgo / rgyal /
analyzed: nad gzhi che ba'i rigs la sbyong gtong ba'i shal sman ni / smin drug / mgo / rgyal /
translated: The medicinal herbs for purgation in the case of serious diseases are

original: mchu rnams kyi zla ba la /
analyzed: mchu rnams kyi zla ba la /
translated: the herbs of the months of Kartika, Margasirsa, Pausa,🔽and Magha.

original: dzee ba la se ba bcu gnyis /
analyzed: dzee ba la se ba bcu gnyis /
translated: Twelve zevala.

original: h'a da da se ba ni /
analyzed: h'a da da se ba ni /
translated: One hadada.

original: mi ra tsa zho gang /
analyzed: mi ra tsa zho gang /
translated: One miratsa.🔽One cueca.

original: cue  ka se ba phyed gsum zhib par btags la ril bu lnga byas /
analyzed: cue  ka se ba phyed gsum zhib par btags la ril bu lnga byas /
translated: Make five pills from the above ingredients ground into a fine powder.

original: thun tshad ril bu rer mar sar gyis dril la mid /
analyzed: thun tshad ril bu rer mar sar gyis dril la mid /
translated: The dosage is one pill wrapped in ghee and swallowed.

original: de'i rjes su chu bskol hub gsum tsam re btang pag nad ro rnams sbyangs nas mang du (dan rog) bshal bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i rjes su chu bskol hub gsum tsam re btang pag nad ro rnams sbyangs nas mang du (dan rog) bshal bar 'gyur /
translated: After that, drink three sips of boiled water. The rotten parts of the disease will be cleansed and will be expelled in large quantities.🔽After cleansing, stop the bleeding with a medicine of arura,

original: (aa ru ra) / sbyangs zin (pho ris) nas (nim bu'i chu) gcod sman aa ph'i ma /🔽dz'a ti / aambha ki ko li /
analyzed: (aa ru ra) / sbyangs zin (pho ris) nas (nim bu'i chu) gcod sman aa ph'i ma / dz'a ti / aambha ki ko li /
translated: and then take a medicine of nimbu juice,🔽jatimukha, amba, and koli in equal parts.

original: bi dza ya rnams cha mnyam thog mar dz'a ti dang aa ph'i ma gnyis mar sar chung ngu dang mnyam du btags /
analyzed: bi dza ya rnams cha mnyam thog mar dz'a ti dang aa ph'i ma gnyis mar sar chung ngu dang mnyam du btags /
translated: First, take a small amount of ghee together with jatimukha and atimukta.

original: de nas bzhi ga chabs cig zhib par btags la bye kar ram sbrang gang rigs kyis rta byas la ril bu skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam sgril nas ril (sha 'bras kyi nad /
analyzed: de nas bzhi ga chabs cig zhib par btags la bye kar ram sbrang gang rigs kyis rta byas la ril bu skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam sgril nas ril (sha 'bras kyi nad /
translated: Then, take all four ingredients together, ground into a fine powder, with either buttermilk or honey, rolled into pills the size of a jujube fruit.

original: so ma ra tsa) bu re btang /
analyzed: so ma ra tsa) bu re btang /
translated: Take one pill.

original: des 'grim pa'i rigs gang yin kyang chod do //
analyzed: des 'grim pa'i rigs gang yin kyang chod do //
translated: This will stop any type of diarrhea.

original: yang na dz'a t'i'i khog brus pa'i nang du aa ph'i ma sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam zhig blug ste kha bcad la gro zhib kyi pag gis dril la gci ba'i ma dub  yal ba'i dkyel du bsregs /
analyzed: yang na dz'a t'i'i khog brus pa'i nang du aa ph'i ma sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam zhig blug ste kha bcad la gro zhib kyi pag gis dril la gci ba'i ma dub  yal ba'i dkyel du bsregs /
translated: Alternatively, fill the hollowed-out inside of a nutmeg with twice the amount of white mustard seed, cover it, wrap it in a cloth of wheat flour, and burn it in the middle of the urinary meatus.

original: bag de bag leb tshos pa tsam gyi tshad du sleb pa dang bton la dz'a ti de nas thun tshad sran ma nyis 'gyur cam re zos phas nges par chod do //
analyzed: bag de bag leb tshos pa tsam gyi tshad du sleb pa dang bton la dz'a ti de nas thun tshad sran ma nyis 'gyur cam re zos phas nges par chod do //
translated: When the cloth has reached the size of a cooked flat bread, remove it and eat the nutmeg, the size of twice the amount of white mustard seed. This will definitely stop diarrhea.

original: yang na zla ba gong gi bzhi po la spyongs sman /
analyzed: yang na zla ba gong gi bzhi po la spyongs sman /
translated: Alternatively, practice the four months of the summer season.🔽[Jīvapā]🔽[Pāra]

original: (dan rog)...dzee pa la /🔽(dngul chu)...p'a ra /🔽(mu zi ser po)...gandha ka (pho ris).../ mi ro tsa /
analyzed: (dan rog)...dzee pa la / (dngul chu)...p'a ra / (mu zi ser po)...gandha ka (pho ris).../ mi ro tsa /
translated: [Gandhaka]🔽[Mīrorasa]

original: (pi pi ling)...pi pa la /
analyzed: (pi pi ling)...pi pa la /
translated: [Pippalī]🔽[Śunthi]

original: (lga)...shunthi rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags /
analyzed: (lga)...shunthi rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags /
translated: are finely ground in equal parts.

original: thun tshad sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam re chu skol gyis phul nas btang na nad ro sbyong bar @305b 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thun tshad sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam re chu skol gyis phul nas btang na nad ro sbyong bar @305b 'gyur ro //
