translated: If one takes the amount of twice the amount of white mustard seed with hot water, it will purify the remnants of disease.

original: de gcod lugs gong dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: de gcod lugs gong dang 'dra'o //
translated: The way to eliminate them is the same as above.

original: yang na dzee pa la se ba bcu gnyis /
analyzed: yang na dzee pa la se ba bcu gnyis /
translated: Alternatively, take ten myrobalan plums,

original: mi ra tsa zho ngo /
analyzed: mi ra tsa zho ngo /
translated: one-third of a cup of milk,

original: tsa wo la 'bru lnga bcu rnams zhib par btags pa skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu'i tshod tsam re mar sar gyis dril la btang /
analyzed: tsa wo la 'bru lnga bcu rnams zhib par btags pa skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu'i tshod tsam re mar sar gyis dril la btang /
translated: and five handfuls of the five grains. Grind them finely, roll them into pills the size of a myrobalan plum, and take them with ghee.

original: de'i rjes su chu skol hub gsum tsam re 'thung /
analyzed: de'i rjes su chu skol hub gsum tsam re 'thung /
translated: After that, drink three mouthfuls of hot water.

original: yang na se hum da /
analyzed: yang na se hum da /
translated: Alternatively, take equal parts of sehum,

original: du ba ral pa /
analyzed: du ba ral pa /
translated: du ra lpags,

original: bhoo r'a da /
analyzed: bhoo r'a da /
translated: bho ra dha,

original: ha ra ta ka'i tshig (dan rog) gu'i nang gi snying po rnams (pho ril) cha mnyam ('bras) btags la thun tshad sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam re bu ram gyis dril la btang /
analyzed: ha ra ta ka'i tshig (dan rog) gu'i nang gi snying po rnams (pho ril) cha mnyam ('bras) btags la thun tshad sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam re bu ram gyis dril la btang /
translated: and the heart of harataka, roll them into pills the size of two beans with molasses, and take them.

original: de rjes chu skol phul gang tsam re 'thungs pas bshal skyug gnyis ka (shri khanda) 'byung /
analyzed: de rjes chu skol phul gang tsam re 'thungs pas bshal skyug gnyis ka (shri khanda) 'byung /
translated: After that, drink one cup of hot water. This will cause both purgation and vomiting.

original: yang na dzee pa la pags pa bshus pa zho brgyad kyi tshod tsam ras dri ma med pas gtums la skud pas kha bsdams /
analyzed: yang na dzee pa la pags pa bshus pa zho brgyad kyi tshod tsam ras dri ma med pas gtums la skud pas kha bsdams /
translated: Alternatively, take the skin of ten myrobalan plums, the size of eight cups of yogurt, wrapped in clean cloth and tied with string.

original: snod gang rigs su 'o ma bre do tsam blugs la gong gi ras thum de sor bzhi tsam 'o mar ma reg pa skud pas khebs gcod la btags /
analyzed: snod gang rigs su 'o ma bre do tsam blugs la gong gi ras thum de sor bzhi tsam 'o mar ma reg pa skud pas khebs gcod la btags /
translated: Pour two dre of milk into a suitable vessel, tie the above cloth bundle so that it is four fingerbreadths above the milk, and cover it with a string.

original: de nas khebs (dan rog) rgyab la rlangs pa mi 'chor bar gtums nas 'o ma de phyed tsam skam tshod kyi bar la me btang /
analyzed: de nas khebs (dan rog) rgyab la rlangs pa mi 'chor bar gtums nas 'o ma de phyed tsam skam tshod kyi bar la me btang /
translated: Then, cover the bundle with a cloth so that steam does not escape, and heat the milk until half of it has evaporated.

original: de nas sman phyung gshags la lce bton /
analyzed: de nas sman phyung gshags la lce bton /
translated: Then, remove the medicine and cut the tongue.

original: de dang shva ta dzi ra /
analyzed: de dang shva ta dzi ra /
translated: Mix the above with shata jiri,

original: aa dze ba na /
analyzed: aa dze ba na /
translated: ajabe na,

original: mi ra tsa /
analyzed: mi ra tsa /
translated: miratsa,

original: pi pa li lnga cha bsnyams la btags /
analyzed: pi pa li lnga cha bsnyams la btags /
translated: and pippali in equal parts and tie it up.

original: de nas gong gi 'o mas khu ba byas nas ril bu skyu ru ra tsam dril /
analyzed: de nas gong gi 'o mas khu ba byas nas ril bu skyu ru ra tsam dril /
translated: Then, make a paste with the above milk and roll it into pills the size of a jujube.

original: ril bu re btang la nge nas chu skol 'thung ngo //
analyzed: ril bu re btang la nge nas chu skol 'thung ngo //
translated: Take one pill and then drink boiled water.🔽The fruits of dho,

original: dbo / nag pa /
analyzed: dbo / nag pa /
translated: nakpa,

original: nya / snron /🔽chu stod / dbyu gu rnams kyi aa ram da'i 'bras bu /
analyzed: nya / snron / chu stod / dbyu gu rnams kyi aa ram da'i 'bras bu /
translated: nya, snron,🔽chutö, and dhu are used.

original: dzee pa la /
analyzed: dzee pa la /
translated: Mix with jepa la,

original: (zi ra dkar po /
analyzed: (zi ra dkar po /
translated: white zera,🔽and la la phud in equal parts.

original: la la phud pho ril pi pi ling) shee ra /
analyzed: la la phud pho ril pi pi ling) shee ra /
translated: Mix with tsawo,

original: tsa wo la /
analyzed: tsa wo la /
translated: and so on.

original: sendha / tsi ra tsa rnams cha mnyam btags la bod kyi thun tshad che phyogs tsam chu grang gis rta byas gtong /
analyzed: sendha / tsi ra tsa rnams cha mnyam btags la bod kyi thun tshad che phyogs tsam chu grang gis rta byas gtong /
translated: Sendha, jiraka, and champaka are mixed in equal parts and taken with cold water in the Tibetan measure of one srang.

original: zla ba'i khyad ma gtogs phan yon dang nus pa 'dra /
analyzed: zla ba'i khyad ma gtogs phan yon dang nus pa 'dra /
translated: Except for the difference in the month, the benefits and potency are similar.

original: yang na dzee pa la btul ma /
analyzed: yang na dzee pa la btul ma /

original: (danda) pi pa la /🔽(dan rog) mi ra tsa /
analyzed: (danda) pi pa la / (dan rog) mi ra tsa /
translated: Dandelion is boiled in water.🔽Mirabilite is boiled in water.

original: shve ta dzi ra /
analyzed: shve ta dzi ra /
translated: White jiraka is boiled in water.

original: tsuka rnams cha mnyam ('bras rgya tsha) btags /
analyzed: tsuka rnams cha mnyam ('bras rgya tsha) btags /
translated: All of these are mixed in equal parts.

translated: Boil in water for one day, add to the water, and when complete, strain through a cloth. Take the liquid as a vehicle and roll into a pill the size of a jujube.

analyzed: ril bu re (dan rog) chu grang gis rta byas nas gtong (bo ris zi ra dkar po/) ngo //

original: yang na dzee pa la (dan rog) chu khol thengs @306a * //
analyzed: yang na dzee pa la (dan rog) chu khol thengs @306a * //
translated: Alternatively, boil jeera in boiling water.

original: re la brje thengs re byas pa lan brgyad kyi bar btsos /
analyzed: re la brje thengs re byas pa lan brgyad kyi bar btsos /
translated: Change the water once each time, and boil for eight times.

original: de nas lce bton /
analyzed: de nas lce bton /
translated: Then remove the tongue.

original: de dang aa ga ra /
analyzed: de dang aa ga ra /
translated: That, agara, and

analyzed: khanda gsum cha mnyam la zhib par btags thun tshad bod dang 'dra ba chu grang gis rta byas la btang ngo //
translated: For the three equal parts of khanda, grind them finely, and add cold water to make a paste. The dosage is similar to that of Tibetan medicine.

original: yang na / ni la ka wam gis brdungs pa'i khu bar skyu ru ra zhib par btags pa btab nimbu'i chu cung zad blug lcags skyogs kyi nang du zhag (aar skya) gcig (bye kar) bzhag / skra dang sma ra dkar por song bar zhag gsum gyi bar /
analyzed: yang na / ni la ka wam gis brdungs pa'i khu bar skyu ru ra zhib par btags pa btab nimbu'i chu cung zad blug lcags skyogs kyi nang du zhag (aar skya) gcig (bye kar) bzhag / skra dang sma ra dkar por song bar zhag gsum gyi bar /
translated: Alternatively, grind nimbu in the juice of nilanka and add a little nimbu water. Place it in an iron vessel for one day and one night.🔽For gray hair, apply it once a day for three days.

original: nyin re la 'khru thengs re la byugs thengs re byed /
analyzed: nyin re la 'khru thengs re la byugs thengs re byed /
translated: Wash once a day and apply once a day.🔽For white hair, do as above.

original: sla dkar n'a gong bzhin byed /🔽me la ka r'a sa /
analyzed: sla dkar n'a gong bzhin byed / me la ka r'a sa /
translated: For black hair, use the same method.🔽For white hair, use the same method.

translated: Mix them well and make a pill the size of a black plum with white sugar as the binder. It will benefit all types of hot disorders.

original: bhringga r'a dza'i chus sbrus la skam thag chod pa dang phye ma thur mgo re tsam btang bas rims tshad kyi rigs mtha' dag la phan no //
analyzed: bhringga r'a dza'i chus sbrus la skam thag chod pa dang phye ma thur mgo re tsam btang bas rims tshad kyi rigs mtha' dag la phan no //
translated: Mix with water from Bhringaraja and when dry, take one teaspoon. This is beneficial for all types of contagious fevers.

original: dan rog dug bral /🔽dngul chu btul ma /
analyzed: dan rog dug bral / dngul chu btul ma /
translated: Dantakashari,🔽processed mercury,

original: mu zi ser po //🔽pho ris / pi pi ling /
analyzed: mu zi ser po // pho ris / pi pi ling /
translated: yellow sulfur,🔽iron,

original: tsha (aa ma la) la rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la bye dkar dang mnyam du ba mar gsar pas sgil la btang na khrag tshad /🔽mkhris tshad / rlung tshad /
analyzed: tsha (aa ma la) la rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la bye dkar dang mnyam du ba mar gsar pas sgil la btang na khrag tshad / mkhris tshad / rlung tshad /
translated: and pippali, taken in equal parts and finely ground, mixed with white sugar and fresh butter, is the best remedy for blood fever,🔽bile fever,🔽wind fever,

original: bad kan gyi tshad pa /
analyzed: bad kan gyi tshad pa /
translated: phlegm fever,🔽epidemic fever,

original: rgyu tshad / cham tshad /🔽'khrugs tshad / rims tshad de tshad pa brgyad la mchog tu phan no //
analyzed: rgyu tshad / cham tshad / 'khrugs tshad / rims tshad de tshad pa brgyad la mchog tu phan no //
translated: influenza,🔽and contagious fever.

original: dan rog dug bral dang danda se ba bcu gnyis /
analyzed: dan rog dug bral dang danda se ba bcu gnyis /
translated: Take twelve parts each of dantakashari,🔽iron,

original: pho ris / tshal bsregs pa'i thal ba /
analyzed: pho ris / tshal bsregs pa'i thal ba /
translated: and burnt ash of the bark,

original: pi pi ling gsum se ba bzhi re rnams zhib par btags /
analyzed: pi pi ling gsum se ba bzhi re rnams zhib par btags /
translated: and four parts each of pippali, finely ground.

original: bhringga r'a dza'i khu bas sbrus la ril bu sma ru mgo nag tsam byas pa thun tshad ril bu gsum re btang bas rims tshad kyi rigs mtha' dag la phan no //
analyzed: bhringga r'a dza'i khu bas sbrus la ril bu sma ru mgo nag tsam byas pa thun tshad ril bu gsum re btang bas rims tshad kyi rigs mtha' dag la phan no //
translated: Make pills the size of a black head from a paste made with the juice of bhringraj. The dosage is three pills at a time. This is beneficial for all types of fever.

original: des rims 'phrog lcags kyu'i sbyor ba bdun pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: des rims 'phrog lcags kyu'i sbyor ba bdun pa rdzogs so /
translated: This completes the seventh combination of the hook that snatches fever.🔽Go yū

original: // / go yu /🔽(su pa ri) mu @308a * //
analyzed: // / go yu / (su pa ri) mu @308a * //
translated: (su pari)🔽musali

original: sa li ; 'jam 'bras kyi 'bru /
analyzed: sa li ; 'jam 'bras kyi 'bru /
translated: rice

original: pi pi ling dang pi pi ling gi rtsa ba /
analyzed: pi pi ling dang pi pi ling gi rtsa ba /
translated: pippali and pippali root🔽lāṅgal

original: lga / po sha ra'i rtsa ba /
analyzed: lga / po sha ra'i rtsa ba /
translated: pho tsa

original: pho ris / la la phud /
analyzed: pho ris / la la phud /
translated: sin ga da

original: singga da / aa shva gandha /
analyzed: singga da / aa shva gandha /
translated: aśvagandhā

original: byi thang ka /🔽la la phud chung ba /
analyzed: byi thang ka / la la phud chung ba /
translated: byi thang ka🔽la la phud chung ba🔽bho om gi

original: bhoom gi rnams zho bco lnga re cha mnyam zhib par btags /
analyzed: bhoom gi rnams zho bco lnga re cha mnyam zhib par btags /
translated: are equal parts of fifteen measures of curd, finely ground.🔽Vir kan du

original: bi ra kan dhu zho bzhi zhib par btags te chus btsos la gar sla bag tsam du song dus sman rnams dang bsregs /
analyzed: bi ra kan dhu zho bzhi zhib par btags te chus btsos la gar sla bag tsam du song dus sman rnams dang bsregs /
translated: are four measures of curd, finely ground, cooked with water, and when it has become a thin gruel, the herbs are added.🔽Somarāja

original: so ma ra tsa zho brgyad cu /
analyzed: so ma ra tsa zho brgyad cu /
translated: is eighty measures of curd.

original: chu khar khal gcig tsam gyi nang du btab la chu bre gsum tsam du skam skam par gdus grang ba dang ras la btsags pa la (dug mo nyung) gong gi sman btab nas 'dres par byas /
analyzed: chu khar khal gcig tsam gyi nang du btab la chu bre gsum tsam du skam skam par gdus grang ba dang ras la btsags pa la (dug mo nyung) gong gi sman btab nas 'dres par byas /
translated: Add one khal of the above ingredients to water, and boil it down to three dre of water.🔽When it is cool, strain it with a cloth and add the above ingredients.🔽Then, in a pot, heat one khal of uncontaminated cow’s milk over a slow fire until it is reduced to one-third.

original: de nas ba'i 'o ma lhad med khal gcig tsam snod du mer (go mu'i bzhi 'gyur) ma gar ba byas gdus nas sum gcig tsam du lus pa dang / de la blug ste skyabs dkrug cing skyo ma gar ba tsam du 'dus pa dang ta'u shi ra btab la dkrug cing zan dron tsam du sleb pa dang me thag bcad de grang du bcug la ril bu skyu ru ra che phyogs tsam re btang bas 'di ni
analyzed: de nas ba'i 'o ma lhad med khal gcig tsam snod du mer (go mu'i bzhi 'gyur) ma gar ba byas gdus nas sum gcig tsam du lus pa dang / de la blug ste skyabs dkrug cing skyo ma gar ba tsam du 'dus pa dang ta'u shi ra btab la dkrug cing zan dron tsam du sleb pa dang me thag bcad de grang du bcug la ril bu skyu ru ra che phyogs tsam re btang bas 'di ni
translated: Add the above ingredients and stir. When it is the consistency of thick porridge, remove it from the heat and allow it to cool.

original: go yur brten pa'i spyi 'joms chen mo ste rlung mkhris /
analyzed: go yur brten pa'i spyi 'joms chen mo ste rlung mkhris /
translated: This is the great general remedy for wind, bile,🔽phlegm,

original: bad kan / 'dus pa /
analyzed: bad kan / 'dus pa /
translated: combined disorders,

original: tshad pa gsar rnying /
analyzed: tshad pa gsar rnying /
translated: new and old fevers,

original: dug gi rigs /
analyzed: dug gi rigs /
translated: poisonings,

original: skran / dmu chu /
analyzed: skran / dmu chu /
translated: and ascites.

original: khrag sogs mdor na nad kyi rigs gang la'ang 'dis mi phan pa med do //
analyzed: khrag sogs mdor na nad kyi rigs gang la'ang 'dis mi phan pa med do //
translated: In short, there is no illness, such as blood, that this does not help.

original: yang gong gi ril bu dang mnyam pa'i shel kar lcags snod du chu cung zad blugs la sgor /
analyzed: yang gong gi ril bu dang mnyam pa'i shel kar lcags snod du chu cung zad blugs la sgor /
translated: Again, equal to the above pill, put a little water in a steel container with crystal sugar and boil it.

original: chu thag chod nas /
analyzed: chu thag chod nas /
translated: When the water is boiled down,🔽add🔽jāti,🔽liśi,

original: dz'a ti / li shi /
analyzed: dz'a ti / li shi /
translated: jāti flower,

original: dz'a ti'i me tog / sug smel bzhi shel kar gyi bcu cha re zhib par btags pa dang gong gi ril bu btab la cung zad sgor te ril bu skyu ru ra nyes 'gyur tsam sgril la tho rangs zas ma zos pa'i gong du ril bu re rgyun
analyzed: dz'a ti'i me tog / sug smel bzhi shel kar gyi bcu cha re zhib par btags pa dang gong gi ril bu btab la cung zad sgor te ril bu skyu ru ra nyes 'gyur tsam sgril la tho rangs zas ma zos pa'i gong du ril bu re rgyun
translated: and dry ginger, each one-tenth the amount of crystal sugar, and grind them finely. Add the above pill and boil it a little. Roll it into a pill the size of a jujube fruit. In the early morning, before eating, rely on one pill continuously.

original: du bsten na stobs 'phel zhing rgas kha sra ba /
analyzed: du bsten na stobs 'phel zhing rgas kha sra ba /
translated: If you do this, your strength will increase, your old age will be firm,

original: lus yang ba /
analyzed: lus yang ba /
translated: your body will be light,

original: dong kha bde ba /
analyzed: dong kha bde ba /
translated: your bowels will be comfortable,

original: rtsal che ba /
analyzed: rtsal che ba /
translated: you will have great energy,

original: blo rno ba ;
analyzed: blo rno ba ;
translated: your mind will be sharp,

original: mig gsal ba /
analyzed: mig gsal ba /
translated: your eyes will be clear,

original: rna ba gsang ba /
analyzed: rna ba gsang ba /
translated: your ears will be sharp,

original: so brtan pa /
analyzed: so brtan pa /
translated: your teeth will be firm,

original: skra dkar gnyer ma mi 'byung ba /
analyzed: skra dkar gnyer ma mi 'byung ba /
translated: you will not have white hair or wrinkles,

original: 'dod pa spyod nus pa /
analyzed: 'dod pa spyod nus pa /
translated: you will be able to enjoy sex,

original: nad dkon pa sogs phan yon bsam las 'das so //
analyzed: nad dkon pa sogs phan yon bsam las 'das so //
translated: and you will have few illnesses. The benefits are beyond imagination.

original: chu bsags tsha grang gang la'ang bi sa lo tsa na /
analyzed: chu bsags tsha grang gang la'ang bi sa lo tsa na /
translated: For any hot or cold water, say:🔽bisalocana.🔽

original: (cu gang/) si ma la kh'a ra dkar po @308b dang ser po //🔽rgya gar stod ja /
analyzed: (cu gang/) si ma la kh'a ra dkar po @308b dang ser po // rgya gar stod ja /
translated: For both hot and cold types of ascites, prepare a compound from Vichara, Chugang, white and yellow Siromala,

original: bi la wa rnams cha mnyam pa zhib par btags pa na'i khu bas zho sla ba tsam byas pa nyin gsum gyi bar rdo gzhong gi nang du nyes te bag tsam song ba dang ril bu sran chung tsam byas pa skrangs che na ril bu gnyis dang gzhan
analyzed: bi la wa rnams cha mnyam pa zhib par btags pa na'i khu bas zho sla ba tsam byas pa nyin gsum gyi bar rdo gzhong gi nang du nyes te bag tsam song ba dang ril bu sran chung tsam byas pa skrangs che na ril bu gnyis dang gzhan
translated: Indian barley, and Vilwa in equal quantity, finely grind them, and mix with curd whey until it becomes as thick as curd. Leave it in a stone container for three days until it ferments slightly. Make pills the size of a small bean. If the swelling is severe, take two pills, and one pill for others.

original: la re ste ba mar gsar pa btsags bcad pas 'phul (ma nu khrag can) la btang /
analyzed: la re ste ba mar gsar pa btsags bcad pas 'phul (ma nu khrag can) la btang /
translated: Take it with fresh butter churned from unhomogenized milk.

original: sman gtong ring pag thug dang mar gsar ma gtogs gzhan 'dzem /
analyzed: sman gtong ring pag thug dang mar gsar ma gtogs gzhan 'dzem /
translated: During the course of taking the medicine, avoid all other food except thin gruel and fresh butter.

original: nad ji ltar tshan che yang thun bdun gyis nges par thon no //
analyzed: nad ji ltar tshan che yang thun bdun gyis nges par thon no //
translated: No matter how severe the condition, it will definitely be cured within seven doses.

original: b'am ga dang sh'a da cha mnyam la phye mar btags so //
analyzed: b'am ga dang sh'a da cha mnyam la phye mar btags so //
translated: Prepare a compound from Bhampa and Shada in equal quantity, finely grind them,

original: ba'i zho phul gyi sum cha tsam la btab nas 'thungs na yang phan par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: ba'i zho phul gyi sum cha tsam la btab nas 'thungs na yang phan par 'gyur zhing /
translated: and mix with curd whey one-third the quantity of curd. Drinking this will also be beneficial.

original: bcos byed ring dmar skyur dang kha tsha rul sums 'dzem /
analyzed: bcos byed ring dmar skyur dang kha tsha rul sums 'dzem /
translated: Avoid sour, salty, pungent, and spoiled foods for a long time.

original: so ma ra tsa dang bye kar cha mnyam pa zho hub gang la sbyar nas btang na (so ma ra bye kar) khrag mkhris las gyur pa'i chu nad thon zhing mkhris pas 'grim pa yang chod do //
analyzed: so ma ra tsa dang bye kar cha mnyam pa zho hub gang la sbyar nas btang na (so ma ra bye kar) khrag mkhris las gyur pa'i chu nad thon zhing mkhris pas 'grim pa yang chod do //
translated: If one takes a mouthful of curd mixed with an equal part of somaraja and bikya, it will eliminate urinary disorders caused by blood and tripa, and also stop the spread of tripa.

original: yang tshod dang rgyas pa ra dus kyi rtsa ba gang byas khog ma'i nang du blug la de ltar yang khebs gcod rgyab la rlangs pa mi 'chor ba byas pa'i chu sum gnyis bsdus pa'i khu ba tshan mo phor pa gang btungs la gos kyis byibs la rdul
analyzed: yang tshod dang rgyas pa ra dus kyi rtsa ba gang byas khog ma'i nang du blug la de ltar yang khebs gcod rgyab la rlangs pa mi 'chor ba byas pa'i chu sum gnyis bsdus pa'i khu ba tshan mo phor pa gang btungs la gos kyis byibs la rdul
translated: Also, at the time of the onset of fever and swelling, pour the root of the plant into the stomach, cover it with a lid, and prevent steam from escaping. Drink a cup of hot soup that is two-thirds of the water, wrap it with cloth, and lie down.

original: thon par byed pa gnad du che'o //
analyzed: thon par byed pa gnad du che'o //
translated: It is very important to induce sweating.

original: tsan dan dmar po dang btsag rdo gnyis cha mnyam pa zhib par btags la chus rta byas ril bu go yu'i 'bru tsam dril te btang bas kyang phan no //
analyzed: tsan dan dmar po dang btsag rdo gnyis cha mnyam pa zhib par btags la chus rta byas ril bu go yu'i 'bru tsam dril te btang bas kyang phan no //
translated: Also, mix red sandalwood and red ochre in equal parts, grind them finely, make pills the size of a goyui seed with water, and take them. This will also help.

original: 'u su lo ma 'dru bcas rdzogs pa'i khu bas bsku mnye byas kyang skrangs pa 'phral du 'joms par 'gyur ro //🔽sa mu dra pha la (ge tu) mang nyung ji tsam yod kyang ra'i gcin gyi kha phrus nyin re la lan gsum re btab pa /🔽de bzhin pa'i 'o ma /🔽bhringga ra dza'i khu ba rna mas kyis nyin bdun re skem bkru byed /🔽de nas zhib par btags la thun tshad sran ma gsum nas gcig gi bar nad babs che chung skabs dang bstun /🔽ra ma'i gcin gyi sa khu ba byas nas mgo phyed na bar gang na ba'i phyogs kyi mig la 'byug pa'am sna la blug pas phan zhing mig @309a * //
analyzed: 'u su lo ma 'dru bcas rdzogs pa'i khu bas bsku mnye byas kyang skrangs pa 'phral du 'joms par 'gyur ro // sa mu dra pha la (ge tu) mang nyung ji tsam yod kyang ra'i gcin gyi kha phrus nyin re la lan gsum re btab pa / de bzhin pa'i 'o ma / bhringga ra dza'i khu ba rna mas kyis nyin bdun re skem bkru byed / de nas zhib par btags la thun tshad sran ma gsum nas gcig gi bar nad babs che chung skabs dang bstun / ra ma'i gcin gyi sa khu ba byas nas mgo phyed na bar gang na ba'i phyogs kyi mig la 'byug pa'am sna la blug pas phan zhing mig @309a * //
translated: Also, massage with the juice of the stalk of the Ushira plant after the leaves have been removed immediately alleviates swelling.🔽No matter how much Samudrapala is used, it is rubbed with goat urine three times a day.🔽Likewise, it is rubbed with cow’s milk.🔽For seven days, it is rubbed with the juice of Bhringaraja.🔽Then, it is finely ground and the dose is from three to one grain, according to the severity of the illness.🔽If the head is split, by applying the juice of goat urine to the eye on the side where it hurts, or by putting it in the nose, it is beneficial.

original: ba'i dar bas rta byas te 'thungs na rlung rgyu mkhris kyi nad zug bzhin du che ba la phan /
analyzed: ba'i dar bas rta byas te 'thungs na rlung rgyu mkhris kyi nad zug bzhin du che ba la phan /
translated: If one drinks it after making it into a horse with the addition of honey, it is beneficial for a strong wind and bile disorder.

original: hingga dang mnyam du btang na mkhris srin skye thur gzugs dang srin leb srin 'bu chung ngu sogs len nas bde bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: hingga dang mnyam du btang na mkhris srin skye thur gzugs dang srin leb srin 'bu chung ngu sogs len nas bde bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one takes it together with hing, it will remove the growth of bile-bacteria, worms, and small insects, and one will feel well.

original: sbrang rtsi la sbyar nas bse dug gi rma dang thor ba la bskus na 'phral du phan par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: sbrang rtsi la sbyar nas bse dug gi rma dang thor ba la bskus na 'phral du phan par 'gyur zhing /
translated: If one applies it to a wound or a sore of snake poison after mixing it with honey, it will be immediately beneficial.

original: lce dig pas gtam yun ring mi thon pa dang pho ba (shing kun) spos pa la khong du btang bas phan /
analyzed: lce dig pas gtam yun ring mi thon pa dang pho ba (shing kun) spos pa la khong du btang bas phan /
translated: If one takes it internally, it will be beneficial for a long-lasting speech impediment due to a tongue tic and for a sore throat.

original: yung ba dang mnyam du btang na skyug sman gyi mchog tu 'gyur /
analyzed: yung ba dang mnyam du btang na skyug sman gyi mchog tu 'gyur /
translated: If one takes it together with indigo, it will become the best emetic.

original: rang chu 'am ra ma'i chus rta byas btang na ma 'ju ba la phan zhing sbyongs kyang phebs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang chu 'am ra ma'i chus rta byas btang na ma 'ju ba la phan zhing sbyongs kyang phebs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one takes it after making it into a horse with one’s own urine or goat’s urine, it will be beneficial for indigestion and will also be beneficial for purgation.

original: bhringga r'a dza'i khu bas ril bu byas la btang na mig ser la phan /
analyzed: bhringga r'a dza'i khu bas ril bu byas la btang na mig ser la phan /
translated: If one makes a pill with the juice of bhringraj and takes it, it will be beneficial for jaundice.

original: pi pa la'i pags pa dang mnyam du zos na mas rlung gyen ldog dang rlung rgyu mkhris la mchog tu phan no //
analyzed: pi pa la'i pags pa dang mnyam du zos na mas rlung gyen ldog dang rlung rgyu mkhris la mchog tu phan no //
translated: If one eats it together with the skin of a pippali, it is excellent for the upward wind and the wind-bile.

original: yang ra ma'i chus rta byas btang na skya rbab la phan /🔽aa dh'a dz'a da'i khu bas ril bu byas btang na dangs ma 'dzag pa la phan no //
analyzed: yang ra ma'i chus rta byas btang na skya rbab la phan / aa dh'a dz'a da'i khu bas ril bu byas btang na dangs ma 'dzag pa la phan no //
translated: If one takes it together with goat's urine, it is beneficial for ascites.🔽If one takes it together with the juice of adhaju, it is beneficial for the loss of the seminal fluid.

original: la la phud dang mnyam du btung na rims nad nyi ma re mos kyis na ba la phan no //🔽ba'i 'o ma dang mnyam du btang na stobs bskyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: la la phud dang mnyam du btung na rims nad nyi ma re mos kyis na ba la phan no // ba'i 'o ma dang mnyam du btang na stobs bskyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one drinks it together with the urine of a cow, it is beneficial for a fever that comes every day.🔽If one takes it together with cow's milk, it will increase one's strength.

original: lga dang mnyam du btang na dangs ma 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lga dang mnyam du btang na dangs ma 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one takes it together with red ochre, it will increase the seminal fluid.

original: aa ka la ka ra phye mar byas pa dang mnyam du btang na khong pa'i srin 'bu thams cad phyir 'thon nas /
analyzed: aa ka la ka ra phye mar byas pa dang mnyam du btang na khong pa'i srin 'bu thams cad phyir 'thon nas /
translated: If one takes it together with the powder of akalakara, all the worms in the stomach will come out and one will feel well.

original: bde'o // nim bu'i khu ba dang mnyam du btang na 'dus pa'i nad la phan no //
analyzed: bde'o // nim bu'i khu ba dang mnyam du btang na 'dus pa'i nad la phan no //
translated: If one takes it together with the juice of nimbu, it is beneficial for a disease of the humors.

original: rang chu khyor gsum gyis 'phul te btang bas ni n'a b'i zer ba'i rkang lag gi sor mo dang sna gang la thebs kyang chad 'go ba zhig yong ba de la phan /
analyzed: rang chu khyor gsum gyis 'phul te btang bas ni n'a b'i zer ba'i rkang lag gi sor mo dang sna gang la thebs kyang chad 'go ba zhig yong ba de la phan /
translated: If you blow three handfuls of water at the patient, it will help those who are said to be dying and whose fingers and toes, or nose, have fallen off wherever the water struck.

original: yang nad de la sngags byed na /
analyzed: yang nad de la sngags byed na /
translated: If you want to perform the mantra for that illness,

original: sang bcos kha byed rgyu'i do nub nad pa'i lus bkrus la mal bde bar nyal bcug sang zhogs sngags mkhan gyis phyin la nad pa las 'dom do tsam gyis 'gyangs byas la bsdad /
analyzed: sang bcos kha byed rgyu'i do nub nad pa'i lus bkrus la mal bde bar nyal bcug sang zhogs sngags mkhan gyis phyin la nad pa las 'dom do tsam gyis 'gyangs byas la bsdad /
translated: the night before the treatment is to be done, the patient’s body should be washed and he should be made to lie down on a comfortable bed. In the morning, the mantra practitioner should go there and stand about two arm spans away from the patient.

original: rkang lag gang na ba de bstan la 'og gi sngags 'dren pa dang mnyam du 'bras @309b sindh'u ra bsres pas nad pa brab /
analyzed: rkang lag gang na ba de bstan la 'og gi sngags 'dren pa dang mnyam du 'bras @309b sindh'u ra bsres pas nad pa brab /
translated: Point to the place where the pain is in the limbs and, while reciting the following mantra, beat the patient with a mixture of sindūra and rice.

original: rkang lag gang yin kyang mi gnyis tsam gyis zin kyang mi thub par sngags mkhan gyi sngar sleb yong bas khru gang tsam du sleb pa dang gris 'phred la re kh'a gsum 'then /
analyzed: rkang lag gang yin kyang mi gnyis tsam gyis zin kyang mi thub par sngags mkhan gyi sngar sleb yong bas khru gang tsam du sleb pa dang gris 'phred la re kh'a gsum 'then /
translated: No matter which limb it is, even if two people hold it, it will be unable to be held. The mantra practitioner will arrive first and, when he arrives about one cubit away, draw three lines across it with a knife.

original: gang na ba de 'bras btsos pa'i zan dang sindh'u ra bsres pas gtums la bzhag pas phan no //
analyzed: gang na ba de 'bras btsos pa'i zan dang sindh'u ra bsres pas gtums la bzhag pas phan no //
translated: Where it is, cover it with cooked rice and Sindūra, and place it. It will help.🔽The mantra is:

original: sngags ni / aom g'a dzam ta gho rat a'a ba t'a tsha ra tshe du au t'a ra ta aa ba t'a ha ya /
analyzed: sngags ni / aom g'a dzam ta gho rat a'a ba t'a tsha ra tshe du au t'a ra ta aa ba t'a ha ya /
translated: Oṃ gāṃ jantā ghoratāvacat sarva tvaṃ ced utāratāvacahāya

original: na ba n'a ri ba ha tra ko th'a su sha ba ra t'a a'a ba ta ha ya /
analyzed: na ba n'a ri ba ha tra ko th'a su sha ba ra t'a a'a ba ta ha ya /
translated: navanāri bhadra trakoṭhasuśabaratāvacahāya

original: k'a h'a te a'a bar ha ya ga ddha ga ya ni te a'a ba t'a ha ya /🔽k'a ba ru ko ko ta b'a la di l'i ko pa ta s'a ha /
analyzed: k'a h'a te a'a bar ha ya ga ddha ga ya ni te a'a ba t'a ha ya / k'a ba ru ko ko ta b'a la di l'i ko pa ta s'a ha /
translated: kāhatāvacahāya gaddhagayanitāvacahāya🔽kāvarukoṭavāladīlikopata sāha

original: se sha si l'a ra ru ru ka ni ke pu ta ma ha ma d'a pi ra mantra pa ddha ta /
analyzed: se sha si l'a ra ru ru ka ni ke pu ta ma ha ma d'a pi ra mantra pa ddha ta /
translated: śaśasilārarukarani ke putramāhamandāpiramantrapaṭṭhata

original: ba dhi shu r'a sa na bhe dzye bhu ta b'am dhi pre ta b'am dhi de ba b'am dhi d'a no b'am dhi /
analyzed: ba dhi shu r'a sa na bhe dzye bhu ta b'am dhi pre ta b'am dhi de ba b'am dhi d'a no b'am dhi /
translated: vaḍiśurāsana bheje bhutaṃ vaṃdhi preta vaṃdhi deva vaṃdhi dānavaṃdhi

original: ma ri y'a ma s'a na b'am dhi k'a la bhee ro b'am dhi /
analyzed: ma ri y'a ma s'a na b'am dhi k'a la bhee ro b'am dhi /
translated: marīyāṃsānavaṃdhi kālabheirovaṃdhi

original: aashta bhee ra ba b'am dhi lo ha ro ha bo n'a si dha sha dha bam dhi p'a na phu la ko b'am dhi /
analyzed: aashta bhee ra ba b'am dhi lo ha ro ha bo n'a si dha sha dha bam dhi p'a na phu la ko b'am dhi /
translated: aṣṭabheirovaṃdhi loharoho vaṃsī dhasadha vaṃdhi pānaphulako vaṃdhi

original: te la ta le ko b'am dhi bh'a ta du dha ko b'am dhi /
analyzed: te la ta le ko b'am dhi bh'a ta du dha ko b'am dhi /
translated: Tella tale ko va dhi bha ta du dhaka ko va dhi.

original: ka ra na ka ra tu ti ko b'a dha shi ram she ram she hra p'a la b'am dhi /
analyzed: ka ra na ka ra tu ti ko b'a dha shi ram she ram she hra p'a la b'am dhi /
translated: Kara na kara tu ti ko va dhashi ram she ram she hrapala va dhi.

original: aa tho ta ra so n'i n'a ai b'am dhi b'a r'a sya ma s'an b'am dhi te r'a sya ka ru b'a b'am dhi /
analyzed: aa tho ta ra so n'i n'a ai b'am dhi b'a r'a sya ma s'an b'am dhi te r'a sya ka ru b'a b'am dhi /
translated: Atho tara so ni na a iva dhi va ra sya ma san va dhi te ra sya kuru va va dhi.

original: tso d'a sya bham s'a su ra b'am dhi sam sha n'i dam ka n'i b'am dhi pa ta /
analyzed: tso d'a sya bham s'a su ra b'am dhi sam sha n'i dam ka n'i b'am dhi pa ta /
translated: Coda sya bham sa su ru va dhi sam sha ni dam ka ni va dhi pa ta.

original: tsha n'i b'am dhi bhe ga na b'am dha to  b'a b'a a'ad ma k'i do h'a a'i /
analyzed: tsha n'i b'am dhi bhe ga na b'am dha to  b'a b'a a'ad ma k'i do h'a a'i /
translated: Tsani va dhi bhe ga na va dhato va va a dam aki do ha a i.

original: bi bi ph'a ta m'a ki du h'a a'i su ba ra mu ra d'a /
analyzed: bi bi ph'a ta m'a ki du h'a a'i su ba ra mu ra d'a /
translated: Vi vi pha ta ma ki du ha a i su vara mu ra da.

original: pi pi ph'a ta m'a ki d'a ba na gi ra /
analyzed: pi pi ph'a ta m'a ki d'a ba na gi ra /
translated: Pi pi pha ta ma ki da va na gi ra.

original: na ba l'a sha aa si ha dz'a ra pi ra pi kam ba ra b'a dhi da ri /
analyzed: na ba l'a sha aa si ha dz'a ra pi ra pi kam ba ra b'a dhi da ri /
translated: Nava la sha a si ha ja ra pi ri kam ba ra va dhi da ri.

original: aa ba de sho re ma ha ma dv'a pi te re manta ki sakt'i /
analyzed: aa ba de sho re ma ha ma dv'a pi te re manta ki sakt'i /
translated: Ava de sho re ma ha ma dva pi te re man taka kis ka ti.

original: au ta ra ko au ta ra b'am dh'i /
analyzed: au ta ra ko au ta ra b'am dh'i /
translated: U tara ko u tara va dhi.

original: da tsha na ko da tsha na n'am dhi pa tsh'i ma ko ba tshi ma b'am dhi /
analyzed: da tsha na ko da tsha na n'am dhi pa tsh'i ma ko ba tshi ma b'am dhi /
translated: Da tsana ko da tsana na va dhi pa tsai ma ko va tshi ma va dhi.

original: purba ko purba b'am dhi /
analyzed: purba ko purba b'am dhi /
translated: Purva ko purva vaṃ dhi.

original: k'a tha k'i ro ti b'am dhi phi re ma ha ma d'a pi r'a se sha si la ra paddha ta mantra /
analyzed: k'a tha k'i ro ti b'am dhi phi re ma ha ma d'a pi r'a se sha si la ra paddha ta mantra /
translated: Kata ke ro ti vaṃ dhi pi re ma ha ma dā pi rā se śa si la ra pad dha ta man tra.

original: b'a dhi d'a r'i me r'i bhakt'i gu ru k'i sikta phu ro mantra a'i sva ri b'a ts'a /
analyzed: b'a dhi d'a r'i me r'i bhakt'i gu ru k'i sikta phu ro mantra a'i sva ri b'a ts'a /
translated: Va dhi dā ri me ri bak tī gu ru kai sik ta phu ro man tra ai sva ri vā tsa.

original: zhes pa'o // r'a sa r'a dze shva ra te bcud len dbang phyug rgyal po'i sbyor ba ni /🔽dngul chu dug bral /
analyzed: zhes pa'o // r'a sa r'a dze shva ra te bcud len dbang phyug rgyal po'i sbyor ba ni / dngul chu dug bral /

analyzed: lga / pi pi ling /

analyzed: (da tu ha ri dra) pho ba ris /
translated: dhatrihari,

original: 'bras bu gsum /
analyzed: 'bras bu gsum /
translated: the three fruits,

original: zi ra nag po rnams cha mnyam dang ga pur nyis 'gyur /🔽(kuta) de thams cad dang dan rog dug dbyung tshar ba (ni ri bhi si/) bsnyams par btags la dar la btsags /🔽bhringga r'a dza'i khu bas sbrus la zhag nyer gcig gi bar btags te ril bu pho ris tsam sgril /
analyzed: zi ra nag po rnams cha mnyam dang ga pur nyis 'gyur / (kuta) de thams cad dang dan rog dug dbyung tshar ba (ni ri bhi si/) bsnyams par btags la dar la btsags / bhringga r'a dza'i khu bas sbrus la zhag nyer gcig gi bar btags te ril bu pho ris tsam sgril /
translated: and black zira, all in equal parts, and double the amount of camphor.🔽All of these and dhenrog are weighed equally.🔽Grind all of these on a cloth and mix with the juice of bhringraj. Make pills the size of a jujube fruit.

original: ril bu re bhringga (k'a ra dz'i ra/) r'a dza'i khu bas rta byas (ku shas/) btang na rlung tshad gsar rnying thams cad la phan /
analyzed: ril bu re bhringga (k'a ra dz'i ra/) r'a dza'i khu bas rta byas (ku shas/) btang na rlung tshad gsar rnying thams cad la phan /
translated: If one takes one pill with the juice of bhringraj, it will cure all new and old types of vata disorders.

original: bye kar dang mnyam du btang na mkhris tshad gsar rnying thams cad la phan zhing zas gang zos kyang 'grims 'gro ba la btang na yang chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bye kar dang mnyam du btang na mkhris tshad gsar rnying thams cad la phan zhing zas gang zos kyang 'grims 'gro ba la btang na yang chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is taken with bekkar, it will benefit all new and old hot disorders. If it is taken after any food, it will also be beneficial.

original: chang la pi pi ling phye ma btab pas rta byas btang na bad kan la brten pa'i tshad pa 'joms par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chang la pi pi ling phye ma btab pas rta byas btang na bad kan la brten pa'i tshad pa 'joms par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is taken with the addition of pippali powder, it will conquer hot disorders based on baekan.

original: ra ma'i gcin gyis rta byas nas btang na pho ba'i nad m'a la dzva re la phan /
analyzed: ra ma'i gcin gyis rta byas nas btang na pho ba'i nad m'a la dzva re la phan /
translated: If it is taken with the addition of goat’s urine, it will benefit stomach disorders.

original: som pha dang pho ris bsnan la btang na tshad pa'i rigs thams cad la phan /🔽skyu ru ra dang ba'i mar bsnan la btang na pho ba na zhing dbugs mi thon pa la phan /🔽n'i ba'i lo ma dang mnyam du zos na ai ka'i nad la phan /
analyzed: som pha dang pho ris bsnan la btang na tshad pa'i rigs thams cad la phan / skyu ru ra dang ba'i mar bsnan la btang na pho ba na zhing dbugs mi thon pa la phan / n'i ba'i lo ma dang mnyam du zos na ai ka'i nad la phan /
translated: If it is taken with the addition of somo and pori, it will benefit all types of hot disorders.🔽If it is taken with the addition of sour plums and butter, it will benefit stomach pain and dyspnea.🔽If it is eaten with the leaves of ne’u, it will benefit eye diseases.

original: bhringga ra'i khu bar (dang ga mi bde ba dang lcags dreg gi nad go snyod) sbyar te mig la byugs na mig ser la phan no //
analyzed: bhringga ra'i khu bar (dang ga mi bde ba dang lcags dreg gi nad go snyod) sbyar te mig la byugs na mig ser la phan no //
translated: If the juice of bhringra is applied to the eyes, it will benefit jaundice.

original: som pha dang la la phud bsnan te byin na bud med kyi bu btsas pa'i rjes su sked pa dang tshang ra na ba la phan /
analyzed: som pha dang la la phud bsnan te byin na bud med kyi bu btsas pa'i rjes su sked pa dang tshang ra na ba la phan /
translated: If one gives it mixed with soma and la la, it will benefit a woman’s waist and vagina after giving birth.

original: ka ra dang mnyam du btang na zas (skyigs bu'i) skom tsha grang gang 'grims pa gcod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ka ra dang mnyam du btang na zas (skyigs bu'i) skom tsha grang gang 'grims pa gcod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one takes it with sugar, it will stop any kind of thirst, whether hot or cold.

original: p'a na dang mnyam du btang na mkhris pa'i nad la phan /
analyzed: p'a na dang mnyam du btang na mkhris pa'i nad la phan /
translated: If one takes it with pāna, it will benefit bile disorders.

original: ba'i mar sar dang mnyam du zos na bud med mngal chags nas mi gnas pa gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ba'i mar sar dang mnyam du zos na bud med mngal chags nas mi gnas pa gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one eats it with ghee, it will cause a woman who is pregnant but has an unstable womb to stabilize.

original: ra'i 'o mas rta byas btang na dangs ma 'dzag pa chod do //
analyzed: ra'i 'o mas rta byas btang na dangs ma 'dzag pa chod do //
translated: If one takes it with the milk of a goat, it will stop the loss of semen.

original: skyu ru ra'i khu bas rta byas te btang na dmu chu 'jog pa la phan @310b par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skyu ru ra'i khu bas rta byas te btang na dmu chu 'jog pa la phan @310b par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one takes it with the juice of emblic myrobalan, it will benefit ascites.

original: nim bu'i khu bar sbyar la sna bug tu blug na mgo phyed na ba la phan zhing mig la byugs na 'byung po'i gnod pa la phan /
analyzed: nim bu'i khu bar sbyar la sna bug tu blug na mgo phyed na ba la phan zhing mig la byugs na 'byung po'i gnod pa la phan /
translated: If one puts it in the nose mixed with nimbu juice, it will benefit a headache. If one rubs it on the eyes, it will benefit harm from spirits.

original: 'u su dang ba mar bsnan nas btang na sbrul gyi dug la phan /
analyzed: 'u su dang ba mar bsnan nas btang na sbrul gyi dug la phan /
translated: If one takes it mixed with ushīra and butter, it will benefit snake venom.

original: lga'i khu bas rta byas nas btang na sdig pa'i dug la phan /🔽n'a ga du /
analyzed: lga'i khu bas rta byas nas btang na sdig pa'i dug la phan / n'a ga du /
translated: If one takes it with the juice of garlic, it is beneficial for the poison of sin.

original: shpa dang mnyam du btang na gnyid chung du 'gro'o //
analyzed: shpa dang mnyam du btang na gnyid chung du 'gro'o //
translated: If one takes it with Naga du and Shapa, it reduces sleep.

original: ma la kanggu ni dang mnyam du btang na lus stobs 'phel lo //
analyzed: ma la kanggu ni dang mnyam du btang na lus stobs 'phel lo //
translated: If one takes it with Malakanini, it increases physical strength.

original: gong gsal (ni nyat) rnams nyin bdun re'i bar gtong zhing zas spyod nad so so'i skabs thob sbyor /
analyzed: gong gsal (ni nyat) rnams nyin bdun re'i bar gtong zhing zas spyod nad so so'i skabs thob sbyor /
translated: The above are taken for seven days, and diet and conduct are applied according to the individual illness.

original: spyi sman go ra tso li'i sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: spyi sman go ra tso li'i sbyor ba ni /
translated: The general medicine preparation of Gorocini is as follows:

original: li shi / (gla sgang) dz'a ti'i me tog / sman chen /
analyzed: li shi / (gla sgang) dz'a ti'i me tog / sman chen /
translated: Lishi, Laagang, Jati flower, Menchen,

original: ku ta ki /
analyzed: ku ta ki /
translated: Kutiki,

original: mu sa li /
analyzed: mu sa li /
translated: Musali,

original: sug sme la /
analyzed: sug sme la /
translated: Sugme,

original: ba ya bi rangga /
analyzed: ba ya bi rangga /
translated: Vayu,

original: ma nu khrag can /
analyzed: ma nu khrag can /
translated: Manuk,

original: gi wam / ko ra /
analyzed: gi wam / ko ra /
translated: Givam, Kor,

original: ma ra ha ti /
analyzed: ma ra ha ti /
translated: Marhati,

original: dngul chu / bong nga dmar po //
analyzed: dngul chu / bong nga dmar po //
translated: mercury, red ochre,

original: mu zi ser po /
analyzed: mu zi ser po /
translated: yellow sulfur,

original: ba bla / dan rog dug bral rnams zho gsum re dang ; (dze la ba tri/) la la phud zho bco lnga rnams zhib par btags pa dar (aa la tsi) la btsags /
analyzed: ba bla / dan rog dug bral rnams zho gsum re dang ; (dze la ba tri/) la la phud zho bco lnga rnams zhib par btags pa dar (aa la tsi) la btsags /
translated: babchi, and non-poisonous aconite, each three sho, and Jelevatri, each fifteen sho, are finely ground and mixed with curd.

original: (zho phyed gnyis) bhringga r'a dza'i khu bas sprus la rdo gzhong nang du nyin nyi (bong nga dkar po bcag nas dkyil ljang khu yod pa gnyis) shu rtsa gcig gi bar nyed cing skabs skabs su nyi mar cung zad bstan /
analyzed: (zho phyed gnyis) bhringga r'a dza'i khu bas sprus la rdo gzhong nang du nyin nyi (bong nga dkar po bcag nas dkyil ljang khu yod pa gnyis) shu rtsa gcig gi bar nyed cing skabs skabs su nyi mar cung zad bstan /
translated: Mix two parts of curd with the juice of bhṛṅgarāja, and dry it in a stone dish for one day.

original: sa ha de pa'i khu bas sbrus la nyin gsum gyi bar nyes la ril bu sma ru mgo nag tsam sgril zhos rta byas nas btang na chu ser rlung ldan la phan /
analyzed: sa ha de pa'i khu bas sbrus la nyin gsum gyi bar nyes la ril bu sma ru mgo nag tsam sgril zhos rta byas nas btang na chu ser rlung ldan la phan /
translated: Mix white Indian aconite with the juice of sahadeva, and dry it for three days. Make pills the size of a black-headed needle, and take them with curd. This is beneficial for chhuser disorders associated with loong.

original: nyin bdun gyi bar btang ngo //
analyzed: nyin bdun gyi bar btang ngo //
translated: Take it for seven days.

original: danda phye mar btags /
analyzed: danda phye mar btags /
translated: Grind danda into powder.

original: gong gi ril bu las sum 'gyur gyis che ba bcas btang na sbyongs phebs so //
analyzed: gong gi ril bu las sum 'gyur gyis che ba bcas btang na sbyongs phebs so //
translated: Take pills three times the size of the above, and the disorder will be purified.

original: ba mar gsar pas khu ba byas nyin rer ril bu bzhi re nyi ma bdun gyi bar btang na rlung gi nad dang me drod nyams pa mig gi rab rib la phan no //
analyzed: ba mar gsar pas khu ba byas nyin rer ril bu bzhi re nyi ma bdun gyi bar btang na rlung gi nad dang me drod nyams pa mig gi rab rib la phan no //
translated: Make a juice with fresh cow butter, and take four pills per day for seven days. This is beneficial for loong disorders, impaired digestive heat, and eye floaters.

original: bhringga r'a dza'i (aa randi) khu bas rta byas nyi ma gcig la ril bu bzhi btang na rlung rigs 'dar bu la phan no //
analyzed: bhringga r'a dza'i (aa randi) khu bas rta byas nyi ma gcig la ril bu bzhi btang na rlung rigs 'dar bu la phan no //
translated: If one takes four pills in one day with the juice of bhringaraja as the vehicle, it will help the type of vata called trembling.

original: ra'i 'o mas rta byas nas btang na dangs ma 'dzag pa tsha grang gang la yang phan /
analyzed: ra'i 'o mas rta byas nas btang na dangs ma 'dzag pa tsha grang gang la yang phan /
translated: If one takes it with the juice of ra as the vehicle, it will help both hot and cold disorders of seminal discharge.

original: pa'i chus rta byas te btang na nas pa gong dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: pa'i chus rta byas te btang na nas pa gong dang 'dra'o //
translated: If one takes it with the juice of pi as the vehicle, it will help as above.

original: yang dangs ma chu dang mnyam du 'dzag cing nad zug byed na go yu dang mnyam du btang bas @311a * //
analyzed: yang dangs ma chu dang mnyam du 'dzag cing nad zug byed na go yu dang mnyam du btang bas @311a * //
translated: If the seminal fluid is discharged together with urine and causes pain, it will help if one takes it together with goyu.

original: phan no // yang khrag tu 'dzag na aa ba la'i khu bas rta byas btang na phan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phan no // yang khrag tu 'dzag na aa ba la'i khu bas rta byas btang na phan par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is discharged with blood, it will help if one takes it with the juice of avab.

original: nim bu'i khu bar sbyar la mig la byugs na 'byung po gang gis kyang glags mi rnyad  do //
analyzed: nim bu'i khu bar sbyar la mig la byugs na 'byung po gang gis kyang glags mi rnyad  do //
translated: If one applies it to the eyes mixed with nimbu juice, no spirit will be able to harm one.

original: 'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma thur mgo gsum tsam dang ril bu bzhi mnyam du btang na mas rlung gyen log dang stod (skyu ru ra) rlung sogs rlung rigs dang yan lag zha ba la phan /
analyzed: 'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma thur mgo gsum tsam dang ril bu bzhi mnyam du btang na mas rlung gyen log dang stod (skyu ru ra) rlung sogs rlung rigs dang yan lag zha ba la phan /
translated: If one takes three finger-breadths of the powder of the three fruits and four pills together, it helps the downward-moving and upward-moving winds, and the various types of wind disorders of the upper body.

original: yang zi ra dkar po dang mnyam du btang na yang mas rlung gyen log dang stod rlung sogs rlung rigs la phan no //
analyzed: yang zi ra dkar po dang mnyam du btang na yang mas rlung gyen log dang stod rlung sogs rlung rigs la phan no //
translated: If one takes it together with white zera, it also helps the downward-moving and upward-moving winds, and the various types of wind disorders of the upper body.

original: aa ma li zho gang dang ril bu bzhi mnyam du btang na chu 'tshag rgyu chen po med pa la yang yang 'tshag dgos shing btsags pa dang na tsha chen po yong ba la phan /
analyzed: aa ma li zho gang dang ril bu bzhi mnyam du btang na chu 'tshag rgyu chen po med pa la yang yang 'tshag dgos shing btsags pa dang na tsha chen po yong ba la phan /
translated: If one takes one se of amala and four pills together, it helps those who have frequent and painful urination even though there is no great obstruction of urine.

original: sho mo sa dang mnyam du btang na dangs ma 'phel zhing 'dod pa spyod nus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sho mo sa dang mnyam du btang na dangs ma 'phel zhing 'dod pa spyod nus par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one takes it together with shomo, the essence increases and one becomes able to enjoy sex.

original: zi ra nag po dang mnyam du chur brdar nas so na ba'i thad kyi phyi la byug sa na zug gzer 'phral du zhi'o //
analyzed: zi ra nag po dang mnyam du chur brdar nas so na ba'i thad kyi phyi la byug sa na zug gzer 'phral du zhi'o //
translated: If one grinds it with black zera and applies it externally to the gums where the teeth hurt, the pain is immediately relieved.

original: thang phrom gyi lo ma nyung zad dang ril bu re btang na grang mkhris kyi nad la phan /
analyzed: thang phrom gyi lo ma nyung zad dang ril bu re btang na grang mkhris kyi nad la phan /
translated: If a small amount of the leaves of tangtrom and a pill are administered, it is beneficial for cold-tripa disorders.

original: (mi thi) si b'a ra dang lhan du brdar nas bse dug gi rma dang shu ba la byugs na 'phral du phan /
analyzed: (mi thi) si b'a ra dang lhan du brdar nas bse dug gi rma dang shu ba la byugs na 'phral du phan /
translated: If ground together with sowa and applied to wounds of snake venom and sores, it is immediately beneficial.

original: 'bras chur spangs pa'i khu bas rta byas btang na btsan dug sbyar dug gyur dug sogs dug (dha dhu ra) rigs thams cad la mchog tu phan no //
analyzed: 'bras chur spangs pa'i khu bas rta byas btang na btsan dug sbyar dug gyur dug sogs dug (dha dhu ra) rigs thams cad la mchog tu phan no //
translated: If the liquid of rice boiled in water is administered as an enema, it is extremely beneficial for all types of poison, such as poisonous plants, poisonous animals, and compounded poisons.

original: bod spangs kyi khu ba la sbyar nas lus (chu dar sngon po) la bsku mnye byas na 'dus pa'i nad la phan no //
analyzed: bod spangs kyi khu ba la sbyar nas lus (chu dar sngon po) la bsku mnye byas na 'dus pa'i nad la phan no //
translated: If the liquid of boiled Tibetan spangs is applied as a massage to the body, it is beneficial for contagious disorders.

original: bhringga r'a dza'i khu bas rta byas khong du btang kyang 'dus nad la phan no //
analyzed: bhringga r'a dza'i khu bas rta byas khong du btang kyang 'dus nad la phan no //
translated: If the liquid of boiled bhringraj is administered as an enema, it is beneficial for contagious disorders.

original: phag brun mer bsregs pa'i thal ba dang bong bu'i gcin la ril bu brdar nas sna la blug na mirgi'i mgo la 'bu yod pa'i me chu nyi zla sogs 'od can la bltas na sa rgyal zer gyi 'gyel 'gro ba'i nad la mchog tu phan /
analyzed: phag brun mer bsregs pa'i thal ba dang bong bu'i gcin la ril bu brdar nas sna la blug na mirgi'i mgo la 'bu yod pa'i me chu nyi zla sogs 'od can la bltas na sa rgyal zer gyi 'gyel 'gro ba'i nad la mchog tu phan /
translated: If one makes a pill from the ashes of burnt pig feces and donkey urine and inserts it into the nose, it is supreme for the illness of falling down due to the sun, moon, and so forth, which are luminous, being seen in the head of a man with lice.

original: chang gis rta byas nas btang na par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chang gis rta byas nas btang na par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one inserts it into the vagina, it is supreme for the illness of a woman with a difficult delivery.

original: shing aa ka la ka ra'i phye ma dang mnyam du btang na bad kan skya smug mtha' (lan gsum gyi) dag la phan no //
analyzed: shing aa ka la ka ra'i phye ma dang mnyam du btang na bad kan skya smug mtha' (lan gsum gyi) dag la phan no //
translated: If one takes it together with the powder of akalak, it is beneficial for the various types of white and brown phlegm.

original: zangs kyi snod du ba'i zho khyor gang tsam blug par ril bu btab ste legs par bsnur la khong du btang na ma 'ju ba'i rigs thams cad la phan no //
analyzed: zangs kyi snod du ba'i zho khyor gang tsam blug par ril bu btab ste legs par bsnur la khong du btang na ma 'ju ba'i rigs thams cad la phan no //
translated: If one puts a pill into a copper vessel with one khyor of fresh butter, heats it well, and ingests it, it is beneficial for all types of indigestion.

original: @311b bye ka ra dang mnyam du btang na mkhris pa la phan /
analyzed: @311b bye ka ra dang mnyam du btang na mkhris pa la phan /
translated: If one takes it together with sugar, it is beneficial for bile.

original: sbrang rtsi dang mnyam du zos na lus stobs bskyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sbrang rtsi dang mnyam du zos na lus stobs bskyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one eats it together with honey, it will increase physical strength.

original: pa thu ba'i lo ma brdungs pa dang mnyam du btang na mkhris pa sha ser dang rdel nad la phan /
analyzed: pa thu ba'i lo ma brdungs pa dang mnyam du btang na mkhris pa sha ser dang rdel nad la phan /
translated: When taken with pounded betel leaves, it is beneficial for jaundice, skin diseases, and gallstones.

original: ma nu khrag can chung ngu dang mnyam du btang na gseb dri sogs lus kyi rngul chen po'i dri dang chu rtags kyi dri ngan pa la phan /
analyzed: ma nu khrag can chung ngu dang mnyam du btang na gseb dri sogs lus kyi rngul chen po'i dri dang chu rtags kyi dri ngan pa la phan /
translated: When taken with a small amount of blood-generating maṇuk, it is beneficial for the foul smell of sweat and urine, such as the smell of pus.

original: sle tres dang mnyam du btang na grang ba 'dzag pa tsha grang mtha' dag la phan /
analyzed: sle tres dang mnyam du btang na grang ba 'dzag pa tsha grang mtha' dag la phan /
translated: When taken with letrh, it is beneficial for cold discharge and all kinds of hot and cold disorders.

original: nye shing pa dang mnyam du btang na rlung gis na zug byed pa dang ba byi ba sogs la phan /
analyzed: nye shing pa dang mnyam du btang na rlung gis na zug byed pa dang ba byi ba sogs la phan /
translated: When taken with nyeshing, it is beneficial for pain caused by vata and for scabies.

original: la la phud shu dag gnyis phye mar btags pa dang mnyam du btang na rked pa na ba la phan /
analyzed: la la phud shu dag gnyis phye mar btags pa dang mnyam du btang na rked pa na ba la phan /
translated: When taken with the two powders of lala and phud shhu dag, it is beneficial for pain in the waist.

original: (bag ni dril nas za) chus rta byas nas lo gsum zla ba gsum zhag gsum nyi ma'i sum cha gsum gyi bar dril bu re bar ma chad par bsten na lus kyi nad gsar rnying thams cad 'byang zhing lus stobs 'phel ba dang rgas kha srab sogs phan
analyzed: (bag ni dril nas za) chus rta byas nas lo gsum zla ba gsum zhag gsum nyi ma'i sum cha gsum gyi bar dril bu re bar ma chad par bsten na lus kyi nad gsar rnying thams cad 'byang zhing lus stobs 'phel ba dang rgas kha srab sogs phan
translated: If one rings a bell continuously for three years, three months, and three days, while riding a horse in water, all new and old illnesses of the body will be purified, the body's strength will increase, and the face will become less wrinkled and so forth.

original: yon bsam las 'das so //
analyzed: yon bsam las 'das so //
translated: The benefits are beyond imagination.

original: nad par gtong skabs zas spyod sogs nad babs dang bstun te skabs dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: nad par gtong skabs zas spyod sogs nad babs dang bstun te skabs dang sbyar ro //
translated: When giving to the sick, food, conduct, and so forth should be adjusted according to the condition of the illness.

original: skran gyi sman la danda'i rtsa ba zho bzhi /
analyzed: skran gyi sman la danda'i rtsa ba zho bzhi /
translated: For a medicine for tumors, use four measures of dandelion root,

original: lga dang kha ru tsha zho phye do re /
analyzed: lga dang kha ru tsha zho phye do re /
translated: one measure each of turmeric and alum,

original: shing kun se ba lnga rnams chu phor pa gsum la btab la cha gnyis gdus pa'i phor gang khong du btang na rlung skran 'phral du zhig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shing kun se ba lnga rnams chu phor pa gsum la btab la cha gnyis gdus pa'i phor gang khong du btang na rlung skran 'phral du zhig par 'gyur ro //
translated: and five measures of shingkun. Boil these in three bowls of water until one bowl remains. If this is taken internally, it will immediately destroy wind tumors.

original: yang 'gron bu mer bsregs pa'i thal ba /🔽pho ris / pi pi ling /
analyzed: yang 'gron bu mer bsregs pa'i thal ba / pho ris / pi pi ling /
translated: Also, use the ash of burnt conch shell,🔽male urine,🔽pippali,🔽turmeric,

translated: citraka,

original: dang shing tsha phyed bcas zhib par btags la thur mgo do tsam chu skol gyis rta byas btang na skran gyi rigs mtha' dag la phan /
analyzed: dang shing tsha phyed bcas zhib par btags la thur mgo do tsam chu skol gyis rta byas btang na skran gyi rigs mtha' dag la phan /
translated: Mix the above ingredients well, and take one thum-sized dose with boiled water. This is beneficial for all types of tumors.

original: ke la ka'i rtsa ba /
analyzed: ke la ka'i rtsa ba /
translated: Mix equal parts of the root of Kelek,

original: danda'i rtsa ba /
analyzed: danda'i rtsa ba /
translated: the root of Dandi,

original: lga / tsi tra /
analyzed: lga / tsi tra /
translated: Laga, Citraka,

original: rgyam tsha rnams cha mnyam dang shing kun cha phyed bcas dang thun tsam chur gdu lug sa gong bzhin byas btang na rlung la brten pa'i ma zhu ba'i skran zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyam tsha rnams cha mnyam dang shing kun cha phyed bcas dang thun tsam chur gdu lug sa gong bzhin byas btang na rlung la brten pa'i ma zhu ba'i skran zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and Gyam tsha, half the amount of Shingkun, and one thum-sized dose with water. Take it like a decoction. This will pacify tumors caused by loong.

original: aa ru ra dang lga cha mnyam la shing kun cha phyed bcas zhib par btags pa thur mgo do tsam chu skol gyis 'phul te btang na me drod nyams pa'i skran zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: aa ru ra dang lga cha mnyam la shing kun cha phyed bcas zhib par btags pa thur mgo do tsam chu skol gyis 'phul te btang na me drod nyams pa'i skran zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Mix equal parts of Arura and Laga, half the amount of Shingkun, and take one thum-sized dose with boiled water. This will pacify tumors caused by impaired digestive heat.

original: rgyam tsha / kha ru tsha /
analyzed: rgyam tsha / kha ru tsha /
translated: Mix equal parts of Gyam tsha, Kharu tsha,

original: lga / tsi tra /
analyzed: lga / tsi tra /
translated: Laga, Citraka,

original: ba ru ra /
analyzed: ba ru ra /
translated: and Varuna, and take one thum-sized dose with water. This will pacify tumors caused by tripa.

original: pi pi ling gi rtsa ba rnams cha mnyam pa dang shing kun cha phyed bcas zhib par btags la thun tshad gong bzhin chu skol gyis 'phul te btang na khrag la brten pa'i ma 'ju ba'i skran zhi bar 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: pi pi ling gi rtsa ba rnams cha mnyam pa dang shing kun cha phyed bcas zhib par btags la thun tshad gong bzhin chu skol gyis 'phul te btang na khrag la brten pa'i ma 'ju ba'i skran zhi bar 'gyur ro ;
translated: Take equal parts of the roots of white and black pipiling, and half the quantity of kushtha. Grind them finely, and take the powder with boiled water in the above mentioned dose. This will cure blood-based tumors.

original: /'gron thal / lga /
analyzed: /'gron thal / lga /
translated: Take equal parts of trivrita,

original: pi pi ling /
analyzed: pi pi ling /
translated: pipiling,

original: li shi / dz'a ti /
analyzed: li shi / dz'a ti /
translated: lishhi, jati,

original: kha ru tshva rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu skol gyis 'phul btang na rlung skran zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kha ru tshva rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu skol gyis 'phul btang na rlung skran zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and kha ru tshawa. Grind them finely, and take the powder with boiled water. This will cure wind-based tumors.

original: pho ris / pi pi ling /
analyzed: pho ris / pi pi ling /
translated: Take pori, pipiling,

original: lga / la la phud /
analyzed: lga / la la phud /
translated: la la phud,

analyzed: zi ra nag po rnams cha mnyam dang shing kun cha phyed bcas phye mar btags la chu skol gyis 'phul nas btang na chu skran zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and black jiraka, all in equal parts, and half the quantity of kushtha. Grind them finely, and take the powder with boiled water. This will cure water-based tumors.

original: pho ris / pi pi ling /
analyzed: pho ris / pi pi ling /
translated: Take pori, pipiling,

original: lga / la la phud /
analyzed: lga / la la phud /
translated: la la phud,

original: rgyam tsha / tsi tra /
analyzed: rgyam tsha / tsi tra /
translated: gyam tsha, chitraka,

original: zi ra nag po //
analyzed: zi ra nag po //
translated: and black jiraka.

original: shing kun rnams cha bsnyams pa zhib par btags la chu skol gyis 'phul nas btang na skran gyi rigs thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //🔽lga / tig ta /
analyzed: shing kun rnams cha bsnyams pa zhib par btags la chu skol gyis 'phul nas btang na skran gyi rigs thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro // lga / tig ta /
translated: Mix all the ingredients in equal proportions, grind them into a fine powder, and administer with boiled water. This will cure all types of tumors.🔽Ghee,🔽white sugar,

original: pi pi ling /🔽la la phud /🔽aa ka la ka ra /
analyzed: pi pi ling / la la phud / aa ka la ka ra /
translated: long pepper,🔽white sugar,🔽licorice,

original: li shi / khu ra sha na /
analyzed: li shi / khu ra sha na /
translated: and khurashana

analyzed: pi pi ling gi rtsa ba rnams cha mnyam thang thun tsam chu sum gnyis gdus pa'i khu ba phor gang btang na mkhris skran zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: are taken in equal proportions, and one cup of the decoction of two-thirds of the water is administered. This will cure bile tumors.

original: pho ris / pi pi ling /
analyzed: pho ris / pi pi ling /
translated: Pholhe, long pepper,

original: lga / (tsi t'a ya ta) rgyam tsha /
analyzed: lga / (tsi t'a ya ta) rgyam tsha /
translated: citraka,
