analyzed: la la phud rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la ba mar (lang thang rtse) btsags bcad pas rta byas gtong zhing cung zad lus la byugs na bud med bu btsas pa'i rjes su khrag @312b mkhris kyi skran byung ba la phan no //
translated: and lalaphul are taken in equal proportions, ground into a fine powder, and administered with butter as a vehicle. If a little is applied to the body, this will benefit the occurrence of blood and bile tumors after a woman gives birth.

original: sprul sha dang lga cha mnyam zhib par btags pa dar la btsags te se ba bcu drug re chu bskol gyis rta byas btang na dmu chu /
analyzed: sprul sha dang lga cha mnyam zhib par btags pa dar la btsags te se ba bcu drug re chu bskol gyis rta byas btang na dmu chu /
translated: Mix equal parts of snake meat and red ochre, strain it through cloth, and take sixteen doses of it with boiling water. This will cure ascites,

original: skya rbab kyis skrangs pa /
analyzed: skya rbab kyis skrangs pa /
translated: swelling caused by ascites,🔽bile,

original: mkhris pa / rlung /
analyzed: mkhris pa / rlung /
translated: wind,

original: mgo na ba /
analyzed: mgo na ba /
translated: headaches,

original: pho ba na ba sogs nad gsar rnying mtha' dag la phan /
analyzed: pho ba na ba sogs nad gsar rnying mtha' dag la phan /
translated: stomach pain, and so forth. It will cure all new and old diseases.

original: sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa me la bsregs pa zhib par btags pa mig la byugs na mig gi nad thams cad la phan zhing mig gsal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa me la bsregs pa zhib par btags pa mig la byugs na mig gi nad thams cad la phan zhing mig gsal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If you apply to the eyes a paste made from the cast-off skin of a snake burned in fire, it will cure all eye diseases and improve your eyesight.

original: sbrul shun dang ba'i 'o ma mkhur bkang byas na so'i nad thams cad la phan no //
analyzed: sbrul shun dang ba'i 'o ma mkhur bkang byas na so'i nad thams cad la phan no //
translated: If you fill your mouth with the skin of a snake and cow’s milk, it will cure all diseases of the teeth.

original: sbrul shun zhib par btags pa ba zho btsags pas sbrus la ril bu sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam sgril la khong du btang na za 'phrug la phan /
analyzed: sbrul shun zhib par btags pa ba zho btsags pas sbrus la ril bu sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam sgril la khong du btang na za 'phrug la phan /
translated: Make pills the size of two beans from a paste made from the skin of a snake mixed with curds and buttermilk. If you take them internally, they will cure itching.

original: gnyen 'bur gyis skrangs par sbrul gyi khrag byugs na myur du phan /
analyzed: gnyen 'bur gyis skrangs par sbrul gyi khrag byugs na myur du phan /
translated: If you apply snake blood to a swelling caused by a boil, it will quickly help.

original: rma bya'i sgro mdongs me la bsregs pa'i thal ba chu grang gis 'phul nas btang na khrag sogs skyug pa'i rigs chod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rma bya'i sgro mdongs me la bsregs pa'i thal ba chu grang gis 'phul nas btang na khrag sogs skyug pa'i rigs chod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one takes the ashes of peacock feathers burned in fire, mixed with cold water, the various types of vomiting of blood and so forth will be stopped.

original: sdig pa mer bsregs pa'i thal ba sran ma tsam chu grang gis rta byas btang na rdel nad 'phral du sel zhing bud med kyi nu ma skrangs pa la yang phan no //
analyzed: sdig pa mer bsregs pa'i thal ba sran ma tsam chu grang gis rta byas btang na rdel nad 'phral du sel zhing bud med kyi nu ma skrangs pa la yang phan no //
translated: If one takes the ashes of burnt sin, the size of a pea, mixed with cold water, it will immediately cure leprosy and it will also help the swollen breasts of a woman.

original: sdig pa mer bsregs pa'i du ba khong par btang na srog chags kyi gnod pa mi 'byung /
analyzed: sdig pa mer bsregs pa'i du ba khong par btang na srog chags kyi gnod pa mi 'byung /
translated: If one inhales the smoke of burnt sin, one will not be harmed by living beings.

original: mi thod zhib par nyes la chur (bhi tshu li) sbyar te byugs na 'bras bu skrangs pa la phan /
analyzed: mi thod zhib par nyes la chur (bhi tshu li) sbyar te byugs na 'bras bu skrangs pa la phan /
translated: If one grinds a human skull and mixes it with water and applies it, it will help a swollen boil.

original: mi thod mer bsregs la thur mgo do tsam re khong du zhag bdun gyi bar btang na 'bras bu skrangs shin tu che ba la phan no //
analyzed: mi thod mer bsregs la thur mgo do tsam re khong du zhag bdun gyi bar btang na 'bras bu skrangs shin tu che ba la phan no //
translated: If one takes a human skull burned in fire, the size of a thumb, and puts it in the stomach for seven days, it will help a very swollen boil.

original: rkang lag gi sen mo gog pa'i nad la khang byil gyi klad pa byugs na 'phral du phan /
analyzed: rkang lag gi sen mo gog pa'i nad la khang byil gyi klad pa byugs na 'phral du phan /
translated: If one applies the brains of a crow to the disease of cracked fingernails and toes, it will help immediately.

original: gdong la gro thig yod par khang byil gyi brun chu la sbyar la nyin bdun gyi bar du byugs na med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gdong la gro thig yod par khang byil gyi brun chu la sbyar la nyin bdun gyi bar du byugs na med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If you apply a paste of the ashes of a burnt house mixed with water to a birthmark on the face for seven days, it will disappear.

original: spyi ther sogs mgo la skra med par rta'i klad pa nyin bdun gyi bar du byugs na skra skye bar 'gyur zhing rgya dang sma ra /
analyzed: spyi ther sogs mgo la skra med par rta'i klad pa nyin bdun gyi bar du byugs na skra skye bar 'gyur zhing rgya dang sma ra /
translated: If you apply a paste of horse brain to the head for seven days, hair will grow on a bald head.

original: (tsi  di) sogs 'dod kyang gong 'dod par byugs (dzha ming) pas skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: (tsi  di) sogs 'dod kyang gong 'dod par byugs (dzha ming) pas skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If you apply a paste of the above to the place where you want hair, hair will grow there, even if you want a moustache or a beard.

original: ma he'i ra (ma he ka sing+ga) skyu ru ra dang mnyam du chu la btsos tshos pa dang bton la mer bsregs pa'i (gho rag nagdza) thal ba gong gi @313a * //
analyzed: ma he'i ra (ma he ka sing+ga) skyu ru ra dang mnyam du chu la btsos tshos pa dang bton la mer bsregs pa'i (gho rag nagdza) thal ba gong gi @313a * //
translated: Boil the dung of a buffalo together with hog’s weed in water. Take it off the heat and burn the resulting ash in a fire.

original: chur btab ste mgo bor byugs na skra shin tu bzang ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chur btab ste mgo bor byugs na skra shin tu bzang ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Mix it with the above water and apply it to the head. Very good hair will grow.

original: de'i rjes su pags mtshams la chu ser 'phel ba'i rtags byung na rva snum gyi dkyil du btsos la byugs pas zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i rjes su pags mtshams la chu ser 'phel ba'i rtags byung na rva snum gyi dkyil du btsos la byugs pas zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: After that, if you see signs of the spread of lymph in the skin, boil it in the middle of oily horns and apply it. It will be pacified.

original: pags nad khol bu ba sen mo btab kyang reg pa mi tshor pa dang skom pa la byi ba'i brun chur brdar ba byugs pas phan no //
analyzed: pags nad khol bu ba sen mo btab kyang reg pa mi tshor pa dang skom pa la byi ba'i brun chur brdar ba byugs pas phan no //
translated: For the treatment of leprosy, if the affected area does not feel the touch of a fingernail, it is beneficial to apply a paste of the ash of a rat’s fur to the thirst.

original: mdze'i bcos thabs ni /
analyzed: mdze'i bcos thabs ni /
translated: The treatment of leprosy is as follows:

original: thog mar mdze la rigs rnam pa bdun te /
analyzed: thog mar mdze la rigs rnam pa bdun te /
translated: First, there are seven types of leprosy:

original: lu ta kushtha /🔽sarba dh'a tu kushtha /
analyzed: lu ta kushtha / sarba dh'a tu kushtha /
translated: Luta kushtha,🔽sarva dhatu kushtha,

original: bi  tsi tra kushtha /
analyzed: bi  tsi tra kushtha /
translated: vicitra kushtha,

original: l'a la kushtha /
analyzed: l'a la kushtha /
translated: lala kushtha,

original: su ya kushtha /
analyzed: su ya kushtha /
translated: suya kushtha,

original: tsandra kushtha / sha shendri kushtha /
analyzed: tsandra kushtha / sha shendri kushtha /
translated: chandra kushtha, and shashendri kushtha.

original: rnams te de yang chu rlung gi mdze la thog mar sha lpags khol bur za zhing brad na chu ser mang du don yong /
analyzed: rnams te de yang chu rlung gi mdze la thog mar sha lpags khol bur za zhing brad na chu ser mang du don yong /
translated: Further, in the case of water wind leprosy, the skin and flesh are eaten away in patches, and when scratched, much lymph oozes out.

original: mkhris rlung la gzhan ma gong dang / (chu rlung thab sal brten pa'i mdze mkhris rlung la brten pa'i mdze grang rlung la brtan pa'i mdze khrag la brten pa'i mdze khrag mkhris la brten pa'i mdze grang mdze sha bkra) 'dra ba la drod shin tu che zhing mdog kyang cung zad dmar la brad na khrag🔽kyang 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: mkhris rlung la gzhan ma gong dang / (chu rlung thab sal brten pa'i mdze mkhris rlung la brten pa'i mdze grang rlung la brtan pa'i mdze khrag la brten pa'i mdze khrag mkhris la brten pa'i mdze grang mdze sha bkra) 'dra ba la drod shin tu che zhing mdog kyang cung zad dmar la brad na khrag kyang 'byung ba'o //
translated: In the case of bile-wind leprosy, the other symptoms are similar to the above, but the heat is very intense and the color is slightly red. If scratched, blood will also come out.

original: grang rlung la thog mar lus khol bur skrangs shing mdog kyang khra bor yong la rjes su tshigs che chung thams cad skrangs shing chu ser 'dzag pa'o //
analyzed: grang rlung la thog mar lus khol bur skrangs shing mdog kyang khra bor yong la rjes su tshigs che chung thams cad skrangs shing chu ser 'dzag pa'o //
translated: In the case of cold-wind leprosy, the body first swells in parts and the color also becomes mottled. Later, all the major and minor joints swell and lymph fluid leaks out.

original: khrag mdze la yan lag dang rna ba sna sogs kyi rtse chad cing rnag khrag 'dzag cing mdog kyang dmar por 'ong ngo //
analyzed: khrag mdze la yan lag dang rna ba sna sogs kyi rtse chad cing rnag khrag 'dzag cing mdog kyang dmar por 'ong ngo //
translated: In the case of blood leprosy, the extremities, ears, nose, and so forth are cut off, pus and blood flow, and the color also becomes red.

original: khrag mkhris la brten pa gzhan ma gong dang 'dra ba la drod shin tu che ba'o //
analyzed: khrag mkhris la brten pa gzhan ma gong dang 'dra ba la drod shin tu che ba'o //
translated: In the case of cold-blood leprosy, the other symptoms are similar to the above, but the heat is very intense.

original: grang mdze mdog dkar zhing rnag khrag chu ser mang du 'dzag go //
analyzed: grang mdze mdog dkar zhing rnag khrag chu ser mang du 'dzag go //
translated: Cold leprosy is white in color and oozes pus, blood, and lymph.

original: sha bkra la rtogs par sla ba'o //
analyzed: sha bkra la rtogs par sla ba'o //
translated: Vitiligo is easy to recognize.

original: de dag gi sman ni /
analyzed: de dag gi sman ni /
translated: The medicine for these is as follows.

original: aa ru ra gser mdog dang nag chung /
analyzed: aa ru ra gser mdog dang nag chung /
translated: Grind together golden-colored myrobalan, black aconite,🔽cow-butter,

original: btsod / du ba ral pa /
analyzed: btsod / du ba ral pa /
translated: tobacco,

original: btsan dug / ka na bi ra'i rtsa ba rnams zhib par btags la ba'i chus sbrus nas nad gang yod la byugs na chu rlung gi mdze dang mkhris rlung gi mdze la phan no //
analyzed: btsan dug / ka na bi ra'i rtsa ba rnams zhib par btags la ba'i chus sbrus nas nad gang yod la byugs na chu rlung gi mdze dang mkhris rlung gi mdze la phan no //
translated: and Indian aconite root. Mix this with goat’s milk and apply it to the affected area. This will help leprosy caused by water-wind and bile-wind.

original: zangs kyi par bu'i nang du /🔽mu zi ser po //
analyzed: zangs kyi par bu'i nang du / mu zi ser po //
translated: In a copper bowl,🔽grind together yellow bitumen,

original: tsha la / yung ba /
analyzed: tsha la / yung ba /
translated: salt,

original: (dzhi ri ta ra da nanygrishtha gram hya dh'u rasta) aam ba'i (sha 'bras kyi skogs ba) 'bras bu rnams cha mnyam zhib bar btags la tsi t'a'i shing gong gi cha gcig dang // gi wa kva ra'i shing cha gsum bcas blugs la kha legs par bcad /
analyzed: (dzhi ri ta ra da nanygrishtha gram hya dh'u rasta) aam ba'i (sha 'bras kyi skogs ba) 'bras bu rnams cha mnyam zhib bar btags la tsi t'a'i shing gong gi cha gcig dang // gi wa kva ra'i shing cha gsum bcas blugs la kha legs par bcad /
translated: and indigo. Mix these with one part of the bark of the citraka plant and three parts of the bark of the guduch plant. Seal the mixture well.

original: de rdza'i khog ma che ba zhig gi nang du bcug @313b la kha bsdams te thab me rtag pa'i thab gong du zla ba drug gi bar du bzhag / de nas bton la phye mar byas te ra'i 'o ma dang sbyar nas byugs pas grang rlung gi mdzes🔽tshigs skrangs pa 'bral du zhi'o //
analyzed: de rdza'i khog ma che ba zhig gi nang du bcug @313b la kha bsdams te thab me rtag pa'i thab gong du zla ba drug gi bar du bzhag / de nas bton la phye mar byas te ra'i 'o ma dang sbyar nas byugs pas grang rlung gi mdzes tshigs skrangs pa 'bral du zhi'o //
translated: Then, remove it, make it into a powder, and apply it mixed with goat’s milk. This will cure the swelling of the joints caused by cold-loong disorders.

original: mu zi ser po //🔽thang phrom gnyis til snum gyi nang du bskyur la ma tshig bar me btang /
analyzed: mu zi ser po // thang phrom gnyis til snum gyi nang du bskyur la ma tshig bar me btang /
translated: Yellow bitumen🔽and buckwheat are soaked in sesame oil and heated until they are not burning hot.

original: de nas grang thag chod pa dang byugs pas mkhris rlung la brten pa'i mdze la phan no //
analyzed: de nas grang thag chod pa dang byugs pas mkhris rlung la brten pa'i mdze la phan no //
translated: When it is very cold, apply it. This is beneficial for leprosy based on tripa-loong disorders.

original: mu zi ser po //
analyzed: mu zi ser po //
translated: Yellow bitumen

original: 'bras bu gsum /
analyzed: 'bras bu gsum /
translated: and the three fruits

original: ma nu khrag can /🔽sgron me shing gi 'bru mngar skyur gnyis yong ba'i skyur ba /
analyzed: ma nu khrag can / sgron me shing gi 'bru mngar skyur gnyis yong ba'i skyur ba /
translated: are soaked in the blood of a red-maned lion and the blood of a red-maned tigress.

original: til nag rnams cha mnyam bhringga r'a dza'i thang chu dang mnyam du btags la byugs na khrag mdze la phan no /
analyzed: til nag rnams cha mnyam bhringga r'a dza'i thang chu dang mnyam du btags la byugs na khrag mdze la phan no /
translated: The sour part of the two sour fruits of the lamp tree and the sour part of the fruit of the sweet tree are mixed with black sesame seeds in equal parts and applied with the decoction of bhring raaja. This is beneficial for blood leprosy.

original: (/ kon po dang pags pa se ko ltar sang ba'i za phrug la phan/) ha rim bi cha gcig / pho ris cha gnyis /
analyzed: (/ kon po dang pags pa se ko ltar sang ba'i za phrug la phan/) ha rim bi cha gcig / pho ris cha gnyis /
translated: One part of Harimvibha, two parts of Phori,

original: (tsa di) mi thod bsregs pa'i thal ba cha gsum rnams zhib par btags la chu grang gis rta byas btang bas mdze nad kyi rigs thams cad la phan no //
analyzed: (tsa di) mi thod bsregs pa'i thal ba cha gsum rnams zhib par btags la chu grang gis rta byas btang bas mdze nad kyi rigs thams cad la phan no //
translated: three parts of ash from burnt human skull, all finely ground, mixed with cold water and drunk, cures all types of leprosy.

original: khyung sder smug po //
analyzed: khyung sder smug po //
translated: Brown vulture claws,

original: dong ga'i 'bru /
analyzed: dong ga'i 'bru /
translated: seeds of Aconitum ferox,

original: n'i ba / b'a ya bi rangga /
analyzed: n'i ba / b'a ya bi rangga /
translated: Nyiwa,🔽red and green Bonga,

original: (bong nga dmar po nang ljang gu/) pi pi ling /
analyzed: (bong nga dmar po nang ljang gu/) pi pi ling /
translated: Pippali,

original: tsi tra / mu zi ser po //
analyzed: tsi tra / mu zi ser po //
translated: citraka, yellow bitumen,

original: pong dmar nad ljang rnams cha mnyam zhib par (thur mgo do tsam) btags la thun thur mgo do tsam re chu grang gis rta byas btang na yang mdze rigs (gu ri bu cha r'a dza briksha) kun la phan /
analyzed: pong dmar nad ljang rnams cha mnyam zhib par (thur mgo do tsam) btags la thun thur mgo do tsam re chu grang gis rta byas btang na yang mdze rigs (gu ri bu cha r'a dza briksha) kun la phan /
translated: red and green Pung, all finely ground to the size of a thumb joint, one thumb joint of this taken with cold water, cures all types of leprosy.🔽Laga,

original: lga / pi pi ling /
analyzed: lga / pi pi ling /
translated: Pippali,

original: pho ri sa /🔽dong ga'i 'bru /
analyzed: pho ri sa / dong ga'i 'bru /
translated: Phorisa,🔽seeds of Aconitum ferox,

original: bong dmar / skyu ru ra /
analyzed: bong dmar / skyu ru ra /
translated: red Bonga,🔽and tamarind.

original: ba ru ra rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la ba'i zhun mar la sbyar te byugs na chu rlung la brten pa'i mdze la phan /
analyzed: ba ru ra rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la ba'i zhun mar la sbyar te byugs na chu rlung la brten pa'i mdze la phan /
translated: Mix equal parts of the above ingredients, grind them well, and apply them to the pus. This is beneficial for leprosy based on water and wind.🔽Garlic,

original: sgog skya / n'i ba /
analyzed: sgog skya / n'i ba /
translated: naibi,🔽citraka,

original: tsi tra / ba bla /
analyzed: tsi tra / ba bla /
translated: babchi,

original: mu zi ser po //
analyzed: mu zi ser po //
translated: yellow bitumen,

original: ka na bi ra'i rtsa ba /
analyzed: ka na bi ra'i rtsa ba /
translated: kanavir root,🔽sarsum,

original: sarsum / ru dha /
analyzed: sarsum / ru dha /
translated: rudha,

original: sho mo sa lcags btul ma rnams cha mnyam zhib bar btags la chang gis khu ba byas nas rdza snod du blug kha legs par bcad /
analyzed: sho mo sa lcags btul ma rnams cha mnyam zhib bar btags la chang gis khu ba byas nas rdza snod du blug kha legs par bcad /
translated: and iron filings, grind them well, mix them with chang, and put them in a clay pot.

original: gci ba dang rta sbangs rnying pa'i (la bu na) dkyil du zhag nyer gcag gi bar bsnyal /
analyzed: gci ba dang rta sbangs rnying pa'i (la bu na) dkyil du zhag nyer gcag gi bar bsnyal /
translated: Seal the mouth well and bury it in a mixture of old urine and horse manure for twenty-one days.

original: de nas bton la byugs na (sad kha) grang rlung la brten pa'i mdze dang khrag mkhris la brten pa gnyis la mchog tu phan /🔽kha ru tsha /
analyzed: de nas bton la byugs na (sad kha) grang rlung la brten pa'i mdze dang khrag mkhris la brten pa gnyis la mchog tu phan / kha ru tsha /
translated: After that, take it out and apply it. This is supremely beneficial for leprosy based on cold wind and blood and bile.🔽White sugar,🔽dan rag,

original: dan rog / sma ru mgo nag (r'a ti ghum gha tsi) @314a * //
analyzed: dan rog / sma ru mgo nag (r'a ti ghum gha tsi) @314a * //
translated: and black cumin seed,

original: de steng go ra tsi li'i sbyor ba dang po'i ril bu rnams cha mnyam pa zhib par btags pa grang mdze'i rma gang yong la gtsags bu rnon pos rtsa bas de la btab pas phan no //
analyzed: de steng go ra tsi li'i sbyor ba dang po'i ril bu rnams cha mnyam pa zhib par btags pa grang mdze'i rma gang yong la gtsags bu rnon pos rtsa bas de la btab pas phan no //
translated: On top of that, make a paste of equal parts of the first pill preparation of gorocana, and apply it to the wound of cold urticaria with a sharp needle. It will help.

original: mu zi ser po //
analyzed: mu zi ser po //
translated: Yellow bitumen,

original: 'bras bu gsum /
analyzed: 'bras bu gsum /
translated: the three fruits,

original: ma nu khrag can /
analyzed: ma nu khrag can /
translated: manush blood,🔽and tiknak,

original: tig nag / sgron me shing gi 'bru rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa bhringga r'a dza'i khu ba dang sbyar nas byugs na yang grang mdze zha bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tig nag / sgron me shing gi 'bru rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa bhringga r'a dza'i khu ba dang sbyar nas byugs na yang grang mdze zha bar 'gyur ro //
translated: mixed with the juice of bhringraj, will also cure cold urticaria when applied.

original: dan rog / sma ru mgo nag / tsi t'a rnams cha re /
analyzed: dan rog / sma ru mgo nag / tsi t'a rnams cha re /
translated: Each of vulture, black-headed smara, and citra,

original: dzoo sha ra cha gsum /
analyzed: dzoo sha ra cha gsum /
translated: three parts of jushara,

original: lga cha bzhi /
analyzed: lga cha bzhi /
translated: four parts of lac,

original: n'i ba cha lnga rnams zhib par btags chu la sbyar nas byugs na yang grang mdze zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: n'i ba cha lnga rnams zhib par btags chu la sbyar nas byugs na yang grang mdze zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and five parts of neepa, mixed with water, will also cure cold urticaria when applied.

original: dong ga'i 'bru /
analyzed: dong ga'i 'bru /
translated: Seeds of dongka,

original: til nag / lga /
analyzed: til nag / lga /
translated: black sesame, lac,🔽and

original: bu ram rnams cha mnyam la zhib par btags pa ril bu skyu ru ra'i 'bru tsam byas btang (tshva'i rigs lce 'bigs pa lta bu) na grang mdze dang sha bkra la phan no //
analyzed: bu ram rnams cha mnyam la zhib par btags pa ril bu skyu ru ra'i 'bru tsam byas btang (tshva'i rigs lce 'bigs pa lta bu) na grang mdze dang sha bkra la phan no //
translated: For cold leprosy and vitiligo, take equal parts of jaggery and finely ground salt, make it into pills the size of a jujube fruit, and administer it.

original: sman de rnams gtong ba'i ring pag thug ma gtogs dkar skyur dmar gsum thams cad 'dzem /
analyzed: sman de rnams gtong ba'i ring pag thug ma gtogs dkar skyur dmar gsum thams cad 'dzem /
translated: During the administration of these medicines, avoid all sour, astringent, and bitter foods except for barley soup.

original: ya ma'i bcos la yang rigs gsum ste /
analyzed: ya ma'i bcos la yang rigs gsum ste /
translated: There are also three types of treatment for yamo:

original: aa da si si /
analyzed: aa da si si /
translated: adasis,

original: p'i n'a sa /🔽na thu ra rnams so //
analyzed: p'i n'a sa / na thu ra rnams so //
translated: panasa,🔽and natura.

original: de rnams kyi sman ni /
analyzed: de rnams kyi sman ni /
translated: The medicines for these are:

original: phag tshil / bu ram /
analyzed: phag tshil / bu ram /
translated: pig fat, jaggery,

original: lug gi mar gsum cha mnyam mer bskol la grang ba dang snar blugs na ya ma dkar po la phan no //
analyzed: lug gi mar gsum cha mnyam mer bskol la grang ba dang snar blugs na ya ma dkar po la phan no //
translated: and sheep butter, taken in equal parts and heated until warm. When cooled, inhale it through the nose. This is beneficial for white yamo.

original: bye kar / kunggu /
analyzed: bye kar / kunggu /
translated: Sand, kunu,

original: ba mar / gsum cha mnyam pa mer (ya ma dkar po ya ma khra bo ya ma nag po chag rdol rgyab yod) bskol ba grang ba dang snar blugs kyang phan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ba mar / gsum cha mnyam pa mer (ya ma dkar po ya ma khra bo ya ma nag po chag rdol rgyab yod) bskol ba grang ba dang snar blugs kyang phan par 'gyur ro //
translated: and sheep butter, taken in equal parts and heated until warm. When cooled, inhale it through the nose. This will also be beneficial.

original: yang na / shing mngar ;
analyzed: yang na / shing mngar ;
translated: Alternatively, use shingngar,

analyzed: bye kar / aa ma li'i 'bru /

analyzed: ru rta / shu dag / tsan dan dmar po //

original: aa shva gandha rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la ba'i chu dang sbyar nas snar blugs na sna nas 'bu don yong zhing phan la mgo 'khor la yang phan no //

analyzed: yang pho ris bu ram gnyis cha mnyam btags la chang skyur la sbyar nas snar blugs kyang phan no //

analyzed: 'bras bu gsum dang pi pi ling cha mnyam btags la sbrang rtsis ril bu byas te khong du btang zhing /

analyzed: sbrang rtsi chur sbyangs pas rta byas snar blugs kyang phan zhing sna khrag 'dzag pa dang kha'i dri ngan pa la phan no //

analyzed: nag po la / skyu ru ra zhib par (mgo gzhogs phyed na ba la) btags la ba mar dar mnyam du bskol te gang na sar byugs pas phan /

analyzed: se 'bru'i me tog dang d'u ba gnyis kyi khu ba ra'i 'o ma dang bsres la snar blugs pas phan no ;

analyzed: dza mu na'i 'bru / d'u ba / se 'bru'i me tog gsum gyi khu ba snar blugs na phan zhing sna khrag kyang 'chad do //

analyzed: yang na / lga dang danda'i rtsa ba chang skyur la (ku sum bha ba) sbyar nas gang na sar ba sku mnye byas na phan /

analyzed: la la phud /

analyzed: yang gong gi lte ba 'phyus pa'i nad de la nad pa rang gis rgyab tu lag pa g-yas kyis rkang pa g-yon gyi mthe bong zin /
translated: Furthermore, for the disease of the navel being swollen mentioned above, the patient should hold the big toe of the left foot with the right hand on the back.

original: lag pa g-yon gyis rkang pa g-yas kyi mthe bong zin /
analyzed: lag pa g-yon gyis rkang pa g-yas kyi mthe bong zin /
translated: Hold the big toe of the right foot with the left hand.

analyzed: @315b de nas mi zhig gis lag pa bsnol mtshams nas lan bdun gyi bar du btegs pas kyang 'phral du phan zhing nad par 'phral du zug gzer che bar yong yang de la tshad mi dgos so //
translated: Then, lift the hand from the wrist up to seven times. This is beneficial immediately. Although the patient may experience severe pain immediately, it is not a complication.🔽Jāti,

original: dz'a ti / aa ph'i ma /🔽ga pur / gla rtsi /
analyzed: dz'a ti / aa ph'i ma / ga pur / gla rtsi /

analyzed: thang phrom / so ma ra tsa rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa dar la btsags pa thun tshad skyu ru ra tsam sbrang rtsi dang mnyam du btang na zas mdog dang khrag sogs gang 'grims pa'i rigs gsar rnying tsha grang kun la phan /
translated: and tagara in equal parts should be finely ground, strained through cloth, and taken in a dose the size of a jujube fruit together with honey. This is beneficial for all types of new and old hot and cold disorders, regardless of the color of the food or blood that is being transformed.

original: tshad pa sogs (kasbur kastu ri) skom nad sel ba'i sman ni /
analyzed: tshad pa sogs (kasbur kastu ri) skom nad sel ba'i sman ni /

original: 'bras bu gsum /
analyzed: 'bras bu gsum /

original: rgyam tshva / la la phud rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thur mgo do tsam re chu phor gang gi nang du blugs la phyed tsam skam pa dang grang thag bcad ras la btsags te khong du btang na phan no //
analyzed: rgyam tshva / la la phud rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thur mgo do tsam re chu phor gang gi nang du blugs la phyed tsam skam pa dang grang thag bcad ras la btsags te khong du btang na phan no //
translated: Mix Gyam tsha, La la phud and La la in equal quantity and grind them into fine powder. Take one thum-sized dose of the powder with one bowl of water. When half of the water is consumed, stop drinking and strain the remaining water with a cloth. This will help.

original: yang mkhris tshad la brten pa kho nas skom na /
analyzed: yang mkhris tshad la brten pa kho nas skom na /
translated: If one is thirsty only due to hot disorder,

original: pho ris dang bye kar mnyam zhib par btags pa ka ka ra singga'i khu bas rta byas btang na phan /
analyzed: pho ris dang bye kar mnyam zhib par btags pa ka ka ra singga'i khu bas rta byas btang na phan /
translated: take a mixture of Phur tsha and Bye kar ground into fine powder with the addition of a small amount of white sugar. This will help.

original: chu bsgrims pa la /🔽tsha la mer bsregs pa'i thal ba thur mgo do tsam ba dar gyis rta byas btang na myur du phebs so //
analyzed: chu bsgrims pa la / tsha la mer bsregs pa'i thal ba thur mgo do tsam ba dar gyis rta byas btang na myur du phebs so //
translated: For retention of urine,🔽take a dose of one thum-sized amount of ash of burnt Tsha la with a cloth strainer. This will help to release the urine quickly.

original: rgyam tsha dang kha ru tsha zhib par btags la chu bcus nas zhag gcig song bas rta byas btang na yang phebs so //
analyzed: rgyam tsha dang kha ru tsha zhib par btags la chu bcus nas zhag gcig song bas rta byas btang na yang phebs so //
translated: Mix Gyam tsha and Kharu tsha in equal quantity and grind them into fine powder. Add water and leave it overnight. Take a dose of the mixture with a strainer. This will also help to release the urine.

original: byi ba'i brun pa'i dar bas khu ba byas brdar la rdo rje dang 'bras bu gnyis dang mgo bo'i mtshog ma la byugs khong du yang cung zad btang bas myur du phebs nges so //
analyzed: byi ba'i brun pa'i dar bas khu ba byas brdar la rdo rje dang 'bras bu gnyis dang mgo bo'i mtshog ma la byugs khong du yang cung zad btang bas myur du phebs nges so //
translated: Make a paste of the juice of the root of the plant with the ashes of a mouse's excrement. Rub it on the crown of the head and also ingest a little of it. It is certain that it will quickly descend.

original: 'jam 'bras kyi snying po zhib par btags shel kar dang mnyam du chus rta byas la btang na yang phebs so //
analyzed: 'jam 'bras kyi snying po zhib par btags shel kar dang mnyam du chus rta byas la btang na yang phebs so //
translated: Also, if you take a fine powder of the heart of a mango fruit mixed with water and sugar, it will descend.

original: lha mo dbu mas lha dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba /
analyzed: lha mo dbu mas lha dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba /
translated: The middle goddess supplicated the god Maheśvara:

original: kye lha yi lha mchog dbang phyug che //
analyzed: kye lha yi lha mchog dbang phyug che //
translated: Oh, god of gods, Maheśvara,

original: khyed ni 'jig rten byed po ste //🔽nad kun zhi zhing blo 'phel pa'i /
analyzed: khyed ni 'jig rten byed po ste // nad kun zhi zhing blo 'phel pa'i /
translated: you are the creator of the world.🔽Please teach me the supreme medicine

original: (/ kam tsha) sman mchog bdag la bstan du gsol //
analyzed: (/ kam tsha) sman mchog bdag la bstan du gsol //

original: zhes gsol ba dang / dbang phyug gis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: zhes gsol ba dang / dbang phyug gis bka' stsal pa /
translated: Maheśvara replied:

original: nyon cig ri sras dpal chen mo //
analyzed: nyon cig ri sras dpal chen mo //

original: nad 'joms blo 'phel yon tan gter //
analyzed: nad 'joms blo 'phel yon tan gter //
translated: The treasure of qualities that conquers disease and increases intelligence

original: sman mchog ma la k'am gu ni'i //
analyzed: sman mchog ma la k'am gu ni'i //
translated: is the supreme medicine called Malaka.

original: bsten thabs phan yon bshad par bya //
analyzed: bsten thabs phan yon bshad par bya //
translated: I will explain the method of relying on it and its benefits.

original: de la dang por bshal skyugs @316a * //
analyzed: de la dang por bshal skyugs @316a * //
translated: First, one should wash the body with emetics and purges.

original: kyis lus dag par bkrus la nyin dang por ma la k'am gu ni'i 'bru gcig / gnyis par gnyis /
analyzed: kyis lus dag par bkrus la nyin dang por ma la k'am gu ni'i 'bru gcig / gnyis par gnyis /
translated: On the first day, one should take one seed of mahlaka or guduchi; on the second day, two seeds;

original: de nas rim bzhin nyin bdun gyi bar 'bru re spar /
analyzed: de nas rim bzhin nyin bdun gyi bar 'bru re spar /
translated: and so on, increasing the number of seeds by one each day until the seventh day.

original: nyin bdun nas bzung zla ba gcig dang zhag bcu'i bar 'bru bdun re bsten /
analyzed: nyin bdun nas bzung zla ba gcig dang zhag bcu'i bar 'bru bdun re bsten /
translated: From the seventh day on, one should take seven seeds a day for one month and ten days.🔽In the meantime, one should avoid all foods that are antagonistic to the seeds.

original: de bar zas gang la'ang tshva ba'i rigs 'joms par rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa sogs tsha grang gsar rnying thams cad rtsa ba nas 'byin par byed cing /
analyzed: de bar zas gang la'ang tshva ba'i rigs 'joms par rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa sogs tsha grang gsar rnying thams cad rtsa ba nas 'byin par byed cing /
translated: This will completely eliminate all hot and cold disorders, whether new or chronic, such as those of wind, bile, and phlegm.

original: lus brtan pa dang / gzi brjid che ba dang / nad dkon pa /
analyzed: lus brtan pa dang / gzi brjid che ba dang / nad dkon pa /
translated: It will stabilize the body, increase one’s splendor, and make one less susceptible to illness.

original: mig gsal ba /
analyzed: mig gsal ba /
translated: It will improve one’s eyesight.

original: stobs 'phel ba sogs yon tan mtha' yas shing /
analyzed: stobs 'phel ba sogs yon tan mtha' yas shing /
translated: It will increase one’s strength and so on. It has infinite qualities.

original: khyad par blo gros padma kha phye ba ltar gyur nas blo rno ba /
analyzed: khyad par blo gros padma kha phye ba ltar gyur nas blo rno ba /
translated: In particular, it will open the lotus of the intellect, making one sharp-witted.

original: 'dzin bzang ba /
analyzed: 'dzin bzang ba /
translated: It will improve one’s memory.

original: rig pa gsal ba /
analyzed: rig pa gsal ba /
translated: It will make one’s awareness clear.

original: brjed mi 'gro ba /
analyzed: brjed mi 'gro ba /
translated: It will prevent one from forgetting things.

original: rtsod pa bzang ba sogs blo 'phel gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtsod pa bzang ba sogs blo 'phel gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro //
translated: It will make one’s debates excellent and so on. It will be the supreme means of increasing one’s intellect.

original: yang tshes bco lnga dang gza' nyi ma 'dzom pa'i mtshan mo ma la k'am gu ni'i snum gyi sgron me sbar /
analyzed: yang tshes bco lnga dang gza' nyi ma 'dzom pa'i mtshan mo ma la k'am gu ni'i snum gyi sgron me sbar /
translated: Also, on the night when the fifteenth day of the month coincides with a Sunday, light a lamp with oil of malaka or gunja.

original: de la rkun po'i thod pa bkab nas du ba chags su bcug pa de mig la byugs na mig chus ma dag par lha 'dre mi gsum gang gis kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la rkun po'i thod pa bkab nas du ba chags su bcug pa de mig la byugs na mig chus ma dag par lha 'dre mi gsum gang gis kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Cover it with a thief’s skull and let it smoke. Rub this on the eyes. As long as the eyes are not washed, neither gods, demons, nor humans will be able to see.🔽Also, on a day when Jupiter is present, pour water into old, boiled-down oil of malaka or gunja.

original: yang gza' lhag pa yod pa'i nyi ma k'am gu ni'i snum khol ma rnying pa'i nang du chu blug / de steng ma la k'am gu ni'i zhib par btags pa btab la ba skol ba grangs su bcug pa'i snum kha zhag ltar yong ba zos la rting par
analyzed: yang gza' lhag pa yod pa'i nyi ma k'am gu ni'i snum khol ma rnying pa'i nang du chu blug / de steng ma la k'am gu ni'i zhib par btags pa btab la ba skol ba grangs su bcug pa'i snum kha zhag ltar yong ba zos la rting par
translated: Place on top of that malaka or gunja that has been finely ground. Cook it until the oil is the consistency of ghee. Eat it.

original: byugs na mdze rigs kyis yan lag chad 'gro ba sogs par 'gyur zhing gdong mdzes shing mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byugs na mdze rigs kyis yan lag chad 'gro ba sogs par 'gyur zhing gdong mdzes shing mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Rub it on the soles of the feet. It will cause the limbs of those with leprosy to fall off, and so forth. It will make the face beautiful and radiant.

original: nyin nyer gcig gi bar snum se ba bcu gnyis re khong du btang na mdze'i rigs mtha' dag rtsa ba nas thon par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyin nyer gcig gi bar snum se ba bcu gnyis re khong du btang na mdze'i rigs mtha' dag rtsa ba nas thon par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one takes twelve sebum pills a day for twenty-one days, all types of gout will be completely eliminated.

original: yang gza' nyi ma yod pa'i nyin snod gtsang mar ba nag mo'i 'o ma bskol /
analyzed: yang gza' nyi ma yod pa'i nyin snod gtsang mar ba nag mo'i 'o ma bskol /
translated: On a day when the sun is present, boil black cow’s milk in a clean container.

original: de la ma la k'am gu ni'i zhib par btags la btab ste ru ma dang bcas zho bsnyal /
analyzed: de la ma la k'am gu ni'i zhib par btags la btab ste ru ma dang bcas zho bsnyal /
translated: Add ground malaka or guduchi to it, and when it has boiled and the whey has been removed, cool it.

original: de dkrogs te mar btsos la 'bras ba nag mo'i 'o mar bcos ba'i mar de nas se ba bcu gnyis re btab pa zla ba gcig dang zhag bcu'i bar zos na /
analyzed: de dkrogs te mar btsos la 'bras ba nag mo'i 'o mar bcos ba'i mar de nas se ba bcu gnyis re btab pa zla ba gcig dang zhag bcu'i bar zos na /
translated: Stir the milk and cook it with ghee. Take twelve sebum pills of that ghee prepared with black cow’s milk and eat it for one month and ten days.

original: skra dang sma ra dkar por song ba slar yang nag por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skra dang sma ra dkar por song ba slar yang nag por 'gyur ro //
translated: White hair and beard will become black again.

original: gza' mig @316b dmar yod pa'i nyin ba nag mo'i mar btsags bcad la phyed tsam grang bar ma la k'am gu ni'i 'bru dar til nag cha mnyam phye mar btags pa blug ste nyin dang por se ba bcu gnyis /
analyzed: gza' mig @316b dmar yod pa'i nyin ba nag mo'i mar btsags bcad la phyed tsam grang bar ma la k'am gu ni'i 'bru dar til nag cha mnyam phye mar btags pa blug ste nyin dang por se ba bcu gnyis /
translated: On a day when Mars is present, strain black cow’s ghee and add half of it when it is cool. Add ground malaka or guduchi seeds, black sesame seeds, and an equal amount of flour. On the first day, take twelve sebum pills.

original: gnyis par zho gang se ba bzhi sogs nyin bdun gyi bar du cha re spar /
analyzed: gnyis par zho gang se ba bzhi sogs nyin bdun gyi bar du cha re spar /
translated: In the second month, add one part of curd, one part of sugar, and so on, for seven days.

original: de nas rgyun du bsten thub na rab de min zla gcig dang zhag bcu'i bar du bsten na tshe shin tu ring bar 'gyur zhing gong du 'gro yang mgyogs bul rta dang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas rgyun du bsten thub na rab de min zla gcig dang zhag bcu'i bar du bsten na tshe shin tu ring bar 'gyur zhing gong du 'gro yang mgyogs bul rta dang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one can continue to rely on this, it is best. Otherwise, if one relies on it for one month or ten days, one’s life will become very long, and one will progress more quickly or slowly like a horse.

original: zhes lha dbang phyag gis lha mo dbu mar gdams pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: zhes lha dbang phyag gis lha mo dbu mar gdams pa rdzogs so /
translated: Thus concludes the instruction of the goddess to the god Indra on the middle goddess.

original: // / aa shva gandha zhib par btags pa'i phye ma zho gsum /🔽ba dkar rkyang nag rkyang lta bu spu mdog gang yin kyang mdog gzhan ma 'dres pa'i kha gtsang gi mar btsags bcad pa'i nang du btab ste 'khang pa dang bud med dus bab kyi zla mtshan 'dzag nas tshad pa'i nyin khong du btang na bud med phru gu
analyzed: // / aa shva gandha zhib par btags pa'i phye ma zho gsum / ba dkar rkyang nag rkyang lta bu spu mdog gang yin kyang mdog gzhan ma 'dres pa'i kha gtsang gi mar btsags bcad pa'i nang du btab ste 'khang pa dang bud med dus bab kyi zla mtshan 'dzag nas tshad pa'i nyin khong du btang na bud med phru gu
translated: Take three measures of finely ground ashwagandha powder,🔽and add it to the inner part of pure butter from a white cow or a black yak, whose fur is of the same color and not mixed with any other color. If it is ingested on the day of a woman’s menstrual flow, which is the time of her menstrual period, it will definitely cause a woman who has not had a child

original: mi yong ba'ang nges par sbrum par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi yong ba'ang nges par sbrum par 'gyur ro //
translated: to become pregnant.

original: yang sim gha da /
analyzed: yang sim gha da /
translated: Also, simha dā,🔽laṅka,

original: lga / bha ta ka tee ya /
analyzed: lga / bha ta ka tee ya /
translated: bhata kaṭe,

original: pi pi ling /
analyzed: pi pi ling /
translated: pippalī,

original: n'a ga ge sar rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa dar la btsags pa thur mgo gsum ba mdog gcig gi 'o ma khyor gang tsam la btab ste dus gong mtshungs la byin na'ang nges par mngal dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: n'a ga ge sar rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa dar la btsags pa thur mgo gsum ba mdog gcig gi 'o ma khyor gang tsam la btab ste dus gong mtshungs la byin na'ang nges par mngal dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Take naga gesar and make it into a paste with an equal amount of water. Take one khyor of this paste with one khyor of milk from a cow of the same color as the paste. Take this at the same time as above and you will definitely become pregnant.

original: ma la chags kyang mi gnas par 'jig na /
analyzed: ma la chags kyang mi gnas par 'jig na /
translated: If the fetus is not retained but is lost due to attachment to the mother,

original: l'a la ka ma la'i rtsa ba ba'i 'o mar btsos /
analyzed: l'a la ka ma la'i rtsa ba ba'i 'o mar btsos /
translated: cook the root of lala kama in cow's milk.

original: de nas slar yang ba mar gyi nang du btsos la zhib par btags la gong gi ba mar bzhu ba dang mnyam du btang na 'jig par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas slar yang ba mar gyi nang du btsos la zhib par btags la gong gi ba mar bzhu ba dang mnyam du btang na 'jig par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Then cook it again in ghee, make it into a fine paste, and give it with the above melted ghee. It will not be lost.

original: yang bilba'i 'bru dang smyug ma'i lo ma cha mnyam zhib par btags la chus rta byas nas nyin bdun gyi bar btang kyang mi 'jig go //
analyzed: yang bilba'i 'bru dang smyug ma'i lo ma cha mnyam zhib par btags la chus rta byas nas nyin bdun gyi bar btang kyang mi 'jig go //
translated: Also, make a paste of equal parts of bilva fruit and bamboo leaves, mix it with water, and give it for seven days. It will not be lost.

original: mig sman gyi (zhag bdun nad kyang grag 'ong) sbyor thabs ni /
analyzed: mig sman gyi (zhag bdun nad kyang grag 'ong) sbyor thabs ni /
translated: The method of preparation for eye medicine:🔽surma,

original: surma / ldong ros /
analyzed: surma / ldong ros /
translated: longro,

original: sa mu dra pha la rgya mtsho (sa mu dra phen) lbu ba /
analyzed: sa mu dra pha la rgya mtsho (sa mu dra phen) lbu ba /
translated: samudra phena,🔽and

original: mu tig / byi dang ga bsdu ba sha pa ri ya /🔽phat ki di /
analyzed: mu tig / byi dang ga bsdu ba sha pa ri ya / phat ki di /
translated: are mixed in equal parts and finely ground.🔽Coral,

original: byu ru / lo dha /
analyzed: byu ru / lo dha /
translated: and lodh

original: pho ris rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags dar la legs par btsags /
analyzed: pho ris rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags dar la legs par btsags /
translated: are mixed in equal parts and finely ground.

original: @317a * // 'khar snod du tsan dan dmar po'i skya ba'i mjug zangs dmar gyis gtums pas nyin phyed tsam skam nyed bya /
analyzed: @317a * // 'khar snod du tsan dan dmar po'i skya ba'i mjug zangs dmar gyis gtums pas nyin phyed tsam skam nyed bya /
translated: They are mixed with red copper and dried for half a day in an iron container over a fire of red sandalwood.

original: de nas bcus nas zhag gcig song ba'i chu cung zad blugs la nyi ma'i bzhi cha gcig tsam bsnur la ril bur dril /🔽skam pa dang rdo 'jam po'i ngos su chu dang lhan du brdar nas mig la byugs na ling tog / steng 'og gi 'gribs /🔽sha 'dzer / mig chu 'dzag pa /
analyzed: de nas bcus nas zhag gcig song ba'i chu cung zad blugs la nyi ma'i bzhi cha gcig tsam bsnur la ril bur dril / skam pa dang rdo 'jam po'i ngos su chu dang lhan du brdar nas mig la byugs na ling tog / steng 'og gi 'gribs / sha 'dzer / mig chu 'dzag pa /
translated: Then, after removing them, a little water is added and they are boiled for one day.🔽They are rolled into pills and dried.🔽If they are rubbed on the eyes with water on a smooth stone, they will benefit all eye diseases, such as cataracts, floaters,

original: rgyang mig mi gsal ba sogs mig gi nad mtha' dag la phan no //
analyzed: rgyang mig mi gsal ba sogs mig gi nad mtha' dag la phan no //
translated: eye discharge,🔽and blurred vision.🔽The flowers of kīkara,

original: ki ka ra'i me tog / rgya gar stod ja /
analyzed: ki ka ra'i me tog / rgya gar stod ja /
translated: Indian tea,🔽gla sgang,

original: gla sgang / khi rni'i 'bru /
analyzed: gla sgang / khi rni'i 'bru /
translated: and kīrni grain

original: pa ta ki ri rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa dar la btsags /
analyzed: pa ta ki ri rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa dar la btsags /
translated: are mixed in equal parts and finely ground.

original: ra'i 'o mas khu ba phyas la ril bu sgril ba zhos khub byas brdar nas mig steng 'og gang rigs kyis bsgribs nas mi mthong bar byugs na mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ra'i 'o mas khu ba phyas la ril bu sgril ba zhos khub byas brdar nas mig steng 'og gang rigs kyis bsgribs nas mi mthong bar byugs na mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Mix the juice of the plant with the milk of a goat, roll it into pills, and dry them. If one applies this to the eyes, covering the upper and lower eyelids as appropriate, so that one cannot see, one will be able to see.

original: ri phyugs kyi gci ba ser kha ma me la bsregs pa'i thal ba zhib par btags /
analyzed: ri phyugs kyi gci ba ser kha ma me la bsregs pa'i thal ba zhib par btags /
translated: Mix the urine of a cow with the ash of the burned beak of a crow.

original: der chur blugs la ras sam dar la tshags thengs gnyis byas /🔽de nas chu de dangs su bcug la dal bus pho bas mthil du chags pa'i thal ba de skams pa dang / 'khar snod du pang kha'i snum  dang lhan du tsan dan gyi skya ba zangs gtums can gyis nyi ma gsum gyi bar bsnur ba chung ngu re mig la byugs na sha 'dzer dang /
analyzed: der chur blugs la ras sam dar la tshags thengs gnyis byas / de nas chu de dangs su bcug la dal bus pho bas mthil du chags pa'i thal ba de skams pa dang / 'khar snod du pang kha'i snum  dang lhan du tsan dan gyi skya ba zangs gtums can gyis nyi ma gsum gyi bar bsnur ba chung ngu re mig la byugs na sha 'dzer dang /
translated: Add water to this and strain it twice through cloth or silk.

original: dmar por song ba sogs khrag la brten pa'i mig nad thams cad la phan /
analyzed: dmar por song ba sogs khrag la brten pa'i mig nad thams cad la phan /
translated: Then, let the water settle and slowly dry the ash that remains on the bottom. When it is dry, place it in an iron container together with the oil of the pang khe plant. Rub it with a stick of sandalwood wrapped in copper for three days. If one applies a small amount of this to the eyes, it will help all eye diseases that are based on blood, such as the appearance of red spots and so forth.

original: bdud rtsi mig sman gyi sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: bdud rtsi mig sman gyi sbyor ba ni /
translated: The preparation of nectar eye medicine is as follows.🔽Surma,🔽gser,🔽rdo,

original: surma / gse ra rdo//
analyzed: surma / gse ra rdo//
translated: ldong ro,

original: ldong ros / big pan /
analyzed: ldong ros / big pan /
translated: big pan,

original: pa ti ka ti hirma dzi /🔽pi pi ling /
analyzed: pa ti ka ti hirma dzi / pi pi ling /
translated: Pati, kati, hiranya, jivaka,🔽pippali,

original: pho ris / rgyam tsha /
analyzed: pho ris / rgyam tsha /
translated: pori, gyam tsha,

original: ku ru p'a la /🔽ba ru ra'i 'bru'i nang gi sting po /
analyzed: ku ru p'a la / ba ru ra'i 'bru'i nang gi sting po /
translated: kurpara,

original: sha pa ri ya rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa dar la btsags /
analyzed: sha pa ri ya rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa dar la btsags /
translated: and the inner part of varu ra’i dru all in equal parts are finely ground and mixed with silk.🔽In a very smooth stone bowl, add water and stir until it becomes like a thin yogurt. Dry it once.

original: rdo gzhong shin tu 'jam po'i nang du (son makshi) chu bcus nas zhag gcig song ba sa gar sla zho tsam sbrus pa skam thag mchod par nyed thengs gcig / de nas nyi mar cung zad cig bzhag / yang bud med bu skyes pa'i 'o mas gar sla
analyzed: rdo gzhong shin tu 'jam po'i nang du (son makshi) chu bcus nas zhag gcig song ba sa gar sla zho tsam sbrus pa skam thag mchod par nyed thengs gcig / de nas nyi mar cung zad cig bzhag / yang bud med bu skyes pa'i 'o mas gar sla
translated: Then leave it in the sun for a while, and again stir it with the yogurt of a woman who has given birth to a child.🔽Before it dries, dry it once.

original: gong tsam byas pa ma skam par nyed thengs gcig / de bzhin du ba'i 'o mas thengs @317b gcig / ra'i 'o mas thongs gcig sprus pa'i ma skam tsam la ril bu sgril la skam thag chod pa dang sbrang rtsis rta byas brdar nas mig la byugs na
analyzed: gong tsam byas pa ma skam par nyed thengs gcig / de bzhin du ba'i 'o mas thengs @317b gcig / ra'i 'o mas thongs gcig sprus pa'i ma skam tsam la ril bu sgril la skam thag chod pa dang sbrang rtsis rta byas brdar nas mig la byugs na
translated: In the same way, stir it once with cow’s milk, once with goat’s milk, and once with sheep’s milk. Before it dries, roll it into pills. When it is completely dry, grind it with honey and apply it to the eyes.

original: rlung la brten pa'i mig nad thams cad la phan /
analyzed: rlung la brten pa'i mig nad thams cad la phan /
translated: It is beneficial for all eye diseases based on loong.

original: ra'i 'o mas khu ba byas nas byugs na srod long la phan /
analyzed: ra'i 'o mas khu ba byas nas byugs na srod long la phan /
translated: If one applies a paste made with the milk of a she-goat, it will help night blindness.

original: bud med kyi 'o mas khu ba byas nas byugs na khrag rlung la brten pa'i mig nad thams cad la phan /🔽pa'i gcin gyis khu ba byas nas byugs na mig tsha zhing mig rnag mang du 'dzag pa la phan /
analyzed: bud med kyi 'o mas khu ba byas nas byugs na khrag rlung la brten pa'i mig nad thams cad la phan / pa'i gcin gyis khu ba byas nas byugs na mig tsha zhing mig rnag mang du 'dzag pa la phan /
translated: If one applies a paste made with the milk of a woman, it will help all eye diseases based on blood and wind.🔽If one applies a paste made with the urine of a donkey, it will help when the eyes are hot and there is a lot of eye discharge.

original: 'u su'i khu bas rta byas byugs na sha 'dzer dang mig dmar por song ba la phan no //
analyzed: 'u su'i khu bas rta byas byugs na sha 'dzer dang mig dmar por song ba la phan no //
translated: If one applies a paste made with the juice of a ushisa plant, it will help when there are eye-popping and red eyes.

original: de rnams ni bdud rtsi mig sman gyi sbyor ba kha bsgyur dang bcas pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: de rnams ni bdud rtsi mig sman gyi sbyor ba kha bsgyur dang bcas pa rdzogs so /
translated: These are the complete instructions for the elixir eye medicine with variations.

original: // / nir ma li /
analyzed: // / nir ma li /
translated: Nir-ma-li:

original: ra tan dze ti skyur ba gnyis cha mnyam zhib par btags 'o mar sbyar te byugs na rgyang mig mi gsal ba la phan //🔽du ba ral pa zho gang /
analyzed: ra tan dze ti skyur ba gnyis cha mnyam zhib par btags 'o mar sbyar te byugs na rgyang mig mi gsal ba la phan // du ba ral pa zho gang /
translated: If one applies a paste made with two equal parts of sour tamarind and sour jeti ground together and mixed with milk, it will help unclear vision.🔽One sang of smoke🔽One sang of mercury

original: dngul chu zho gang /
analyzed: dngul chu zho gang /
translated: One sang of alum

original: rdo thal / dan rog brgya tham pa lce ston /
analyzed: rdo thal / dan rog brgya tham pa lce ston /
translated: One sang of dhenukamasha

original: pho ris brgyad cu /
analyzed: pho ris brgyad cu /
translated: Eighty pho ris

original: danda drug cu tham pa rnams (ka yi pa la zer) zhib par btags nimbu 'i khu bas 'dam btags byas la ril bu dril te pad kha tsam re chu la sbyar nas byugs na 'byung ngo //
analyzed: danda drug cu tham pa rnams (ka yi pa la zer) zhib par btags nimbu 'i khu bas 'dam btags byas la ril bu dril te pad kha tsam re chu la sbyar nas byugs na 'byung ngo //
translated: Then, after the sixty ingredients have been finely ground, mix them with nimbu juice and roll them into pills the size of a lotus petal. Apply them to the eyes by mixing them with water.

original: sha za yi dags la sogs pa gnod pas mig na ba la phan no //
analyzed: sha za yi dags la sogs pa gnod pas mig na ba la phan no //
translated: This is beneficial for eye diseases caused by harm from flesh-eating ghosts and so forth.

original: 'khar snod du nimbu'i chur sma ru mgo nag dkar po zhib par brdar te steng glang po che'i rmig pa nyis 'gyur gyis mang ba zhig tu brdar /
analyzed: 'khar snod du nimbu'i chur sma ru mgo nag dkar po zhib par brdar te steng glang po che'i rmig pa nyis 'gyur gyis mang ba zhig tu brdar /
translated: In a bronze bowl, finely grind black and white asafetida in nimbu juice. Grind it twice as much as the elephant’s hoof.

original: de steng ku kum sma ru mgo nag gi gsum cha gnyis tsam brdar /
analyzed: de steng ku kum sma ru mgo nag gi gsum cha gnyis tsam brdar /
translated: On top of that, grind two-thirds of the black asafetida.

original: de rnams legs par 'dres pa dang mig la nyin gsum nas bdun gyi bar gang rigs 'byug cing sman zhag gang 'byug gi ring phyir mi 'dod /🔽khyad par rlung gi rigs ma phog pa byas pas ling tog / rva /
analyzed: de rnams legs par 'dres pa dang mig la nyin gsum nas bdun gyi bar gang rigs 'byug cing sman zhag gang 'byug gi ring phyir mi 'dod / khyad par rlung gi rigs ma phog pa byas pas ling tog / rva /
translated: When those are well mixed, apply it to the eyes for three to seven days, whichever is appropriate. Do not remove the medicine for as long as it is applied.🔽In particular, by not allowing the wind to blow, it is extremely beneficial for all eye diseases such as cataracts, floaters,

original: sha 'dzer / 'gri bas sogs mig nad mtha' dag la mchog tu phan no //
analyzed: sha 'dzer / 'gri bas sogs mig nad mtha' dag la mchog tu phan no //
translated: and corneal opacities.

original: surma / mi'i skra /
analyzed: surma / mi'i skra /
translated: Surma, human hair,🔽and so forth.

original: yung ba chung ngu bcas brdar la mi'i 'o mas khu ba byas nas mig la byugs na khrag gis mig dmar por song ba dang sha 'dzer la phan /🔽hod len (ba ba ran) @318a * //
analyzed: yung ba chung ngu bcas brdar la mi'i 'o mas khu ba byas nas mig la byugs na khrag gis mig dmar por song ba dang sha 'dzer la phan / hod len (ba ba ran) @318a * //
translated: If one applies a paste made from the above ingredients with human milk, it will benefit bloodshot eyes and eye-lid edema.

original: ser po dang gla rtsi sbyar la byugs na tsha 'khrug mig chu 'dzag ste za phrug byed pa rnams la phan /🔽rgya mtsho lbu ba /🔽aa p'i ma /
analyzed: ser po dang gla rtsi sbyar la byugs na tsha 'khrug mig chu 'dzag ste za phrug byed pa rnams la phan / rgya mtsho lbu ba / aa p'i ma /
translated: If one applies a paste made from yellow ho len and musk, it will benefit the eyes that are red and itchy due to an inflammation of the eyes.

original: si ra sa'i 'bru rnams se ba bzhi re'i rtses zhib par btags /
analyzed: si ra sa'i 'bru rnams se ba bzhi re'i rtses zhib par btags /
translated: Grind the four ingredients of gyatso lbuwa, apa, and sirsha seeds with the tip of four fingers.

original: ba gsar pa'i chu bre gsum lcags snod nang du skya ba'i mgo zangs kyis gtu mas pas dkrugs pa dang me btang la chu phyed tsam skams pa dang / gong gi sman btab ste skyo ma gar phyogs tsam byas slar 'byug skabs ba'i chus klad la byugs na bar 'grib chu 'dzag pa za 'phrug / rdzi ma mig la zug pa sogs mig gi nad thams cad la phan no //
analyzed: ba gsar pa'i chu bre gsum lcags snod nang du skya ba'i mgo zangs kyis gtu mas pas dkrugs pa dang me btang la chu phyed tsam skams pa dang / gong gi sman btab ste skyo ma gar phyogs tsam byas slar 'byug skabs ba'i chus klad la byugs na bar 'grib chu 'dzag pa za 'phrug / rdzi ma mig la zug pa sogs mig gi nad thams cad la phan no //
translated: Boil three dre of fresh cow’s urine in an iron pot with a copper ladle, and when half the liquid has evaporated, add the above ingredients and stir. If one applies this to the eyes and massages the head with fresh cow’s urine, it will benefit all eye diseases such as eye-lid edema, eye discharge, and eye-lashes sticking to the eyes.

original: ka ye pha la zhib mor btags pa chur sbyar te byugs na srod long la phan no //🔽rva ling shin tu che bas khebs shing na na nimbu'i khu bar rgya tshva yungs 'bru tsam re brdar nas ra ling gi thog tu nyin gsum gyi bar blugs pas 'phral bu zug gzer cung zad 'byung yang myur du phan par 'gyur ro /
analyzed: ka ye pha la zhib mor btags pa chur sbyar te byugs na srod long la phan no // rva ling shin tu che bas khebs shing na na nimbu'i khu bar rgya tshva yungs 'bru tsam re brdar nas ra ling gi thog tu nyin gsum gyi bar blugs pas 'phral bu zug gzer cung zad 'byung yang myur du phan par 'gyur ro /
translated: “O father! If you apply a paste of finely ground white mustard seed, it will help with the cataracts.”🔽“If the eyes are covered with very large warts, grind a nimba fruit, a pinch of salt, and a mustard seed in the juice of the nimba fruit and put it in the eyes for three days. Although there will be a little pain in the eyes, it will quickly help.”

original: (/'o ma thang gis) yang mig la rva ling gis cher na na bzhu shel snying po pho ris tsam re zhib par btags la chur sbyar nas nyin gsum gyi bar blugs na nyin dang por zug gzer cung zad ldang / gnyis par mig skrangs po shin tu che zhing zug gzer kyang 'byung /
analyzed: (/'o ma thang gis) yang mig la rva ling gis cher na na bzhu shel snying po pho ris tsam re zhib par btags la chur sbyar nas nyin gsum gyi bar blugs na nyin dang por zug gzer cung zad ldang / gnyis par mig skrangs po shin tu che zhing zug gzer kyang 'byung /
translated: “If the eyes are very swollen with warts, grind a crystal lens the size of a fingernail, mix it with water, and put it in the eyes for three days. On the first day, there will be a little pain. On the second day, the eye will swell very much and there will be pain.

original: nyin gsum par zug gzer skrangs po zhi ba dang (kadzdza) mnyam du rva ling gang yang med par 'gyur zhing 'og 'grib kyis mi mthong ba yang gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: nyin gsum par zug gzer skrangs po zhi ba dang (kadzdza) mnyam du rva ling gang yang med par 'gyur zhing 'og 'grib kyis mi mthong ba yang gsal bar byed do //
translated: On the third day, the swelling and pain will subside, and the goiter will disappear without a trace. It will also clear up eye diseases that are not visible due to a lack of lymph.

original: mig gangs phyid kyis na ba'i zug gzer che na chu grang gtsang ma snod gang yang rung bar blugs la mig ma btsums par gdong chu'i nang du bcug la zug gzer ma chag par bdugs pas myur du phan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mig gangs phyid kyis na ba'i zug gzer che na chu grang gtsang ma snod gang yang rung bar blugs la mig ma btsums par gdong chu'i nang du bcug la zug gzer ma chag par bdugs pas myur du phan par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the pain of snow blindness is severe, fill a clean container with cold water, and without closing the eyes, submerge the face in the water. By inhaling the steam without interrupting the pain, it will quickly help.

original: de bzhin yan lag kha bas phyid pa yang chu grang mo'i nang du bdugs pas phan no //
analyzed: de bzhin yan lag kha bas phyid pa yang chu grang mo'i nang du bdugs pas phan no //
translated: Similarly, if a limb is frostbitten, inhaling the steam in cold water will help.

original: dbang sdong gi thang chu /
analyzed: dbang sdong gi thang chu /
translated: Water extract of the stem of the king of medicinal plants

original: ha la dha /
analyzed: ha la dha /

analyzed: phat ki ri rnams cha mnyam ste ni mba'i khu ba byung na rab de min chur sbyangs nas mig gi phyi nang la byugs pas mig 'bras chen por song zhing mig sprin dmar ba nyin @318b mtshan gnyis kar nad zug shin tu che ba la phan /
translated: If the above ingredients are mixed in equal parts and the juice of nimba is added, it is excellent. Otherwise, after washing in water, apply it to the inside and outside of the eyes. This is beneficial for the eyes becoming large, the eyes becoming red, and for the severe pain of eye diseases during both day and night.

translated: The ingredients are put into a pot with a large belly and a bottom with a hole just big enough to allow the ingredients to come out.🔽The pot is covered with a lid, and the mouth is sealed so that no steam escapes. The pot is then buried in a hole in the ground, with the mouth of the pot just below the surface of the ground.🔽A second pot, slightly smaller than the first, is placed over the first pot, and the space between the two pots is filled with clay.

translated: Then, when it is cold, take it out. The small pot is not small, and the water is below and the oil floats on top. Take it out and add one or two spoonfuls together with jaggery. This is beneficial for all hot and cold disorders caused by vāyu that are not caused by tripa disorders.

analyzed: la phan / li shi dang mnyam du btang na grang ba la brten pa'i nad thams cad la phan /

It is very beneficial for all the chhuser disorders such as edema, urticaria, and joint pain. It is also beneficial for the eye disorders caused by loong and chhuser when applied to the eyes.

translated: Take equal parts of wheat and kyerpa, and one third the quantity of shudag. Put them in a container and extract the oil as above. Take four se of this oil internally. It is a general remedy that is beneficial for all the hot and cold, new and old disorders.

translated: For the treatment of all types of hot and cold disorders, both new and chronic, take three drops of the oil from the above mentioned oil lamp, or four drops of the oil from the above mentioned oil lamp, and mix it with the oil from the above mentioned oil lamp.

translated: Ze tsha, gyaem tsha,

analyzed: tha ram brdungs pa'i 'byar khyis rmugs pa'i rma la dkris na phan /

translated: Pour the fat into a container and mix it with the strained oil. Apply this mixture to the lips and limbs to heal cracks.

original: tshigs pa drug pa'i phan tshun du sor bzhi re gzhal sar rtsa hrang nge ba yod pa de'i nang 'debs su me btsa' bzhag pas rlung khrag gis mgo bo na ba dang rtsa dkar la phan /
analyzed: tshigs pa drug pa'i phan tshun du sor bzhi re gzhal sar rtsa hrang nge ba yod pa de'i nang 'debs su me btsa' bzhag pas rlung khrag gis mgo bo na ba dang rtsa dkar la phan /
translated: In the sixth vertebra, four fingerbreadths apart, there are two straight channels. Insert a moxibustion probe into these channels and apply moxibustion. This will help headaches and white channels caused by wind and blood disorders.

original: tshigs pa bco brgyad pa'i g-yas g-yon du sor gsum re gzhal ba'i sa dang bco brgyad rang gi steng ste gsum du me btsa' re bzhag pas rlung /
analyzed: tshigs pa bco brgyad pa'i g-yas g-yon du sor gsum re gzhal ba'i sa dang bco brgyad rang gi steng ste gsum du me btsa' re bzhag pas rlung /
translated: This helps wind,

original: grang ba / rked pa na ba /
analyzed: grang ba / rked pa na ba /
translated: cold, pain in the waist,

original: mkhal rtsa bral ba rnams la phan /
analyzed: mkhal rtsa bral ba rnams la phan /
translated: and separation of the kidney channels.

original: @322a * // tshigs pa lnga pa drug pa bdun pa gsum dang mdun gyi dkar nag mtshams su me btsa' re bzhag pas khrag gis brang tsha ba dang stod na ba sogs la phan zhing stod 'tshangs la de steng rke stod  bya ra khung du'ang gcig bzhag pas phan no
analyzed: @322a * // tshigs pa lnga pa drug pa bdun pa gsum dang mdun gyi dkar nag mtshams su me btsa' re bzhag pas khrag gis brang tsha ba dang stod na ba sogs la phan zhing stod 'tshangs la de steng rke stod  bya ra khung du'ang gcig bzhag pas phan no
translated: Place moxibustion on the fifth, sixth, and seventh vertebrae and on the boundary between the white and black parts of the front teeth. This helps blood, breast pain, and so forth. For a collapsed upper body, place one moxibustion on the upper part of the neck.

original: // lheng lheng rtse dbus su bzhag pa'i rgya gram sor gsum bsregs pas mkhris pa bad kan mchin skran rlung rnams la phan /
analyzed: // lheng lheng rtse dbus su bzhag pa'i rgya gram sor gsum bsregs pas mkhris pa bad kan mchin skran rlung rnams la phan /
translated: Place moxibustion on the center of the top of the head. Burning a three-fingerbreadth square, this helps bile, phlegm, liver tumors, and wind.

original: rke stong bya ra khung du me sgor mo aa long lta bu bzhag na khrag skyugs pa dang khrag rlung la phan /
analyzed: rke stong bya ra khung du me sgor mo aa long lta bu bzhag na khrag skyugs pa dang khrag rlung la phan /
translated: Place moxibustion on the upper part of the neck in a round hole like a keyhole. This helps vomiting blood and blood wind.

original: me nyams gsang gi g-yas g-yon mtshon re gzhal ba'i sar tshugs re bzhag pas rlung khrag dang khrag skran la phan /🔽pus mor tshigs chu 'khor na me long ru bzhir tshugs re bzhag pas khrag rlung chu ser sogs sel zhing khyad par rkyang bskum mi thub pa la phan /
analyzed: me nyams gsang gi g-yas g-yon mtshon re gzhal ba'i sar tshugs re bzhag pas rlung khrag dang khrag skran la phan / pus mor tshigs chu 'khor na me long ru bzhir tshugs re bzhag pas khrag rlung chu ser sogs sel zhing khyad par rkyang bskum mi thub pa la phan /
translated: For the treatment of blood disorders, blood clots, and so on, place a finger on each of the points on the right and left of the secret place, and on the points of the joints of the knees.🔽For the treatment of knee joint disorders, place a finger on each of the four sides of the mirror like points. This will eliminate blood, wind, chhuser, and so on. In particular, it will help those who are unable to bend or straighten their legs.

original: zas 'grangs ltogs ma snyoms pa'i ma 'ju glang thabs la mthil bzhir lcags leb me la dmar por song ba bsregs pa'i 'od ma reg tsam dang ras kyis dar ba 'byug pa res 'jog tu byas pas dri shin tu ngan pa zhig don yong zhing de nas myur
analyzed: zas 'grangs ltogs ma snyoms pa'i ma 'ju glang thabs la mthil bzhir lcags leb me la dmar por song ba bsregs pa'i 'od ma reg tsam dang ras kyis dar ba 'byug pa res 'jog tu byas pas dri shin tu ngan pa zhig don yong zhing de nas myur
translated: For the treatment of indigestion, which is caused by an imbalance of hunger and fullness, place a piece of iron, which has been heated until it is red hot, on each of the four pressure points. Then, apply a compress of cloth soaked in oil. This will eliminate the very foul smelling indigestion.

original: du phan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: du phan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, the patient will quickly recover.

original: nyva log 'khru skyugs kyi nad la zhag bzhi tshun du lag pa'i mkhrig ma gnyis sam de 'og bsgrad mkhyid gang gis /🔽dpung 'og gi nyva gnyis sog pa'i mthil gnyis /
analyzed: nyva log 'khru skyugs kyi nad la zhag bzhi tshun du lag pa'i mkhrig ma gnyis sam de 'og bsgrad mkhyid gang gis / dpung 'og gi nyva gnyis sog pa'i mthil gnyis /
translated: For the treatment of diarrhea, vomiting, and so on, place the two wrists or the two fingers below them, which are the length of a cubit apart,🔽on the two sides of the armpits, on the two sides of the collar bone,

original: brla'i nang gi nyva gnyis /
analyzed: brla'i nang gi nyva gnyis /
translated: on the two sides of the thighs,🔽and on the two sides of the calves.

original: phyin dkyil gyi nyva gnyis rnams la lcags mda' sor gsum pa zhig gis ser mdog thon tsam bsregs pas phan zhing tshan che na ltag khung spu 'khyil gyi thad kyi ltag pa'i chu leb gnyis dang rkang mthil gnyis bsregs na des phan nges so //
analyzed: phyin dkyil gyi nyva gnyis rnams la lcags mda' sor gsum pa zhig gis ser mdog thon tsam bsregs pas phan zhing tshan che na ltag khung spu 'khyil gyi thad kyi ltag pa'i chu leb gnyis dang rkang mthil gnyis bsregs na des phan nges so //
translated: If this is helpful and the fever is high, it is certain to help if one burns the two water-troughs of the nape of the neck at the level of the whorl of hair and the two soles of the feet.

original: sngar spyod kyi skyon yon rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba dang lus kyi gzi mdangs bzang ba ngan pa dang ngan pa bzang bar 'gyur ba byung na klu gdon gyi nad zhugs pa'i rtags yin pas sor mo nyi shu'i sen snying gi mtshams dang skra mtshams @322b su
analyzed: sngar spyod kyi skyon yon rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba dang lus kyi gzi mdangs bzang ba ngan pa dang ngan pa bzang bar 'gyur ba byung na klu gdon gyi nad zhugs pa'i rtags yin pas sor mo nyi shu'i sen snying gi mtshams dang skra mtshams @322b su
translated: If the faults and qualities of previous conduct change in some way, and if the good and bad complexion of the body changes, and if the bad becomes good, this is a sign of the entry of the disease of the nāga spirit. Therefore, one should burn the twenty fingers and toes at the joints of the heart and the hairline,

original: 'phred la sor lnga ser mdog thon tsam bsregs pas de'i nad sel lo //
analyzed: 'phred la sor lnga ser mdog thon tsam bsregs pas de'i nad sel lo //
translated: and across the forehead at the level of the eyebrows, five finger-widths, until a yellow color appears. This will remove that disease.

original: rdo thal chu la sbyangs pa dang so phag rnying pa bsregs pa'i khu ba gnyis gang rung gi gdus thang btang bas nyva log 'khru skyugs kyi skyug pa sogs skyug pa'i rigs mtha' dag chod do /
analyzed: rdo thal chu la sbyangs pa dang so phag rnying pa bsregs pa'i khu ba gnyis gang rung gi gdus thang btang bas nyva log 'khru skyugs kyi skyug pa sogs skyug pa'i rigs mtha' dag chod do /
translated: By drinking a decoction of either the ashes of burnt limestone or old bricks, all types of vomiting, such as vomiting blood, vomiting mucus, and vomiting bile, will be cured.

original: ` / shr'i ga na sh'a ya na ma: dpal tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi gdams pa /
analyzed: ` / shr'i ga na sh'a ya na ma: dpal tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi gdams pa /
translated: The Instructions of Glorious Gaṇapati

original: phyogs gang du 'gro yang lam du nad gdon gnod pa sogs nyer 'tshe gang yang mi 'byung zhing /
analyzed: phyogs gang du 'gro yang lam du nad gdon gnod pa sogs nyer 'tshe gang yang mi 'byung zhing /
translated: Wherever you go, no matter where, you will not encounter any harm, such as illness, spirits, or danger on the road.

original: bya ba gang dang gang yin pa de bde blag tu 'grub pa dang / zas gos gnas ma la sogs 'bad med du 'byung bar 'dod na /🔽aom hr'im hr'im /
analyzed: bya ba gang dang gang yin pa de bde blag tu 'grub pa dang / zas gos gnas ma la sogs 'bad med du 'byung bar 'dod na / aom hr'im hr'im /
translated: If you wish to easily accomplish whatever you do and to have food, clothing, shelter, and so forth without effort,🔽recite this: oṃ hṛīṃ hṛīṃ

original: gl'i poo // g'am g'am /
analyzed: gl'i poo // g'am g'am /
translated: Gāṃ gāṃ.🔽🔽

original: zhes pa 'di thog mar yan lag lnga khrus byas /
analyzed: zhes pa 'di thog mar yan lag lnga khrus byas /
translated: First, wash your five limbs.

original: gu gul sogs spos kyi dud pa sngags bzla ba'i bar rgyun ma chad pa dang bcas zhag nyer gcig gi ring nyin rer brgya rtsa re ma chag par bzla ba bsnyen pa dang / de nas las sbyor nye ring gang du 'gro ba'i dus tshar bdun re'am tha na'ang tshar re bzlas nas phyin na gong du smos pa ltar gnod pa med cing bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba sogs yon tan bsam las 'das pa 'byung nges so //
analyzed: gu gul sogs spos kyi dud pa sngags bzla ba'i bar rgyun ma chad pa dang bcas zhag nyer gcig gi ring nyin rer brgya rtsa re ma chag par bzla ba bsnyen pa dang / de nas las sbyor nye ring gang du 'gro ba'i dus tshar bdun re'am tha na'ang tshar re bzlas nas phyin na gong du smos pa ltar gnod pa med cing bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba sogs yon tan bsam las 'das pa 'byung nges so //
translated: Then, if you recite the mantra seven times or at least once when you go to a place near or far, as mentioned above, you will be free from harm and all your wishes will be fulfilled.

original: na massva ra styee /
analyzed: na massva ra styee /
translated: NAMA SVA RAYA.

original: 'phags ma dbyangs can ma'i bden tshig gi sngags /
analyzed: 'phags ma dbyangs can ma'i bden tshig gi sngags /
translated: The mantra of the noble Sarasvatī’s words of truth:🔽YE YE

analyzed: shr'i ma hi ta no shakti /

analyzed: pra tso da ya ta /
translated: PRACODAYATA

original: ces pa 'di gza' mig dmar gyi res dang gnam gang nam byung la dri bzang po'i dud pa dang bcas tshar bdun re bzlas na bsam pa'i re ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: ces pa 'di gza' mig dmar gyi res dang gnam gang nam byung la dri bzang po'i dud pa dang bcas tshar bdun re bzlas na bsam pa'i re ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhing /
translated: If one recites this seven times, together with the smoke of fragrant incense, on Tuesday or the full moon, all one’s wishes will be fulfilled.

original: khyad par blo rno ba dang shes rab che bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyad par blo rno ba dang shes rab che bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In particular, one will become sharp-witted and very wise.

translated: tīja bandho🔽ekaṃ tarabandho

analyzed: pandi raha to //

analyzed: aa dza p'i r'a n'i /

analyzed: aa dze p'a la yo gi la dze phu ro //
